['', 'BS/BA degree in related field required or equivalent professional work-related experience.', 'Job Description:', 'Developing expertise in specific areas by leading analytical projects independently, while setting goals, providing benefit estimations, defining workflows, and coordinating timelines in advance.', 'Have a good understanding of general business trends and directions to be able to put your own work in the broad business context.', 'Strong organizational skills and excellent follow-through', 'Qualifications', 'Experience with program management and process mapping is a plus', 'Job Description Summary:', 'Produce accurate, automated risk solutions, and manual handling policies to block fraudulent activities by declining payments, adding accounts to the fraud review queue, or restricting suspicious users.', 'Demonstrate flexibility that is needed to succeed within a matrix organization while being proactive and comfortable with working alongside stakeholders from different domains.', 'Experience with working in a technology environment', 'Be data-driven and outcome-focused', 'Work closely with product teams on the development of new products to identify potential gaps that might create loss, and define requirements to mitigate those risks. ', 'BS/BA degree in related field required or equivalent professional work-related experience.3+ years of experience in solving problems using a data-driven approach or Master’s degree and 2+ years.Strong analytical and reporting skillsHigh proficiency in fundamental SQL. Other technical skills are a plus (Java/C/C++; Perl/Python; strong UNIX background; Hadoop; R )Strong organizational skills and excellent follow-throughOutstanding written, verbal, and interpersonal communication skillsHigh emotional intelligence, a can-do mentality, and a creative approach to problem-solvingExperience with working in a technology environmentExperience with program management and process mapping is a plus', '3+ years of experience in solving problems using a data-driven approach or Master’s degree and 2+ years.', 'Develop controls and monitoring dashboards to ensure performance against the business goal, regulatory requirements, and business priorities.', 'Specific Responsibilities Include', 'Fight fraudulent activity in one’s domain of ownership by analyzing existing loss trends through review of specific cases, research on our payments database, and incorporation of feedback from operations teams.', 'Outstanding written, verbal, and interpersonal communication skills', 'Remain up-to-date on industry information, federal regulations, and new products, while continuously learning from peers across the organization about fraud and fraud-prevention tools.', 'High proficiency in fundamental SQL. Other technical skills are a plus (Java/C/C++; Perl/Python; strong UNIX background; Hadoop; R )', 'High emotional intelligence, a can-do mentality, and a creative approach to problem-solving', 'Work with various partners within Venmo and PayPal to coordinate the execution of fraud mitigation solutions.', 'Developing expertise in specific areas by leading analytical projects independently, while setting goals, providing benefit estimations, defining workflows, and coordinating timelines in advance.Fight fraudulent activity in one’s domain of ownership by analyzing existing loss trends through review of specific cases, research on our payments database, and incorporation of feedback from operations teams.Produce accurate, automated risk solutions, and manual handling policies to block fraudulent activities by declining payments, adding accounts to the fraud review queue, or restricting suspicious users.Work closely with product teams on the development of new products to identify potential gaps that might create loss, and define requirements to mitigate those risks. Have a good understanding of general business trends and directions to be able to put your own work in the broad business context.Work with various partners within Venmo and PayPal to coordinate the execution of fraud mitigation solutions.Demonstrate flexibility that is needed to succeed within a matrix organization while being proactive and comfortable with working alongside stakeholders from different domains.Develop controls and monitoring dashboards to ensure performance against the business goal, regulatory requirements, and business priorities.Remain up-to-date on industry information, federal regulations, and new products, while continuously learning from peers across the organization about fraud and fraud-prevention tools.Be data-driven and outcome-focused', 'Strong analytical and reporting skills']

['', 'The Team', 'Strong knowledge of statistics, inference, and machine learning.\xa0', 'Data Scientist', 'This position is located at our Chandler, AZ office at 1260 South Spectrum Blvd. Chandler AZ 85286', '\xa0', 'As a Data Scientist at Keap, you will apply statistical methods to solve problems, improve decision making, and help our business grow. This includes defining\xa0business\xa0problems, wrangling relevant data, feature engineering, developing models, productionizing models, monitoring model performance, and sharing findings with our business\xa0partners.\xa0', 'Responsibilities', 'Build those solutions leveraging:', 'Our in-house data infrastructure or external data sources', 'Ability to work effectively with stakeholders to deliver solutions.\xa0\xa0', '\ufeffAt Keap, we celebrate diversity and inclusion for the benefit of our employees, our products, our community, and to help small businesses succeed. We do not discriminate based on race, color, ethnicity, ancestry, national origin, religion, sex, gender, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, age, disability, veteran status, marital status or any legally protected status.', 'Identify opportunities across the business and in our products for data science solutions to provide value.Build those solutions leveraging:Your expertise in statistical modelingDomain knowledgeOur in-house data infrastructure or external data sourcesAppropriate tools\xa0Maintain and improve our data infrastructure.\xa0Some ad-hoc analysis requests to extract immediately actionable insights for stakeholders.', '3+ years of experience doing quantitative analysis, preferably for a technology company on a Business Intelligence, Marketing, Product, Customer Service or Data Science team.', 'Intellectually curious, open to learning and teaching others. Interest in Bayesian methods or causal inference is a plus.', 'The Role', 'Experience writing maintainable code in Python/R or other languages, proficiency in SQL.', 'The Data Science & Analytics team works closely with multiple teams across Keap. We build systems\xa0to\xa0ensure accurate reporting and provide useful analysis to our business stakeholders. We also support experiments across the company and\xa0build data products, including\xa0predictive models that are used\xa0for decision making.\xa0', 'Formal training in Math, Physics, Statistics, Economics, Computer Science, or other quantitative field, graduate degree preferred.\xa0', 'Qualifications\xa0', 'Ability to frame business problems in terms of data science solutions.\xa0', 'Ability to present analysis findings to both technical and non-technical audiences and to write up analysis results.\xa0', '3+ years of experience doing quantitative analysis, preferably for a technology company on a Business Intelligence, Marketing, Product, Customer Service or Data Science team.Formal training in Math, Physics, Statistics, Economics, Computer Science, or other quantitative field, graduate degree preferred.\xa0Strong knowledge of statistics, inference, and machine learning.\xa0Ability to frame business problems in terms of data science solutions.\xa0Ability to work effectively with stakeholders to deliver solutions.\xa0\xa0Experience writing maintainable code in Python/R or other languages, proficiency in SQL.Experience using Docker, AWS or GCP to build data products. Experience with Looker or other BI tools is a plus.\xa0Ability to present analysis findings to both technical and non-technical audiences and to write up analysis results.\xa0Intellectually curious, open to learning and teaching others. Interest in Bayesian methods or causal inference is a plus.Awareness of data limitations and underlying assumptions behind statistical methods.\xa0', 'Experience using Docker, AWS or GCP to build data products. Experience with Looker or other BI tools is a plus.\xa0', 'Awareness of data limitations and underlying assumptions behind statistical methods.\xa0', 'Appropriate tools\xa0', 'Your expertise in statistical modeling', 'Identify opportunities across the business and in our products for data science solutions to provide value.', 'Some ad-hoc analysis requests to extract immediately actionable insights for stakeholders.', 'Maintain and improve our data infrastructure.\xa0', 'Domain knowledge']

We offer discounted cell phone plansYou might be surprised at what you can find in our stores!\xa0EZCORP employees get a pretty good discount at any of our stores', 'We are currently seeking a Data Scientist! The Data Scientist’s primary role is to support the development, validation and maintenance of decision scoring models across the areas of Marketing, Operations, Profitability and Risk.\xa0The Data Scientist will lead the root cause analysis, issue resolution, and technology development regarding modeling and analytical infrastructure and associated tools and processes.\xa0\xa0This individual will be responsible for supporting scorecard implementations, cut-off strategies, oversight of scorecards monitoring and related recommendations regarding scorecard re-alignment or re-development. Additionally, it is expected that this individual will clearly communicate findings to the Senior management team and relevant business units.\xa0This role uses independence and judgment, works within the scope to solve problems and is accountable for the quality, timeliness and accuracy of their own work and may require travel outside of the U.S.\xa0 If this sounds like the position for you, please read on!', 'Why Us:', 'Why Us', 'Builds decision models to support operational strategies', 'Ensures that data is fit for purpose, is optimized for analytical work and new data sources are evaluated and integrated', 'Designs algorithms as required', 'Ensures the use of challenger modeling techniques to validate and adapt modeling strategies', 'What’s in it for you:', 'Demonstrated experience in working with large data sets ', 'What we are looking for', 'Utilizes customer information and behavioral scoring models to enhance business strategies', 'PhD in Statistics, Mathematics, or related field', 'You might be asking yourself; do I want to work for a company that operates pawn shops? job_title: Data Scientist - Fraud Engineering, Algorithms, and Risk
job_text: ['', 'Key Qualifications', 'Summary', 'Education & Experience', 'Description']

['', 'Responsibilities', 'Produce clear, understandable visualizations, dashboard and reports to share with Senior Management and business partners, provide the insightful story from the data perspective to risk policy owners.', 'Experience working in payments fraud or credit risk modeling is desired but not mandatory.', 'Creative problem solving and critical thinking skills.', 'Master degree (Ph.D. is a plus) in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Engineering or a similar Quantitative field, or equivalent practical experience.', 'Qualifications', ' Acute business sense, deeply understand the business model, transaction flow, and payment system. Discovery the potential risk point, work closely with product manager, engineer, and operations to design data pipeline and risk strategy framework. Lay the groundwork – hypothesize as an individual researcher and in collaboration with other team members on how to solve fraud problems. Perform data preparation activities, such as collecting, cleaning, and organizing. Produce clear, understandable visualizations, dashboard and reports to share with Senior Management and business partners, provide the insightful story from the data perspective to risk policy owners. Establish a holistic risk modeling framework for addressing the risk of fraud and financial abuse across riders, drivers, merchants, and affiliates. Deep dive into data through systematic and ad hoc analyses and build machine learning models to score the identity, behavior, reputation and other risk characteristics of the customers. Communicate Results on a regular basis to stakeholders around the world, including executive leadership. ', 'About The Company', 'Deep dive into data through systematic and ad hoc analyses and build machine learning models to score the identity, behavior, reputation and other risk characteristics of the customers.', 'Communicate Results on a regular basis to stakeholders around the world, including executive leadership.', 'Knowledge of the latest ML techniques like decision tree, random forest is a plus, but not a requirement.', 'Strong modeling skillset, hands on mastery of data manipulation and experience with data analytics tools (SQL, R, Python, Hive, Spark, and other data analysis packages).', '3+ years of related industry experience.', ' Master degree (Ph.D. is a plus) in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Engineering or a similar Quantitative field, or equivalent practical experience. 3+ years of related industry experience. Strong modeling skillset, hands on mastery of data manipulation and experience with data analytics tools (SQL, R, Python, Hive, Spark, and other data analysis packages). Experience working in payments fraud or credit risk modeling is desired but not mandatory. Knowledge of the latest ML techniques like decision tree, random forest is a plus, but not a requirement. Creative problem solving and critical thinking skills. ', 'Acute business sense, deeply understand the business model, transaction flow, and payment system. Discovery the potential risk point, work closely with product manager, engineer, and operations to design data pipeline and risk strategy framework.', 'Establish a holistic risk modeling framework for addressing the risk of fraud and financial abuse across riders, drivers, merchants, and affiliates.', 'Lay the groundwork – hypothesize as an individual researcher and in collaboration with other team members on how to solve fraud problems. Perform data preparation activities, such as collecting, cleaning, and organizing.']

['', 'Proficiency with and experience with SQL', 'Strong communication and collaboration skills', 'About the position: As a Data Scientist you will become a core member of the AI team and execute on ambitious milestones, taking ownership of your own projects.', '\xa0', 'M.S./PhD in Maths, Statistics, Computer Science or related field.Minimum of 2 years of hands-on experience as Data Scientist performing statistical analyses and/or building out data pipelinesStrong software development skills including testing (Python)Experience with data analysis / visualization libraries (pandas, matplotlib)Proficiency with and experience with SQLStrong communication and collaboration skillsProactive, ambitious, and fast learner\xa0', 'You will be able to contribute and grow your technical skills by building end to end highly impactful software medical devices that will ultimately impact the lives of millions of people. Your contributions will play a key role in building a great company from an early stage. We provide a competitive compensation package.', 'Responsibilities', 'Qualifications', 'Minimum of 2 years of hands-on experience as Data Scientist performing statistical analyses and/or building out data pipelines', 'Strong software development skills including testing (Python)', 'Process and Analyze large and diverse medical datasets to understand and improve patient diagnostics and treatment', 'Define, implement, perform and interpret quantitative performance assessments of AI models', 'Efficiently sample representative datasets and inform annotation decisions', 'You will have a unique opportunity to be hands on and shape all stages of a complex ML data pipeline. This includes a large variety of tasks for which your analytical skills coupled with solid technical knowledge are a key requirement.', 'Summary: Join VideaHealth as key member of our Artificial Intelligence team to develop data pipelines and evaluate complex ML systems that eventually improve dental health of millions of people.', 'M.S./PhD in Maths, Statistics, Computer Science or related field.', 'Experience with data analysis / visualization libraries (pandas, matplotlib)', 'Perform statistical analysis and hypothesis testing', 'Proactive, ambitious, and fast learner\xa0', 'Process and Analyze large and diverse medical datasets to understand and improve patient diagnostics and treatmentPerform statistical analysis and hypothesis testingEfficiently sample representative datasets and inform annotation decisionsConsolidate, prepare and inventory datasets for model training and evaluationDefine, implement, perform and interpret quantitative performance assessments of AI models', 'Consolidate, prepare and inventory datasets for model training and evaluation', 'Summary: ', 'About us: ', 'You will work closely with ML Engineers to inform model improvements in a data-driven way. You will also collaborate with our clinical team to support the design of efficient annotation protocols and to understand, analyze and reduce the risk of potential biases in datasets. We are looking for an individual with a strong analytical background who is not shy to take proactive responsibilities. ', 'About the position: ', 'About us: VideaHealth is a venture-backed startup developing artificial intelligence to automatically detect diseases in dental x-ray imaging. Spun out of MIT in 2018, our prior research has shown that dentists miss up to 50% of dental diseases. VideaHealth helps dentists detect these conditions and effectively communicate treatment recommendations to patients. Our product increases revenue for dentists and has the potential to reduce health risks for over 210 million patients every year in the US alone. In addition, we are helping dental insurance companies streamline their claims review process with AI. We have a strong core team and advisors, have raised over $6.5M\xa0in seed funding so far. Our investors include Pillar VC (invested in Path AI), Zetta Venture Partners (invested in Tractable), and angel investors like Frederic Kerrest (Co-founder of Okta), Avid Larizadeh Duggan (Former Google Ventures Partner), and Bradley Armstrong (Vice President at Slack). Our work has been featured at Techcrunch and the Wall Street Journal. We have great momentum and are now looking for ambitious talent to join our team!']

We’re able to drastically reduce the amount of shrink (food waste) which in turn drives profit for retailers, lowers costs for consumers, and reduces the ecological impact of waste. We’re using technology to solve a globally-relevant problem that both creates a positive environmental impact and an exciting (and potentially massive) commercial opportunity.']

['', '4 to 10 years’ experience in statistical modeling, machine learning techniques, data mining, feature creation, decision sciences or other analyticsExperience with statistical tools such as R, SAS or PythonExcellent communication skills, both oral and written, and the ability to communicate technical analysis and findings clearly to senior leaders and non-technical audiencesExcellent business acumen skills including ability to translate analytic findings into business strategies that make sense for the business modelBS in Data Science, Business Analytics, Math, Statistics, or related field', 'The data scientist will be responsible for providing advanced analytics across all aspects of our client’s brand platforms. Model builds should follow generally accepted methods and be deployable into the a large/complex data structure.Forecast CRM production volumes and KPIs monthly. Adjust forecasts based on variance to actuals. job_title: Data Scientist / Senior Data Scientist - Adtech
job_text: ['', 'Participate in project planning/prioritization meetings, partner meetings, data prioritization meetings, etc', 'Experience with exploratory data analysis, statistical analysis and testing, and model development', 'Build tools and products that will optimize each part of the marketing funnel (from prospecting to sign up to early user to active user and churn), as well as to support budget planning, measurement, attribution, targeting, cross-sell/up-sell, paid channel optimization, and segmentation for core Uber businesses globally', 'Able to multitask and be a great teammate', 'Build production grade models on large-scale datasets to optimize marketing performance by utilizing advanced statistical modeling, machine learning, or data mining techniques and marketing science research', 'Experience with big data using technologies like Hadoop, Hive, and Spark a plus', 'Organized and have the ability to balance attention to detail with swift execution', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Use models to address key growth challenges and provide meaningful insights on problems in Targeting and Personalization including user uplift modeling, recommendations, personalized promotions and targeting optimization etc', 'Knowledge of underlying mathematical foundations of statistics, machine learning, optimization, economics, and analytics.', 'About The Role', 'Work with cross-functional teams to implement and deploy models and improve analytical solutions by providing data-driven recommendations', "Ph.D., M.S. or Bachelors degree in Statistics, Economics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fields. ['', 'Deployed regression, time-series, and machine learning models with R and Python, for a variety of business problems.', 'This position must pass a post-offer background and drug test.', 'Demonstrated curiosity and self-direction. Willingness to both teach others and learn new techniques. ', 'Experience with R and Python.', 'Identify best or most applicable analytical techniques for a given business problem.', 'Implement models and create processes to monitor their performance, including input data integrity.', 'Preferred Skills And Experience', 'Document projects including business objectives, data gathering and processing, leading approaches, final algorithm, detailed set of results and analytical metrics. ', 'Experiences in databases and SQL, and in big data/cloud platforms such Azure, snowflake and Spark.', 'Position Responsibilities May Include, But Not Limited To', 'Maintain and refine existing models and related processes. ', '3+ years’ experience in advanced analytics, quantitative or computational functions.', 'Experience with R and Python.Prior professional experience in consumer-packaged goods or distribution / wholesale.', 'Develop and deploy statistical and machine learning models to address business problems using R, Python and others.', 'Utilize statistical or time-series models to make predictions on future outcomes in multiple scenarios.', 'Identify best or most applicable analytical techniques for a given business problem.Develop and deploy statistical and machine learning models to address business problems using R, Python and others.Maintain and refine existing models and related processes. Utilize statistical or time-series models to make predictions on future outcomes in multiple scenarios.Implement models and create processes to monitor their performance, including input data integrity.Employ data visualization tools and codes where appropriate (e.g., Power BI, Tableau, ggplot, and others).Partner with Data Analytics teams and IT / BI / Data teams to ensure data used for modeling accurately reflects business reality.Effectively communicate model approaches, outputs and findings to IT and Analytics audiences. Document projects including business objectives, data gathering and processing, leading approaches, final algorithm, detailed set of results and analytical metrics. Ensure modeling processes always conform to data security standards.', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Analytics, Data Science, Operations Research, Statistics or other related quantitative discipline.3+ years’ experience in advanced analytics, quantitative or computational functions.At least 1 year in an applied data science role. Demonstrated curiosity and self-direction. Willingness to both teach others and learn new techniques. Deployed regression, time-series, and machine learning models with R and Python, for a variety of business problems.Working knowledge in analytical techniques such as multivariate / non-linear regression, time series, classification methods, Bayesian methods, or neural networks. Experiences in databases and SQL, and in big data/cloud platforms such Azure, snowflake and Spark.Data visualization tools such as Power BI and Tableau, for reporting model outputs, data trends, business issues, or exceptions.This position must pass a post-offer background and drug test.', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Analytics, Data Science, Operations Research, Statistics or other related quantitative discipline.', 'At least 1 year in an applied data science role. ', 'Data visualization tools such as Power BI and Tableau, for reporting model outputs, data trends, business issues, or exceptions.', 'Ensure modeling processes always conform to data security standards.', 'Prior professional experience in consumer-packaged goods or distribution / wholesale.', 'Employ data visualization tools and codes where appropriate (e.g., Power BI, Tableau, ggplot, and others).', 'Required Skills And Experience', 'Working knowledge in analytical techniques such as multivariate / non-linear regression, time series, classification methods, Bayesian methods, or neural networks. ', 'Physical Demands And Work Environment', 'Position Summary', 'Partner with Data Analytics teams and IT / BI / Data teams to ensure data used for modeling accurately reflects business reality.', 'Effectively communicate model approaches, outputs and findings to IT and Analytics audiences. uses intuition and experience to complement data', 'Impeccable customer service focus with a demonstrated desire to exceed expectations.', '- Medical Insurance Plan\xa0', 'Build robust and scalable data integration pipelines using SQL and Python.', '\xa0', '- Creates Ad Hoc reports, queries and/or analyses upon request\xa0', '- Demonstrated knowledge of Data Visualization best practices', 'Technical Skills (required):\xa0', '- Provides day to day support to the division as required to ensure the availability and performance of systems, users interface and dashboards\xa0', '- Pregnancy Disability Leave / Paid Parental Leave\xa0', '- Paid vacation & holidays\xa0', 'Company Overview\xa0', '- Supplemental Benefits (Life, Disability, Accident Insurance)\xa0', 'Key Responsibilities:\xa0', 'Qualifications & Key Competencies:\xa0', '\xa0Key Responsibilities:\xa0\xa0', '- Interface with other teams to extract, transform, and load data from a wide variety of data sources.', '- Responsible for improving data quality to increase data accuracy, viability, and value', '- Experience with relational databases\xa0', 'Attention to detail; you prioritize multiple tasks simultaneously without sacrificing the ability to dive deep.', 'We are seeking a creative and analytical individual to join our Business Intelligence Team. As a member of this team, you will be responsible for designing and implementing data solutions. The successful candidate knows and loves working with business intelligence tools, is comfortable accessing and working with data from multiple sources, and passionately partners with the business to identify strategic opportunities and deliver results. You should have an internal drive to answer “why?” questions, excellent analytical abilities, strong technical skills, as well as superior written and verbal communication skills. Position is office-based in Charleston, SC.\xa0', 'Qualifications & Key Competencies:\xa0\xa0', '- SQL knowledge\xa0', '- Assist in quality control and validation processes and testing efforts, providing guidance and supervision to end users to ensure adequate and thorough testing\xa0', 'Founded in 1970, Mediterranean Shipping Company (MSC), S.A of Geneva, Switzerland, is the second largest shipping line in the world. Offering a worldwide network of 500 offices in 152 countries, employing a team of 70,000 dedicated individuals, MSC prides itself on delivering a global service with great local knowledge. We have an established fleet of 500+ container vessels with an intake capacity of circa 2.6 million TEUs. The shipping line sails on 200 trade routes, calling at 315 ports and has established landside services, delivering a door-to-door intermodal service, almost anywhere in the world. With a streamlined management structure in Geneva, MSC has become a leading customer focused and cost-effective global transportation solution for many shippers. Providing an unparalleled service network via dedicated own offices throughout the world, MSC remains a truly independent and private Company that is able to respond quickly to market changes.\xa0', '- Oral Communication: Speaks clearly and persuasively; Listens and gets clarification; Responds well to questions; Demonstrates group presentation skills.', 'Technical Skills (required):\xa0\xa0', 'What we offer:\xa0', '1+ year of hands-on experience in writing complex, highly-optimized SQL queries across large data sets.', '- 1-2 years’ experience with Microsoft Power BI, Tableau, Looker or any other data visualization tool\xa0', '- Ability to own the full cycle of dashboard development from requirement gathering and design through development and launch/support', '- 401K Plan – effective Day One\xa0', '- Life Insurance – one-time annual salary up to $50,000 / Separate Business Travel Insurance\xa0', '- Short Term / Long Term Disability\xa0', '- Ability to manage multiple priorities and adjust quickly', 'What we offer:\xa0\xa0', '- Partner Discount Programs - effective Day One\xa0', '- Strong data visualization skills', '- Dental/Vision Insurance Plan\xa0', '- Create and maintain training materials and train business end-users and power users as necessary\xa0', '- Wellness Programs - effective Day One\xa0', '- Build and deliver high quality data architecture to support business analyst, data scientists, and customer reporting needs', '- Annual bonus', '- Bachelor’s degree, preferably in a math, science, or technology related field of study\xa0']

job_title: Staff, BI Analyst, Data Scientist - Business Intelligence
job_text: ['', ' Experience with data warehousing and/or ETL processes, and distributed computing (Hive/Presto) and Snowflake. ', '  7+ years of professional experience in analytics and data science or similar fields, in a fast paced industry and 2+ years of people management experience.   Ability to think strategically and initiate, refine and complete projects proactively with minimal guidance and to supervise junior BI analysts with their projects.   Expert level knowledge in SQL and relational and multidimensional database schemas and designs.   Strong in python (e.g. pandas, numpy, scikit-learn) or R for data manipulation and analysis.   Strong in advanced analytics and machine learning, such as predictive analytics, regression, hypothesis testing, causal analysis.   Experience in BI tool architectures, functions and features.   Familiar with Tableau and Looker (LookML) including cloud server management, user access management, site and group management.   Experience with data warehousing and/or ETL processes, and distributed computing (Hive/Presto) and Snowflake.   Experience with compliance, audit, user access control process and data governance.   Demonstrated leadership and self-direction. Willingness to both teach others and learn new techniques.   Experience project management and Agile delivery methods.   Data Scientist/Analytics Background is a MUST.  ', ' Wear the Customer’s Shoes: Be a true partner, understand real questions behind requests and solve the problem with the best method for the problem. ', ' Experience in BI tool architectures, functions and features. ', ' Expert level knowledge in SQL and relational and multidimensional database schemas and designs. ', ' Strong in python (e.g. pandas, numpy, scikit-learn) or R for data manipulation and analysis. ['', 'Strong collaborator and communicator, tells stories through data and effective visualization', "We are looking for a Senior Data Scientist interested in solving one of the world's largest problems: financial inclusion. You will own the modeling cycle through scoping, development, deployment and after-sale and monitoring, with keen focus on business outcomes and stakeholder management.", '3+ years of experience in a data science role or equivalent position', 'Monitor model performance and provide after sale service to stakeholders, iterating rapidly if necessary', 'Nice to Have:', '3+ years of experience in a data science role or equivalent position1+ year of experience leading the execution of end to end machine learning solutions for business stakeholdersFluent in Python and packages related to machine learningProficient in SQLHigh level of statistical competency, knowledge of experimental design and analysisExperience with the full modeling cycle, from scoping and development through deployment, after-sale and monitoringStrong collaborator and communicator, tells stories through data and effective visualization', 'Partner with Recoveries stakeholders to Identify, test and implement omni-channel communication models and segmentation', 'Fluent in Python and packages related to machine learning', 'The Role', 'Experience with the full modeling cycle, from scoping and development through deployment, after-sale and monitoring', "What you'll need:", 'Tala was named one of the top 50 FinTech companies in the world. Headquartered in Santa Monica, we support the needs of our customers in Kenya, Mexico, Philippines, and India.\xa0', 'Proficient in SQL', 'Our vision is to build a new financial ecosystem where everyone can participate on equal footing and access the tools they need to be financially healthy. Qualifications', 'QUALIFICATIONS', 'EVIDATION HEALTH VALUES DIVERSITY AND IS COMMITTED TO EQUAL OPPORTUNITY FOR ALL PERSONS WITHOUT REGARD TO RACE, COLOR, CREED, RELIGION, MARITAL STATUS, AGE, projects supporting the research team   Contributes to cross-functional discussion, planning and execution medium-high complexity projects   Mentors and coaches more junior team member with diverse backgrounds to drive learning and engagement   Communicate findings, roadblocks and timelines cross-functionally to ensure project objectives are supported   Build re-usable tools and models to predict health-related variables from time-series continuously collected from connected devices and apps   Maintain the highest level of rigor and apply best practices to create reproducible, generalizable, fair, unbiased, and preferably interpretable models   Develop and review code as a major responsibility (typically up to 50-70% of the time)  ', '  1+ years of experience in a health data science or related field   Experience with devops and systems   Experience working with wearable data or IoT data  ', "Considering candidates in Santa Barbara, San Mateo, or US based remote*Evidation measures health in everyday life and enables anyone to participate in groundbreaking research and health programs. Built upon a foundation of user privacy and control over permissioned health data, Evidation's Achievement platform is trusted by millions of individuals—generating data with unprecedented speed, scale, and rigor. We partner with leading healthcare companies to understand health and disease outside the clinic walls. Guided by our mission to enable and empower everyone to participate in better health outcomes, Evidation is working to bring people individualized, proactive, and accessible healthcare—faster.We’re looking for a technical contributor who can help drive innovation on how we collect and use real-world data to improve clinical outcomes. Our work lies at the intersection of many diverse fields including machine learning, signal processing, and epidemiology, and in this role you will be driving projects that harness vast amounts of time series data from wearables, sensors, and other mobile data to infer changes in health status and disease progression over time. The ideal candidate will have exposure to writing analytical software and toolkits designed to improve data scientist productivity. We value problem-solving skills and an attitude towards learning. We seek great communication and accountability, people who think people first.Responsibilities  Work with limited supervision from more senior team members to lead, define strategy, and execute on software development projects supporting the research team   Contributes to cross-functional discussion, planning and execution medium-high complexity projects   Mentors and coaches more junior team member with diverse backgrounds to drive learning and engagement   Communicate findings, roadblocks and timelines cross-functionally to ensure project objectives are supported   Build re-usable tools and models to predict health-related variables from time-series continuously collected from connected devices and apps   Maintain the highest level of rigor and apply best practices to create reproducible, generalizable, fair, unbiased, and preferably interpretable models   Develop and review code as a major responsibility (typically up to 50-70% of the time)   QUALIFICATIONSMinimum Qualifications  Master's or PhD in computer science, data science, software engineering, or electrical engineering, or related discipline, OR   Bachelor's in computer science, data science, software engineering, electrical engineering, or related discipline with 2+ years experience in software development or related field(s)   Exposure to data science techniques and tool kits (e.g. spark, pandas, matplotlib)   Highly proficient in Python or R   High level of motivation and willingness to learn new tools and ideas.  Preferred Qualifications  1+ years of experience in a health data science or related field   Experience with devops and systems   Experience working with wearable data or IoT data   BENEFITS  Health, dental, and vision benefits for you and competitive coverage for your family   Relocation support   Equity   Flexible work hours   Open vacation policy - take time when you need it   Support for remote work when needed   Relaxed work environment   Your choice of computing equipment and gear   Lots of opportunities for growth   Opportunity to work on fascinating challenges that improve people’s lives   EVIDATION HEALTH VALUES DIVERSITY AND IS COMMITTED TO EQUAL OPPORTUNITY FOR ALL PERSONS WITHOUT REGARD TO RACE, COLOR, CREED, RELIGION, MARITAL STATUS, AGE, NATIONAL ORIGIN OR ANCESTRY, POLITICAL ACTIVITY OR AFFILIATION, PHYSICAL OR MENTAL DISABILITY, MEDICAL CONDITION INCLUDING GENETIC CHARACTERISTICS, MARITAL STATUS, SEXUAL ORIENTATION, GENDER IDENTITY, SEX OR GENDER."]

['Ability to work as an induvial contributor as well as in an interdisciplinary team\xa0', 'Washington\xa0–\xa0D.C.', 'PhD or MS in computer science or related discipline with work experience as a Research Scientist in Machine Learning and Natural Language Programming\xa0', 'THE BENEFITS\xa0', '$130,000 - $175,000', '\xa0', 'HOW TO APPLY', 'With a rich and varied dataset to work from, using images, as well as medical claims and everything in between, you’ll have the chance to apply your AI, NLP expertise\xa0to change the way medical imaging takes place. It will be your responsibility to identify and enact the capacity of Deep Learning for NLP throughout the company.\xa0\xa0', 'THE COMPANY', 'You will need to be a proven problem solver, critical thinker, and have an advanced technical background to join this growing, yet experienced team.\xa0The successful\u202fAI\xa0Scientist\u202fwill likely have the following skills and experience:\xa0', 'PhD or MS in computer science or related discipline with work experience as a Research Scientist in Machine Learning and Natural Language Programming\xa0Strong deep learning background and familiarity with state-of-the-art NLP techniques (BERT, XLM,\xa0XLNet)\xa0Applied programming experience in Python, C, and/or C++\xa0Experience with libraries and tools like Tensor Flow,\xa0PyTorch, Theano,\xa0Keras, and CUDA\xa0Ability to work as an induvial contributor as well as in an interdisciplinary team\xa0', 'THE ROLE', 'Responsibilities will include helping to execute the company’s AI strategy in the area of language understanding, as well as to further create, extend, and validate the language processing algorithms\xa0\xa0', 'Experience with libraries and tools like Tensor Flow,\xa0PyTorch, Theano,\xa0Keras, and CUDA\xa0', 'YOUR SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE', 'Washington\xa0–\xa0D.C.\xa0', 'Please register your interest by sending your résumé to\u202fSam Agre via the Apply link on this page.\xa0', 'You will have the opportunity to work with extremely diverse and entirely unique medical image and healthcare datasets that extend to all phases of care delivery from the perspective of all key stakeholders (patients, providers, payers).\xa0', 'YOUR SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE\xa0', '$130,000 - $175,000\xa0', 'Applied programming experience in Python, C, and/or C++\xa0', 'AI\xa0Scientist - Deep Learning for Natural Language Processing\xa0', 'AI\xa0Scientist - Deep Learning for Natural Language Processing', 'As an AI Scientist, you’ll find yourself working closed with some of the best Data Scientists and Engineers in New York\xa0in one of the world’s most innovative medical tech startups. The company applies advanced machine learning models to all types of imaging and has had unprecedented success in this space.\xa0They have seen great success increasing accuracy of medical images as well as vastly increasing diagnoses time, decreasing costs on both the patient and clinician side.\xa0', 'This is an opportunity for a top of the line NLP specialist to cut their teeth into some of the toughest and most creative problems Data Science can throw at them. This company specializes in the medical imaging\xa0sector\xa0and is looking for an extremely talented NLP expert to work across a wide variety of cutting-edge projects. If you are looking for a real challenge to take your skills to the next level and work in one of the most advanced Data Science teams in the industry – this is the role for you.\xa0\xa0', 'HOW TO APPLY\xa0', 'THE ROLE\xa0', 'You will work with a growing multidisciplinary team of talented data scientists, statisticians, engineers, and researchers to leverage unique healthcare data\xa0\xa0You will have the opportunity to work with extremely diverse and entirely unique medical image and healthcare datasets that extend to all phases of care delivery from the perspective of all key stakeholders (patients, providers, payers).\xa0Responsibilities will include helping to execute the company’s AI strategy in the area of language understanding, as well as to further create, extend, and validate the language processing algorithms\xa0\xa0', 'Strong deep learning background and familiarity with state-of-the-art NLP techniques (BERT, XLM,\xa0XLNet)\xa0', 'You will work with a growing multidisciplinary team of talented data scientists, statisticians, engineers, and researchers to leverage unique healthcare data\xa0\xa0', 'THE BENEFITS', 'THE COMPANY\xa0', 'A competitive base salary of $130,000 - $175,000 + stock options and top of the line benefits\xa0\xa0']

job_title: Data Scientist, ML Evaluation - McD Tech Labs
job_text: ['', 'Experience in developing state-of-the-art data science techniques for large-scale machine learning products ', 'Minimum of 5 years of experience in data science with proven experience leading a team of Data Scientists 3+ years of Python experience working with big-data Strong understanding of high-performance algorithms, and data mining Experience in developing state-of-the-art data science techniques for large-scale machine learning products Strong understanding of ML data pipelines, from defining, collecting to crafting ground truth and training/testing data sets for ML models ', 'Work with teams of data scientists in the ML evaluation work of our AI Drive Through Product ', 'Employ data mining and statistical techniques to tackle diverse and large-scale ML data challenges. ', '3+ years of Python experience working with big-data ', 'Responsibilities', 'Collaborate with technology, engineering, and other data science team leaders to define success of machine learning software development lifecycle. ', 'Create and own overall ML model and system evaluation datasets, methodology, process and frameworks ', 'Strong understanding of high-performance algorithms, and data mining ', 'Company Description', 'Provide cross-functional teams and leadership with regular updates and strategic guidance regarding ML model quality through evaluation test framework ', 'Job Description</strongMcD Tech Labs is the recently established Silicon Valley based technology development group within McDonald’s Corporation. Our mission is to deliver advanced technology solutions that address real-world, data-driven needs in the McDonald’s Restaurant environment. We are focused on using state-of-the-art Machine Learning, AI, and related technologies along with McDonald’s unparalleled scale to completely transform the customer experience!We are currently looking for a talented data scientist to work with technology, engineering, and other data scientists to define success of machine learning software and help establish our ML evaluation team at McD Tech Labs. You will be tasked with defining how we evaluate quality of our machine learning algorithms and models that operate with petabyte-scale worth of customer interaction data. What evaluation data sets make sense? How do we craft and curate such data sets? What data mining techniques and systems are necessary to identify such data across diverse regions and stores worldwide?The ideal candidate will have previous experience using advanced analytics techniques and creating ML models to tackle diverse and large-scale ML data challenges.ResponsibilitiesWork with teams of data scientists in the ML evaluation work of our AI Drive Through Product Collaborate with technology, engineering, and other data science team leaders to define success of machine learning software development lifecycle. Create and own overall ML model and system evaluation datasets, methodology, process and frameworks Craft test cases and regressions suites for ML models operating at petabyte scale. Employ data mining and statistical techniques to tackle diverse and large-scale ML data challenges. Provide cross-functional teams and leadership with regular updates and strategic guidance regarding ML model quality through evaluation test framework Qualifications</strongMaster’s or PhD Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related quantitative field Minimum of 5 years of experience in data science with proven experience leading a team of Data Scientists 3+ years of Python experience working with big-data Strong understanding of high-performance algorithms, and data mining Experience in developing state-of-the-art data science techniques for large-scale machine learning products Strong understanding of ML data pipelines, from defining, collecting to crafting ground truth and training/testing data sets for ML models Demonstrated ability to facilitate and coordinate complex data design and development activities across teams in agile sprints with minimal direction Additional Information</strongAll your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.', 'Qualifications</strongMaster’s or PhD Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related quantitative field Minimum of 5 years of experience in data science with proven experience leading a team of Data Scientists 3+ years of Python experience working with big-data Strong understanding of high-performance algorithms, and data mining Experience in developing state-of-the-art data science techniques for large-scale machine learning products Strong understanding of ML data pipelines, from defining, collecting to crafting ground truth and training/testing data sets for ML models Demonstrated ability to facilitate and coordinate complex data design and development activities across teams in agile sprints with minimal direction Additional Information</strongAll your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.', 'Craft test cases and regressions suites for ML models operating at petabyte scale. ', 'Additional Information</strongAll your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.', 'Demonstrated ability to facilitate and coordinate complex data design and development activities across teams in agile sprints with minimal direction ', 'Master’s or PhD Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related quantitative field ', 'Work with teams of data scientists in the ML evaluation work of our AI Drive Through Product Collaborate with technology, engineering, and other data science team leaders to define success of machine learning software development lifecycle. Create and own overall ML model and system evaluation datasets, methodology, process and frameworks Craft test cases and regressions suites for ML models operating at petabyte scale. Employ data mining and statistical techniques to tackle diverse and large-scale ML data challenges. ', 'Minimum of 5 years of experience in data science with proven experience leading a team of Data Scientists ', 'Strong understanding of ML data pipelines, from defining, collecting to crafting ground truth and training/testing data sets for ML models ']

['', 'We are seeking a Head of Data Science that will be at the center of what determines the success of our client. You will analyze the data and develop production code using the newest Data Science and Machine Learning techniques to determine the optimal prices and promotions for major product manufacturers and retailers that sell these products.', 'Deep experience with Python (NumPy & Pandas).Deep experience with A/B testing and Design of Experiments.Fluency with econometrics & causal inference, pricing, demand modeling.Expert knowledge in Statistics and Modeling', 'Location: ', '• Partner with the Engineering team to create highly scalable solutions.', 'Palo Alto, CA', '• Develop Optimization and Experiment Design systems, which determine the best prices to set for each product in each store each week. Finding a good balance on the exploration-exploitation tradeoff will be important.', '• Lead custom analyses and connect them to actionable Business and Product insights.', 'Deep experience with Python (NumPy & Pandas).', '\ufeff', '• Work with Product Management to generate ideas and quickly turn them into efficient, well-tested, functioning code (we mostly use Python).', '• Design and run pricing experiments across hundreds of stores and tens of thousands of products.', '100% remote, full-time, base + options, Series B start-up. Must be in the PST timezone. ', '• Serve as Data Science expert both within our company and for our clients.', '• Build Statistical and Machine Learning models that describe the impact of prices and promotions on shopper behavior, including behavioral pricing effects. You’ll need to find a middle ground between using flexible modern AI methods and proven classical methods.', '• Research, implement, and modify modern Data Science techniques.', 'Fluency with econometrics & causal inference, pricing, demand modeling.', 'Deep experience with A/B testing and Design of Experiments.', 'Expert knowledge in Statistics and Modeling', '• Create model validation methods to make sure that our models are accurate and to quantify the impact of our solutions on the clients’ bottom line.', 'Impact You Will Make In The Role (Responsibilities)', 'You will mentor a team of 3.', 'Details:', 'Top Skills: ', 'More specifically:', '• Help prioritize new feature development by assessing potential impact.']

job_title: Quantitative researcher for leading hedge fund
job_text: ['', 'Machine learning experience is a plus.', 'Responsibilities', 'Evaluate financial data vendors; evaluate and work with new data sources and analytics packages in developing investment strategies.\xa0', 'Masters/PhD in a quantitative discipline from a top-tier university.', 'Masters/PhD in a quantitative discipline from a top-tier university.2+ years of experience in systematic trading.Excellent coding skills in Python and C++.Machine learning experience is a plus.', 'Qualifications', 'Work closely with traders to interpret valuations and develop next generation models and analytics', 'You would be working on challenging problems, alongside some of the brightest minds in finance, in a genuinely meritocratic environment. ', 'Conceptualize valuation strategies, develop and continuously improve upon mathematical models and help translate algorithms into code.', 'Develop core algorithms and models leading directly to trading decisions.', '\xa0', '2+ years of experience in systematic trading.', 'Conceptualize valuation strategies, develop and continuously improve upon mathematical models and help translate algorithms into code.Develop core algorithms and models leading directly to trading decisions.Work closely with traders to interpret valuations and develop next generation models and analyticsEvaluate financial data vendors; evaluate and work with new data sources and analytics packages in developing investment strategies.\xa0', 'A world leading hedge fund are looking to expand by hiring experienced researchers to join their trading teams in Chicago. You would be in a small group of researchers sitting under an experienced PM focusing on alpha research. ', 'Excellent coding skills in Python and C++.']

job_title: Data Scientist - Marcus by Goldman Sachs Decision and Lending
job_text: ['', 'About Goldman Sachs', ' Participate in data architecture decisions and partner with technology teams to implement models/algorithms in production ', ' Rapidly prototype early-stage solutions and design / evaluate predictive models and advanced algorithms to drive business decisions throughout the customer lifecycle (prospecting, acquisition, underwriting, collections, enhancing customer experience) ', ' Carry out data processing including statistical analysis, variable selection, and dimensionality reduction, custom attribute engineering, as well as the evaluation of new data sources ', ' Rapidly prototype early-stage solutions and design / evaluate predictive models and advanced algorithms to drive business decisions throughout the customer lifecycle (prospecting, acquisition, underwriting, collections, enhancing customer experience)  Understand the systems and the business processes that populate those systems with data  Carry out data processing including statistical analysis, variable selection, and dimensionality reduction, custom attribute engineering, as well as the evaluation of new data sources  Leverage methods from diverse disciplines such as traditional modeling, machine learning, deep learning, artificial intelligence, statistical modelling, information theory, information retrieval and other areas to gain customer insights, draw conclusions and work with business partners to put those insights into action  Participate in data architecture decisions and partner with technology teams to implement models/algorithms in production  Help document your assumptions and methodologies, as well as carry out validation and testing to facilitate peer reviews and independent model validation  Think strategically on a higher level, proposing new business metrics or suggesting alternatives, creating highly interpretive models that imply new context and new semantics for data ', 'This Role Entails', ' BS/MS or PhD in a quantitative field - Applied Mathematics, Physics, Engineering, Computer Science, Statistics, Econometrics and other quantitative fields  0-5 years of prior modeling/data science experience is required preferably in credit risk, marketing response modeling and forecasting.  Strong programming background in compiled or scripting languages (C/C++, Python, R, Java, etc.) as well as experience querying database using SQL  Ability to explain complex models and analysis to diverse audience in a layman intuitive way ', ' Help document your assumptions and methodologies, as well as carry out validation and testing to facilitate peer reviews and independent model validation ', 'Basic Qualifications', ' Understand the systems and the business processes that populate those systems with data ', ' Familiarity with advanced ML models - neural networks (feed forward, CNNs, RNNs, LSTM), Hidden Markov Models, random forests, SVMs, multivariate analysis, clustering, dimensionality reduction or participation in Kaggle data science competitions ', ' GS.com/careers ', ' https:// www.goldmansachs.com/careers/footer/disability-statement.html ', ' RESPONSIBILITIES AND QUALIFICATIONS ', ' Leverage methods from diverse disciplines such as traditional modeling, machine learning, deep learning, artificial intelligence, statistical modelling, information theory, information retrieval and other areas to gain customer insights, draw conclusions and work with business partners to put those insights into action ', ' Experience with distributed computing (Hadoop and/or Spark) ', ' Ability to explain complex models and analysis to diverse audience in a layman intuitive way ', ' 0-5 years of prior modeling/data science experience is required preferably in credit risk, marketing response modeling and forecasting. ', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' Strong programming background in compiled or scripting languages (C/C++, Python, R, Java, etc.) as well as experience querying database using SQL ', ' Think strategically on a higher level, proposing new business metrics or suggesting alternatives, creating highly interpretive models that imply new context and new semantics for data ', ' Familiarity with advanced ML models - neural networks (feed forward, CNNs, RNNs, LSTM), Hidden Markov Models, random forests, SVMs, multivariate analysis, clustering, dimensionality reduction or participation in Kaggle data science competitions  Experience with distributed computing (Hadoop and/or Spark) ', ' BS/MS or PhD in a quantitative field - Applied Mathematics, Physics, Engineering, Computer Science, Statistics, Econometrics and other quantitative fields ', 'CONSUMER ( MARCUS BY GOLDMAN SACHS ) ', 'Job Summary & Responsibilities']

['', 'Experience working with qRT-PCR assay is desired', 'Experience with protein biochemistry including purification and immunoassay is preferred', 'Demonstrated hands-on experience in general molecular biology involving isolation, manipulation, and characterization of DNA and RNA from tissue samples\xa0', 'May train and oversee the work of lab technicians, providing ongoing coaching, guidance and feedback to ensure technicians are successful in their work, as well as have the necessary and timely access to information and other resources.', 'Design and conduct molecular and biochemical assays and screening systems for discovery of genes and enzymes to enhance carbon condensation, assimilation, and retainment in transgenic trees', 'Demonstrated ability to plan experiments, analyze data sets, interpret results, trouble-shoot experiments, prepare reports, and present results', 'If you believe that climate change is the defining global emergency of the century and want to join an ambitious project that’s working on a biological solution, we’d love to hear from you.', 'Perform extraction, purification, and quantitation of DNA, RNA, and protein from transgenic plant tissue samples', 'Maintain up-to-date knowledge in molecular biology and biochemistry and proactively propose and implement application of new technologies and ideas to improve the workflow and to speed up the project goals', 'Keep a detailed record of experimental data and analysis. Summarize project progress in written reports and present during team meetings. Timely communication of project progress to the leadership team. Participate in scheduling and forecasting meetings, be flexible, be able to handle multiple projects and help drive key decisions with solid data and scientific leadership.', 'Responsibilities:', 'MS/Ph.D in Molecular Biology, Biology, Biochemistry or related field', 'We believe the best solutions to climate change are created by diverse teams. Living Carbon is focused on building a multicultural and inclusive team with strong representation from the many diverse communities disproportionately impacted by climate change. As a public benefit corporation, ensuring solutions to slow climate change are widely distributed to all peoples is critical to the success of our mission.\xa0\xa0', 'Develop and optimize molecular assays in the area of molecular biology and biochemistry including but not limited to PCR, qRT-PCR, Western blot, Mass Spec', 'Author assay protocols, SOPs, work instructions and other documents as needed', 'Design and make plant expression vectors to optimize transgene gene expression for the ultimate goal of improving trait performances', 'We’re looking for someone who’s excited to be part of a mission-driven early stage company. As our Research Scientist, you will play an essential role in planning and executing molecular biology experiments to help meet the company goals. A successful candidate will have experience with molecular biology, cloning, and molecular assay technologies, and a strong working knowledge of plants. You will also have the opportunity to contribute to the company’s strategic goals and think creatively about how to move quickly and solve problems.\xa0', 'Expertise working with complex protocols, making reagents is desired', 'Experience with protein engineering is a plus', 'MS/Ph.D in Molecular Biology, Biology, Biochemistry or related fieldDemonstrated hands-on experience in general molecular biology involving isolation, manipulation, and characterization of DNA and RNA from tissue samples\xa0Experience working with qRT-PCR assay is desiredHands-on expertise in molecular cloning and sequencing (Sanger and NGS) is desirableExperience with bioinformatic tools for DNA and protein sequence analysis is highly desirableExperience with protein biochemistry including purification and immunoassay is preferredExperience with protein engineering is a plusExpertise working with complex protocols, making reagents is desiredDemonstrated ability to plan experiments, analyze data sets, interpret results, trouble-shoot experiments, prepare reports, and present results', 'Your role:', 'Experience with bioinformatic tools for DNA and protein sequence analysis is highly desirable', 'Living Carbon is a pre-launch public benefit corporation with a mission to fight climate change by enhancing CO2 capture and storage in trees. We believe that gigaton scale CO2 drawdown will only happen if solutions are both environmentally beneficial and profitable to landowners. We’re working with some of the largest timber companies in the US and well-known reforestation projects to develop a proof of concept. We’re backed by some of the most prominent investors in Silicon Valley including, YCombinator, Sam Altman, and Chris Sacca of LowerCarbon Capital.\xa0', 'Hands-on expertise in molecular cloning and sequencing (Sanger and NGS) is desirable', 'Your Previous Experience:', 'Living Carbon PBC offers competitive compensation, and generous healthcare, dental and vision insurance.\xa0', 'Lead the hands-on execution of molecular characterization of transgenic materials', 'Lead the hands-on execution of molecular characterization of transgenic materialsPerform extraction, purification, and quantitation of DNA, RNA, and protein from transgenic plant tissue samplesDevelop and optimize molecular assays in the area of molecular biology and biochemistry including but not limited to PCR, qRT-PCR, Western blot, Mass SpecDesign and make plant expression vectors to optimize transgene gene expression for the ultimate goal of improving trait performancesDesign and conduct molecular and biochemical assays and screening systems for discovery of genes and enzymes to enhance carbon condensation, assimilation, and retainment in transgenic treesMaintain up-to-date knowledge in molecular biology and biochemistry and proactively propose and implement application of new technologies and ideas to improve the workflow and to speed up the project goalsAuthor assay protocols, SOPs, work instructions and other documents as neededKeep a detailed record of experimental data and analysis. Summarize project progress in written reports and present during team meetings. Timely communication of project progress to the leadership team. Participate in scheduling and forecasting meetings, be flexible, be able to handle multiple projects and help drive key decisions with solid data and scientific leadership.May train and oversee the work of lab technicians, providing ongoing coaching, guidance and feedback to ensure technicians are successful in their work, as well as have the necessary and timely access to information and other resources.', 'Living Carbon PBC is an equal opportunity employer.\xa0']

Like our scrubs', 'Communicate and present complex quantitative analyses in a clear, precise, and actionable manner to diverse audiences ', 'Time-Series / Forecasting Algorithms (ARIMA, LSTM, Prophet) ', ' Requires a master’s degree in an advanced discipline (Economics, Social Sciences, and other Science backgrounds) or relevant work experience  Strong knowledge of SQL in OLAP Data Stores  Knowledge in one or more of the following languages: Python, Scala, R  Experience with Machine Learning frameworks (Scikit-learn, Tensorflow)  Strong knowledge with NLP and working with unstructured data (NLTK, Spacy, GENSIM, BERT, etc.)  Remote work is an option under the right circumstances.  ', 'What You’ll Do', 'Positive attitude ', 'Experience with Ecommerce Data ', 'Qualifications', 'Bonus Points For', 'A Little Bit About Us…', 'Strong knowledge of SQL in OLAP Data Stores ', 'Work with diverse team members to design and execute controlled experiments to quantify the effects of product changes. Analyze and interpret the results. ', ' Perform exploratory data analysis to understand customer behavior and identify opportunities for improving our customer experience  Leverage deep understanding of modern machine learning techniques and their mathematical underpinning to regularly invent new and novel approaches to solve problems Work with diverse team members to design and execute controlled experiments to quantify the effects of product changes. Analyze and interpret the results.  Manipulate, analyze, and parameterize complex, high-volume, high dimensionality data from both structured and unstructured sources  Communicate and present complex quantitative analyses in a clear, precise, and actionable manner to diverse audiences  Mentor interns and entry level data scientists  Qualifications Requires a master’s degree in an advanced discipline (Economics, Social Sciences, and other Science backgrounds) or relevant work experience  Strong knowledge of SQL in OLAP Data Stores  Knowledge in one or more of the following languages: Python, Scala, R  Experience with Machine Learning frameworks (Scikit-learn, Tensorflow)  Strong knowledge with NLP and working with unstructured data (NLTK, Spacy, GENSIM, BERT, etc.)  Remote work is an option under the right circumstances.  Bonus Points For Time-Series / Forecasting Algorithms (ARIMA, LSTM, Prophet)  Experience with Ecommerce Data  Familiarity with Devops and Model Deployment Other Must Haves Positive attitude  Entrepreneurial mindset  Desire to excel and grow with FIGS - 100% Awesome. Like our scrubs A Little Bit About Us…The $60 billion medical apparel industry is antiquated, highly fragmented and, until FIGS, was driven solely by low-cost providers offering a limited selection of poor quality products sold through third party distributors. FIGS is revolutionizing the medical apparel industry by creating the highest quality medical apparel in the world and by selling directly to medical professionals through our branded ecommerce site.FIGS’ foundation is built on product quality, and we have a relentless focus on three key areas: fabric, fit and function. We developed our proprietary, performance-oriented fabric technology to meet the demands of the medical profession. FIGS’ Technical Collection fabric is antimicrobial, wrinkle resistant, stain and liquid repellant, moisture-wicking, odor proof, lightweight, breathable and offers four-way stretch. Our designs are tailored, sophisticated and innovative, incorporating features such as yoga waistbands, smart storage (pockets, zippers, hidden pockets) and inspirational sayings inside each garment that appeal to modern healthcare professionals.By offering a branded and customer-centric online shopping experience, we are changing how medical professionals buy their workwear. Through our website, social media, and participation in medical conferences and events, we have built a strong following within the medical community and a meaningful connection with our customers, which allows us to understand their needs and to ensure that FIGS is continuously improving and innovating.FIGS’ Threads for Threads initiative is central to our mission. FIGS has donated hundreds of thousands of scrubs to healthcare providers in need in over 35 countries.', 'Other Must Haves', 'Knowledge in one or more of the following languages: Python, Scala, R ', 'Experience with Machine Learning frameworks (Scikit-learn, Tensorflow) ', 'Strong knowledge with NLP and working with unstructured data (NLTK, Spacy, GENSIM, BERT, etc.) ', ' Positive attitude  Entrepreneurial mindset  Desire to excel and grow with FIGS - 100% Awesome. Like our scrubs ', 'Manipulate, analyze, and parameterize complex, high-volume, high dimensionality data from both structured and unstructured sources ', 'Requires a master’s degree in an advanced discipline (Economics, Social Sciences, and other Science backgrounds) or relevant work experience ', ' Time-Series / Forecasting Algorithms (ARIMA, LSTM, Prophet)  Experience with Ecommerce Data  Familiarity with Devops and Model Deployment ', 'Leverage deep understanding of modern machine learning techniques and their mathematical underpinning to regularly invent new and novel approaches to solve problems ', 'Entrepreneurial mindset ', 'Perform exploratory data analysis to understand customer behavior and identify opportunities for improving our customer experience ', 'Mentor interns and entry level data scientists ', 'Familiarity with Devops and Model Deployment', 'Remote work is an option under the right circumstances. ']
