['', 'Expertise in single cell transcriptome analysis using bioinformatics tools such as Seurat, Monocle and relevant 10XGenomics data analysis tools.', 'Hands on experience with organoid models, high content imaging or cell based assays for drug discovery screening.', 'Predictive Biology is a small research stage company developing novel stem cell technologies for uncovering the genetic basis of variable drug response in 2D and 3D in vitro models and tissues. Current projects include cell based assays for edema using novel readouts, high content imaging assays for neurotoxicity in single and mixed cell models, and single cell RNAseq with brain organoid models of major neurological disorders.', 'This is a bench scientist position. The research culture at Predictive is fast-moving and highly investigator driven, suitable for highly motivated, highly creative and analytical laboratory scientists that can conduct multiple concurrent projects effectively and efficiently.', 'Job Requirements:', 'The following attributes are desirable to highly desirable. Please note any that apply in your cover letter or CV.', 'The applicant must be able to work in the US. We do not sponsor H-1B visas.', 'To apply, please submit a CV and cover letter. Applicants that reside in the San Diego area are preferred.', 'Single cell multiomics measures multiple properties of individual cells at genome scale. We are seeking a Scientist or Sr. Scientist to work within a team conducting single cell multiomics studies, initially using spatial transcriptomic and droplet based single cell gene expression technologies. Projects may also incorporate high content imaging data, FACS data and multiplex immunohistological data.', 'Must be a highly driven self-directed independent research scientist able to develop new ideas and successfully manage research projects', 'We offer a competitive salary and benefits including a health insurance plan, 401K plan with company match, and stock options.', 'Must be able to work well within a group, and able to meet time and performance goals of the team.', 'The successful applicant will bring subject matter and bench level expertise to design, execute and interpret single cell experiments for Predictive’s internal projects as well as projects for Three Dimension Genomics, our sister Contract Research Organization company.', 'Must be an MD or PhD in a biomedical field with significant research laboratory experience.', 'Expertise in complex trait genetics and statistical modeling of genetic data.', 'Expertise in single cell transcriptome analysis using bioinformatics tools such as Seurat, Monocle and relevant 10XGenomics data analysis tools.Expertise in a neurosciences field such as neurogenetics, neuropharmacology, CNS developmental biology.Expertise in complex trait genetics and statistical modeling of genetic data.Hands on experience with organoid models, high content imaging or cell based assays for drug discovery screening.', 'Must be a highly driven self-directed independent research scientist able to develop new ideas and successfully manage research projectsMust be an MD or PhD in a biomedical field with significant research laboratory experience.Must be able to work well within a group, and able to meet time and performance goals of the team.Able to clearly and concisely communicate project goals, strategy and progress in project proposals, written reports and verbal presentations, both internally and externally.', 'Job Code: 20-11', 'Expertise in a neurosciences field such as neurogenetics, neuropharmacology, CNS developmental biology.', 'Able to clearly and concisely communicate project goals, strategy and progress in project proposals, written reports and verbal presentations, both internally and externally.', 'Scientist/Sr. Scientist, Single Cell Multiomics']

job_title: Senior Data Scientist (San Jose OR Austin)
job_text: ['At CDK, we pride ourselves on having a diverse workforce. We value and celebrate the uniqueness of individuals and the different perspectives they provide. We offer equal opportunity employment regardless of race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability status, age, marital status, or protected veteran status.', 'Preferred Skills:', 'Expertise with Python, including the data science stack (Pandas, Numpy, Scikit-learn)', 'Expertise using SQL for querying data', 'Experience with NoSQL databases', 'Experience with streaming data and analytics using Kafka, Spark Streaming, or equivalent system', 'The ideal candidate will have a mix of skills including engineering best practices, statistical expertise, and a strong business sense.', 'Comfort with ambiguity and ability to act under uncertainty', 'Proficient using Docker to deploy machine learning solutions', "Bachelor's degree in a quantitative field3-5 years of experience as a data scientistExpertise with Python, including the data science stack (Pandas, Numpy, Scikit-learn)Background in a variety of modeling techniques including recommendation systems, neural networks, XGBoost, NLP, and time-series forecasting. Expertise using SQL for querying dataCloud experience, AWS preferredProficient using Docker to deploy machine learning solutionsExperience exposing data science solutions as REST APIs and Batch processesFamiliar with big data technologies: Hadoop, Spark, and HiveExperience with version control systems, CI/CD pipelines, and Agile workflowAbility to take ill-defined business problems and translate them into actionable plansComfort with ambiguity and ability to act under uncertaintyAbility to communicate with engineers, data scientists, and nontechnical audiences", 'Graduate degree in a quantitative fieldExperience with NoSQL databasesExperience with streaming data and analytics using Kafka, Spark Streaming, or equivalent system', 'Ability to communicate with engineers, data scientists, and nontechnical audiences', 'Required Skills and Experience:', 'Graduate degree in a quantitative field', 'Description and Responsibilities:', 'If you’re ready for high-impact, you’re ready for CDK.', 'Join Our Team', '3-5 years of experience as a data scientist', 'Background in a variety of modeling techniques including recommendation systems, neural networks, XGBoost, NLP, and time-series forecasting. ', 'Familiar with big data technologies: Hadoop, Spark, and Hive', 'We are looking for a motivated and experienced data scientist to join our R&D organization. Our Data Science team in R&D works to incorporate advanced analytics into the automotive industry. The ideal candidate will have a mix of skills including engineering best practices, statistical expertise, and a strong business sense. Your work could vary from building a recommendation model that finds someone the perfect vehicle, to identifying which parts on a vehicle are likely to fail and when. This is a full stack data science role, and your responsibilities will extend beyond modeling to the entire data science pipeline, such as performing exploratory analysis, building pipelines to transform data, and providing summary results to business leaders. Engineering skills are crucial to this role as our team is responsible for building our models, deploying them into production, and monitoring them once deployed. Our data science efforts are still in their early stages, so you will play a critical role designing our analytics science infrastructure. You will need to take initiative, and be capable of finding solutions where there is no clear path forward. ', 'CDK Global knows you have passions outside of work.  You have family, friends, sporting events, and lots of things going on.   That’s why we offer a comprehensive benefits package to not only take care of you but your family as well.   All of our benefits are effective the first day of employment including 401K matching, paid time off to re-energize, donate your time to volunteer in your community, and tuition reimbursement to name a few.', 'POSITION CAN BE BASED IN SAN JOSE, CA OR AUSTIN, TX', 'Be Part of Something Bigger', 'Engineering skills are crucial to this role as our team is responsible for building our models, deploying them into production, and monitoring them once deployed. ', 'Experience exposing data science solutions as REST APIs and Batch processes', 'Ability to take ill-defined business problems and translate them into actionable plans', 'Experience with version control systems, CI/CD pipelines, and Agile workflow', 'Cloud experience, AWS preferred', 'Power the Possibilities', "Bachelor's degree in a quantitative field", 'Power the PossibilitiesThe CDK Global technology team is looking for collaborative innovators who are passionate about making their mark on emerging enterprise software products. We’re building and developing cloud technology for the automotive retail industrythat will change the landscape for automotive dealers, original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) and the customers they serve.Be Part of Something BiggerEach year, more than three percent of the U.S. gross domestic product (GDP) is attributed to the auto industry, which flows through our customer, the auto dealer. It’s time you joined an evolving marketplace where research and developmentinvestment is measured in the tens of billions. It’s time you were a part of something bigger.We’re expanding our workforce – engineers, architects, developers and more – onboarding early adopters who can optimize, pivot and keep pace with ever-evolving development roadmaps and applications.Join Our TeamGrowth potential, flexibility and material impact on the success and quality of a next-gen, enterprise software product make CDK an excellent choice for those who thrive in challenging, fast-paced engineering environments.The possibilities for impact are endless. We have exceptional opportunities to evolve our industry by driving change through new technology.']

We're looking", 'We’re backed by Blueyard, pharma and biotech angels, families personally affected by rare disease, and other people that truly care about our mission and re-inventing the way rare disease therapies are developed. Our advisors are leaders in the biotech and rare disease community. Although we’re just getting started, we have the resources we need to be bold and take risks while continuously building for the long term.', 'A track record of successfully running a variety of scientific projects in parallel.', 'Experience in clinical research is a plus', 'Build relationships with patient organization leaders', 'Work with a passionate team on shaping the future of the life science field, using technology and new financing models', '3+ years of experience working in rare disease', 'Based in California, we are building this team remote-first – after the pandemic we will offer frequent team off-sites', 'Generous vacation policy', 'Create and evaluate research plans and therapeutic roadmaps', 'Collaborate with various subject matter experts in different therapeutic modalities and across different diseases', '5+ years of experience managing biotech companies, research foundations, pharma, and/or CROs', "Rarebase is a public benefit corporation pioneering a new approach to biotech - partnering with patient organizations to build their therapeutics engine. We're a passionate team focused on pushing the boundaries of translational science to help families and patient communities identify and develop new therapeutics with the highest probability of success. Our north star is to successfully treat one kid.", 'Lead science focused meetings with foundation teams and their network of science advisors', "You'll be responsible for conducting an initial landscape and determining the feasibility of supporting each new disease we may focus on. You will design and articulate a compelling therapeutic vision across a wide range of diseases and share your roadmap directly with the foundations representing this disease. In this highly visible role, you will learn the needs and perspectives of biotech companies and academic researchers, as well as patient organizations who have dedicated their lives to finding treatments for their patient community.", "What you'll bring", 'Overview', "for an experienced pre-clinical researcher who is excited to own the development of new and ongoing therapeutic projects. You'll work closely with a diverse team including patient foundations, scientists, project and product managers, as well as academic collaborators, biotech companies, collaborators, and consultants.", 'An opportunity to work closely with patients and patient research organizations on translational research']

['', 'Location: ', '• Support Research Scientists in documenting protocol and product development activities\xa0', '• Identify opportunities to improve test performance through troubleshooting activities\xa0', 'Research and development experience in a CAP-accredited CLIA laboratory or in a laboratory developing in vitro diagnostic devices\xa0', '• Perform activities in support of the laboratory’s quality assurance plan by adhering to quality control policies and documenting related activities\xa0', 'Job Description\xa0', 'Experience in diagnostics of infectious diseases', '• Support Research Scientists in conducting validation studies for new or revised procedures for laboratory-developed tests\xa0', 'Basic Qualifications', 'About IDbyDNA: Delivering on our promise to identify any microbe, from any sample, anywhere in the world will take a team of dedicated, passionate, and experienced individuals. The members of our team at IDbyDNA have a strong track record of building successful organizations and bring a breadth of multi-disciplinary experience including; microbial genomics, bioinformatics, software engineering, laboratory medicine, and commercialization. In concert with the global community of researchers, clinicians, industry partners and policy makers.\xa0', '• Bachelor of Science in molecular biology or related major, with three or more years of lab experience\xa0', 'We are revolutionizing microbial detection and bringing new solutions to address critical needs in infectious disease.', '• Willing to work flexible hours as needed', 'Master of Science in molecular of biology or biotechnology', '• Ability to perform repetitive motions (e.g. pipetting)\xa0', 'Location: Salt Lake City Metro Area, UT', 'Master of Science in molecular of biology or biotechnologyResearch and development experience in a CAP-accredited CLIA laboratory or in a laboratory developing in vitro diagnostic devices\xa0Experience in diagnostics of infectious diseases', '• Lifting, pulling and/or pushing, and carrying up to 25 pounds', '• Process research samples according to protocols provided by Research Scientists\xa0', '• Support Research Scientists in developing and optimizing new protocols for use in the preparation of diverse sample types for next-generation sequencing\xa0', 'IDbyDNA is seeking a Research Associate who has experience developing and validating protocols in a molecular biology laboratory. Research Associates will be part of a high-performing research and development team focused on developing next-generation sequencing-based diagnostic tests for infectious diseases.\xa0', '• Stress resistant', '• Experience preparing samples for next-generation sequencing\xa0', '• Other duties as assigned\xa0', '• Near vision acuity and depth perception\xa0', 'About IDbyDNA:', 'Research Associate', '• Train new Research Associates as needed\xa0', 'Research Associates will work under the direction of Research Scientists and in compliance with regulatory guidelines and the laboratory quality management system to organize and accession research samples; develop and optimize sample preparation protocols; document studies; and troubleshoot as needed to continuously improve the quality of laboratory protocols and processes.\xa0', 'Preferred Qualifications\xa0', '• Excellent attention to detail']

['', 'Responsibilities/Job Duties', 'Summary', 'Specialized Experience. Specialized experience is experience that equipped the applicant with the particular knowledge, skills, and abilities to perform successfully the duties of the position, and that is typically in or related to the work of the position to be filled.', '11/12/13, you must meet the following:', ' I have a combination of specialized experience as described in above and higher graduate level education as described above that, when combined, equal 100% of the total requirement.', 'GS', "Serves as a health scientist in matters pertaining to the Center's policy needs and activities relating to the regulation and its effect on public health, particularly use and prevention.", 'The position of Health Scientist falls under the 0601 occupational series. To qualify for this position at grade GS-11/12/13, you must meet the following:', 'Provides input to the development of new methods and strategies for obtaining an evaluation of tobacco regulations.', 'Provides scientific support in conducting evaluation and use of evaluation results to inform guidance and policy.', 'GS-12: I have one (1) year of specialized experience equivalent to the GS-11 grade level in the Federal service or public that includes experience: providing scientific analysis and conducting evaluation of tobacco and/or other products, regulations, and/or policies to improve public health; assisting in developing and implementing research projects, scientific surveys, studies and recommending solution based on results.', "The Center for Tobacco Products (CTP) of the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) is responsible for implementing the Family Smoking Prevention and Tobacco Control Act. This law gives FDA authority over tobacco products by adding a new chapter to the Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act. The Tobacco Control Act gives FDA the authority to regulate tobacco products and manufacturers based on the best available science and CTP is responsible for both assessing and fostering that science-base. CTP's actions have significant public health and consumer protection impact, and are among the most important issues faced by the Agency in its long and distinguished history.", 'GS-11: I have one (1) year of specialized experience equivalent to the GS-9 grade level in the Federal service or public that includes experience in assisting in providing scientific support in the evaluation of tobacco and/or other regulated products regulations, portions of studies and projects that involve the design of scientific surveys or studies to improve public health.', ' OR', "Serves as a health scientist in matters pertaining to the Center's policy needs and activities relating to the regulation and its effect on public health, particularly use and prevention.Serves as a health scientist responsible for portions of studies and projects that involve the design of scientific surveys/studies and the identification of inadequacies and inconsistencies in data; ensures reliability and consistency.Provides scientific support in conducting evaluation and use of evaluation results to inform guidance and policy.Provides input to the development of new methods and strategies for obtaining an evaluation of tobacco regulations.", 'Only applications submitted via USAJOBS at the link below along with appropriate supporting documentation, including transcripts, will be considered:', 'Job Vacancy link: https://www.usajobs.gov/GetJob/ViewDetails/587568200\xa0', 'NOTE: Applicants must submit all relevant transcripts that demonstrate you possess the required education to meet the Basic Qualifications.', "Bachelor's or graduate/higher level degree: major study in an academic field related to the medical field, health sciences or allied sciences appropriate to the work of the position. This degree must be from an educational program from an accrediting body recognized by the U.S. Department of Education (external link) at the time the degree was obtained.", ' I have 3 years of progressively higher level graduate education leading to a Ph.D. degree in related field or Ph.D. or equivalent doctoral degree in related field.', 'OR', '\ufeffMinimum Qualifications', 'Health Scientist GS-0601-11/12', 'For further consideration for the Health Scientist, GS-0601-11/12, in addition to the basic education requirement listed above, you must meet the following minimum qualification requirement(s):', 'For further consideration for the Health Scientist, ', 'The position of Health Scientist falls under the 0601 occupational series. To qualify for this position at grade GS', '0601-11/12', '*Open/Close Date:12/22/2020—12/28/2020', 'Basic Requirements', 'Serves as a health scientist responsible for portions of studies and projects that involve the design of scientific surveys/studies and the identification of inadequacies and inconsistencies in data; ensures reliability and consistency.', 'This Direct-Hire position is in the Food and Drug Administration and is located in the Center for Tobacco Products (CTP), Office of the Science (OS), Division of Individual Health Science (DIHS), located in Beltsville, Maryland.']

["Colorado Springs, CO 80840 US (Primary)Job DescriptionA 100 percent employee owned growing small business, Torch Technologies,Inc., provides quality technical services at competitive costs, all whilemaintaining ethical business practices. We are leaders in research,development, engineering, planning, execution, performance analysis,design, and reporting in the following areas: research and development;system engineering; modeling and simulation; test and evaluation;advanced technologies; manned and unmanned aircraft systems; informationassurance; computer network defense; and information technology.Job Description:The selected applicant will serve as the Data Engineer for an integratedcontractor team, supporting high-fidelity/high-resolution modeling of theBallistic Missile Defense System (BMDS) in a virtualized,high-performance, high-capacity environment to provide Modeling andSimulation as a Service (MSaaS). The qualified candidate will beresponsible for supporting the Integration, Test and Verification oflarge-scale data storage environments to support the Missile DefenseAgency's digital modeling/simulation programs. This includes working withmany of the following technologies: data pipelines, data services,operational data stores, data warehouses, data marts, big data stores,data mining, big data visualization and experiment designs. The rightindividual will display both a passion for data science and leading a culturalchange in how data is used throughout the organization regarding theseefforts.Job RequirementsPrimary Duties and ['', 'Description:', 'Knowledge of the principles and practices pertaining to the assigned department Knowledge of administrative, financial, and business management principles and practices', 'Performs data analysis, to understand current performance, analyze trends, and to make recommendations for future project performance related to advanced analytic methods and technology. Develops measurements and metrics for data analysis to be used for business decision-making, planning, and process improvement. Securely collects, cleanses, standardize, transforms and stores data from various sources ensuring data integrity. Directs the collection of supplier data (e.g. industry trends, supplier performance and cost dynamics); prepares supplier reviews. Uses predictive modeling, statistics, trend analysis and other data analysis techniques to collect, explore, and identify the right data to be analyzed from internal and external sources. In collaboration with other data scientists in the Institute, creates and maintains statistical reporting tools to support the specific discipline. Responsible for regularly auditing data input; audits may involve studying number, organization practices and customer feedback. Prepares or coordinates preparation of reports; analyzes and interprets statistics, financial data, and management planning data for predicting resource needs and developing long range plans. Prepares presentations to stakeholders and university administration. Conducts and assists with the development of long-and short-range goals. Represents the department/college and serves on various department and university committees. Maintains broad awareness of current trends in data collection and organization, data preservation, and numeric data analysis by participation in appropriate professional activities and contributing to research in the field.\xa0Will implement procedures and technologies that assure the long-term sustainability and accessibility of datasets. May supervise, monitor or coordinate the activities of subordinates to ensure adherence with stated outcomes, timeframes and standards. Reviews job performance in conjunction with established unit, department and university goals. Utilizes various computer programs and software to perform data computation, statistical analysis and other data manipulation activities. May perform other duties as assigned.', 'Skill and ability to collect, organize, synthesize and analyze data; summarize findings; develop conclusions and recommendations', 'Desired Qualifications, Knowledge, Skills and Abilities:', 'PhD expert in advanced analytic methods and technology as it relates to remote sensor and healthcare data, plus proficiency in Statistics, Computer Information Systems, Business Information or a related field and five (5) years of related administrative/data analysis experience which includes one (1) year of supervisory experience, OR, any equivalent combination of experience and/or education from which comparable knowledge, skills and abilities have been achieved. Must have the experience and ability to manage collaborations with scientists and companies developing advanced analytic tools for healthcare.', 'Minimum Qualifications:', 'Knowledge of data management and information technologies', '\xa0Knowledge of computing and data analysis', 'Such datasets could include remote sensing technology, genomic information, electronic health records and imaging technologies.', 'Working Environment:', 'Essential Duties:', 'Application Instructions', 'Under senior administrative direction of the Deputy Director the Lead Analyst Data Science will be responsible for managing, planning, supporting and preparing data analysis and reports focused on the focus topic assigned. The data generated will be used for business decision-making, strategic planning, and process improvement to support the growth of the ASU-UA Collaboration Institute for Future Health (IFH). The area of advanced analytic techniques, including but not limited to program management of artificial intelligence tool development, machine learning methods, neural networks and advanced bioinformatics tool development to support remote sensing capabilities.', 'Ability to accurately and reliably interpret data for determining appropriate action', 'Ability to design, build and maintain databases of information related to the development of advanced analytic tools by external companies and university scientists.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Understands the importance of metadata as it applies to development of advanced analysis methods and technology.', 'Activities are performed in an environmentally controlled office setting subject to extended periods of sitting, keyboarding and manipulating a computer mouse; required to stand for varying lengths of time and walk moderate distances to perform work. Occasional bending, reaching, lifting, pushing and pulling up to 50 pounds. Regular activities require ability to quickly change priorities, which may include and/or are subject to resolution of conflicts. Ability to clearly communicate verbally, read, write, see and hear to perform essential functions.', 'Application deadline is 3:00PM Arizona time on November 30, 2020. Applicants are responsible for including a cover letter, CV, and the names of three professional references in their application through ASU career website. Emailed applications will not be accepted.', 'Knowledge of analysis techniques and reporting strategies', '64136BR 64138BR 64137BR', 'Knowledge of principles and practices pertaining to the development of advanced analysis methods and technology, in particular artificial intelligence, machine learning, neural networks and other advanced bioinformatics analytic tools related to analyzing and integrating a variety of data types for healthcare purposes.Such datasets could include remote sensing technology, genomic information, electronic health records and imaging technologies.Knowledge of analysis techniques and reporting strategies\xa0Knowledge of computing and data analysisKnowledge of data management and information technologiesKnowledge of supervisory principles practices and techniquesKnowledge of the principles of exemplary customer service demonstrated through actively listening, acknowledging, and responding to every inquiry; taking ownership and resolving each concern or problem as appropriate; exhibiting professionalism and expertise in every interaction and engaging in professional development to meet expectations for service excellence. summarize findings; develop conclusions and recommendationsSkill in planning, analyzing, and coordinating activities and establishing prioritiesSkill in managing multiple priorities, adhering to deadlines and allocatingAbility to accurately and reliably interpret data for determining appropriate actionAbility to influence changes in individual, institutional, and/or corporate behaviors to create a more sustainable environmentAbility to effectively communicate results of analysis, novel ideas and project updates to senior management, peers and collaboratorsAbility to design, build and maintain databases of information related to the development of advanced analytic tools by external companies and university scientists.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Understands the importance of metadata as it applies to development of advanced analysis methods and technology.', 'ASU career website', 'Ability to effectively communicate results of analysis, novel ideas and project updates to senior management, peers and collaborators', 'Skill in planning, analyzing, and coordinating activities and establishing priorities', 'Ability to influence changes in individual, institutional, and/or corporate behaviors to create a more sustainable environment', 'Knowledge of principles and practices pertaining to the development of advanced analysis methods and technology, in particular artificial intelligence, machine learning, neural networks and other advanced bioinformatics analytic tools related to analyzing and integrating a variety of data types for healthcare purposes.', 'EOE/AA', 'Skill in managing multiple priorities, adhering to deadlines and allocating', 'Knowledge of principles and practices pertaining to artificial intelligence tool development and machine learning as it applies to the practice of medicine. Ability to evaluate the development of advanced analytic tool technology and to identify analytic tools that have the greatest potential impact on future healthcare. To work with university scientists developing advanced analytic tools to explore new health related applications for analytic methods. Deep knowledge of the artificial intelligence and machine learning industrial research. Knowledge of advanced analytic methods and tools currently available for healthcare applications, methods and tools that are currently available for non-healthcare applications.\xa0', 'Knowledge of the principles of exemplary customer service demonstrated through actively listening, acknowledging, and responding to every inquiry; taking ownership and resolving each concern or problem as appropriate; exhibiting professionalism and expertise in every interaction and engaging in professional development to meet expectations for service excellence. Skill in quantitative data analysis and interpretation.', 'The ASU-UA Collaboration Institute for Future Health (IFH) is seeking to fill three (3) new Lead Analyst Data Science positions for Remote Sensing, Advanced Analytics and Large Scale Biological Datasets.', 'Knowledge of supervisory principles practices and techniques']

['', 'In concert with Fidelity Life, eFinancial is an online and call-center-based insurance agency with a proven direct-to-consumer life insurance model. Using a proprietary and patented sales technology platform, eFinancial operates call centers in Chicago, IL; Seattle, WA; and Tempe, AZ. eFinancial’s licensed agents and representatives reach thousands of consumers each day to help meet their unique life insurance needs – often with just a single phone call. To complement this channel, the company recently expanded to offer an entirely digital purchase experience.', '3+ years of professional data engineer experience working with large data sets and predictive services ', 'Passion for taking ownership of new opportunities and projects.', 'What the job looks like', 'What the job looks like:', '\xa0', 'Assimilate and implement business rules to process raw data. Set up visualization tools to meet the needs of both cloud and on-premise user community.', 'Ability to think strategically to anticipate and plan for future business needs.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Management Information Systems, Physics, or related field is required ', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Management Information Systems, Physics, or related field is required 3+ years of professional data engineer experience working with large data sets and predictive services 3+ years of professional experience working with SQL and Python with working knowledge PySpark.Must have hands-on experience with AWS services: Lambda, Athena, Redshift Spectrum, Glue, S3, EKS, EC2, EMR, Kinesis, and RDS.Knowledge and experience in Big Data and in building Data Pipelines/ETL processes.Ability to think strategically to anticipate and plan for future business needs.Passion for taking ownership of new opportunities and projects.Team Player mentality - you thrive in a collaborative environment.Excellent multi-tasking skills, you are able to shift gears quickly and comfortably. Strong verbal and written communications skills that enable you to explain data infrastructure complexity with clarity and precision to executive management.', 'Fidelity Life is a leading provider of financial security for middle market consumers. With a history of innovation, the company is redefining the life insurance industry with patented products and processes. Fidelity Life pioneered the use of predictive analytics to streamline the new business process and revolutionize the speed with which policies can be issued. Established in 1896, Fidelity Life enjoys a long track-record of success and continues to build its reputation of sound fiscal management and customer-focused innovation. ', 'What you will contribute:', 'eFinancial', '\xa0Nice to have skills and experience:', 'Experience with DevOps and CI/CD preferred.Reporting Systems experience with PowerBI & Tableau Front End Engineering—JavaScript (Angular, React, Vue, Node, etc.), HTML, CSS', 'Reporting Systems experience with PowerBI & Tableau ', 'As a key member of the Big Data Analytics team, you will be responsible for creating and operating the Big Data environment that enables eFinancial and Fidelity Life Association to optimize business processes and grow rapidly. You will move and integrate data across multiple disparate systems, aggregate and organize large sets of data in order to enable lead operations, analytics, and predictive modeling. If you would love being an owner-operator of a fast-growing complex online business with modern technology stacks, building analytical and infrastructure solutions, and driving success via analytics, this role is for you!', 'Knowledge and experience in Big Data and in building Data Pipelines/ETL processes.', 'Team Player mentality - you thrive in a collaborative environment.', 'What you should bring to the table:', 'Own the creation and maintenance of company data structures and databases in AWS to support predictive model development, analytics, and business intelligence.', 'Excellent multi-tasking skills, you are able to shift gears quickly and comfortably. With an integrated marketing, product manufacturing, and controlled distribution system, the enterprise is uniquely positioned for growth.\xa0', 'Serve as data steward for Analytics team and third-party technology partners.', 'Take on specific ETL projects to assimilate data from multiple new structured and unstructured data sources in batch or real-time, as appropriate.', 'Experience with DevOps and CI/CD preferred.', 'Fidelity Life', 'Own the creation and maintenance of company data structures and databases in AWS to support predictive model development, analytics, and business intelligence.Implement, test, document, and deploy integrations and maintain production readiness for cloud-based technology stack including real-time streaming, batch feeds, and predictions models from multiple cloud-based and on-premise sources.Take on specific ETL projects to assimilate data from multiple new structured and unstructured data sources in batch or real-time, as appropriate.Assimilate and implement business rules to process raw data. job_title: AI Research scientist: up to $350,000 base+equity
job_text: ['', 'Job Description:', 'We are a stealth startup building a cutting-edge cloud AI service. Our founders have a wealth of experience working on various ground-breaking products including self driving cars, AWS AI services, GMail, Google Docs and flash storage systems. We have also previously been founders and early employees at startups. We are backed by Eric Schmidt and Decibel Ventures with Series A funding of $18 million.\xa0', 'Responsibilities:', 'Candidates will need to have a PhD preferably in Artificial Intelligence or Machine Learning. We are looking for people who have done research and/or published papers in one of the following areas: Unsupervised Learning; Generative Modeling; Deep Neural Networks; Deep Reinforcement Learning; Generative Adversarial Networks; Causal Reasoning. Ideal candidates would be able to rapidly build on new ideas with engineers, potentially publish at top conferences, and be able to write code.', 'We are looking for talented research scientists to be part of the founding team. You will help build the product that applies unsupervised learning to model the world and automatically creates and manages production grade AI systems. As an initial member of the founding team, you get to own a significant chunk of the company, shape its culture and work on state-of-the-art science and technology.', 'General Requirements:', 'Coming up with new techniques in unsupervised learning, dataset augmentation, and deep reinforcement learning that can be applied to automating various parts of the AI development workflow.']

['', 'Prior Kubernetes, Lambda, Spark Streaming etc.', 'Experience with workload automation tools such as Airflow, Autosys.', '5+ years of experience with data engineering with emphasis on data analytics and reporting', 'Experience developing with scripting languages such as Shell and Python', '5+ years of experience with data engineering with emphasis on data analytics and reportingExperience developing with scripting languages such as Shell and PythonStrong experience developing with PySpark, preferably leveraging AWS EMR managed serviceExpert experience with SQL and Relational database engineering (Oracle, SQL Server, Teradata)— expert-level SQL abilitiesExperience with agile delivery methodologies– Scrum, SAFe, Extreme ProgrammingExperience working with source-code management tools such as GitHub and JenkinsAbility to partner with business and technology team members, to understand business requirements and translate those into value-add technology solutions', 'Experience with agile delivery methodologies– Scrum, SAFe, Extreme Programming', 'Nice to Have:', 'About BICP', 'Experience working with source-code management tools such as GitHub and Jenkins', "BICP, a market leader in BI, Advanced Analytics and Innovation Platforms, is looking to hire two (2) Lead Data Engineers to support new cloud transformation initiatives at our long standing Fortune 100 Retail client in Beaverton, OR. We currently have a team on-site supporting multiple groups with their drive to deploy NextGen platforms and applications capable of powering real time analytics. Ideal candidate will have 3+ years Data Engineering experience in large enterprise environments dealing with massive volumes of data. Consultant will have prior experience supporting cloud based, analytics-driven transformation efforts from legacy to NextGen platforms. Lead Data Engineers will be expected to collaborate closely with leadership to strategize and deploy cutting edge Big Data solutions in adherance to accepted Best Practices and guidelines. Lead DE's must have prior Agile experience and comfortable leading highly technical teams and effectively articulating solutions to non-technical business audiences.", 'Key Skills:', 'BICP is a leading-edge consulting firm focused on delivering innovative and transformative BI&A, Advanced Analytics and Big Data solutions to our customers.\xa0With deep experience across a diverse ecosystem of NextGen platforms, Analytics and Data Science applications we have the required product ambiguity and expertise to deliver truly best in breed solutions customized to our client’s specific business needs.', 'If you’re looking to join an organization where there is tremendous growth opportunity, that operates with transparency and with a highly collaborative approach then BICP could be a great place to accelerate your career. ', 'Ability to partner with business and technology team members, to understand business requirements and translate those into value-add technology solutions', 'Expert experience with SQL and Relational database engineering (Oracle, SQL Server, Teradata)— expert-level SQL abilities', 'Strong experience developing with PySpark, preferably leveraging AWS EMR managed service', 'Prior AWS DevOps knowledge', 'Experience developing solutions in Snowflake', 'Experience developing solutions in SnowflakeExperience with workload automation tools such as Airflow, Autosys.Prior Kubernetes, Lambda, Spark Streaming etc.Prior AWS DevOps knowledge']

Our mission is bold: Organize enterprise data into actionable information that protects and promotes the business growth of multinational companies around the world.\xa0', 'Data creation and synthesis', 'We are looking for fearless innovators who have an insatiable appetite for building what no one has built before.\xa0', 'The Data Operations team is responsible for the creation and management of large datasets that are used by our analysts and engineers to train and test machine learning applications and analytics. Due to their variation and complexity, it is vital that our datasets are named, formatted, structured, stored, categorized and cataloged consistently, enabling rapid, coordinated and effective development of applications across the Data Science functions.\xa0', 'Data creation and synthesisTransformation of unstructured data into standardized formatsIntegration of data from different sources\xa0Anonymization, pseudonymization and removal of PIIClassification and labeling\xa0Storage and version management', 'Good understanding of CI/CD automation tooling (for example, Jenkins, Gitlab/Bitbucket pipelines)\xa0', 'About the company:\xa0', 'About the role:', 'One of our clients is looking to hire a\xa0"Principal Data Engineer" at New York City Metropolitan Area. Please find the job details below-', 'Expertise in python for data analysis and visualization (Jupyter notebooks / Pandas / Matplotlib / Seaborn)', 'A truly global mission with a passionate community in locations all over the world', 'Our approach is unique, and it’s validated by our customers who tell us to keep forging ahead because no one else is aggregating, analyzing, and acting on data to uncover opportunities or solve problems quite the way we are.', 'Storage and version management', 'Expertise working with databases like SQL', 'Anonymization, pseudonymization and removal of PII', 'Integration of data from different sources\xa0', 'Experience with data preparation for machine learning and NLP applications', 'A truly global mission with a passionate community in locations all over the worldHuge impact and learning potential as our aspirations require bold innovationHighly competitive compensation with 100% bonus pay already integratedBenefits include fully covered health coverage for employee and familyGenerous time-off policy and flexible work schedule', "What You'll Bring:", 'Good understanding of Amazon AWS infrastructure including S3 API / CLI\xa0', 'Expertise in python for data analysis and visualization (Jupyter notebooks / Pandas / Matplotlib / Seaborn)Expertise working with databases like SQLExpertise with management and manipulation of very large datasetsGood understanding of Amazon AWS infrastructure including S3 API / CLI\xa0Strong knowledge of GitGood understanding of CI/CD automation tooling (for example, Jenkins, Gitlab/Bitbucket pipelines)\xa0Experience with data preparation for machine learning and NLP applications']

job_title: Senior Data Engineer | AWS, Equities, Fixed Income | Elite Hedge Fund in Boston
job_text: ['', 'Leverage streaming, serverless, and AWS technologies to build a next-gen data platform from scratch', 'Leverage streaming, serverless, and AWS technologies to build a next-gen data platform from scratchHelp lead a massive data migration to AWSGain valuable expertise on investment strategies and multi-asset class trading by working directly with quantitative researchers and portfolio mangers', 'BS or equivalent degree4+ years of hands-on software development or data engineering experienceExpertise with Python,\xa0SQL/NoSQL and Spark or Hadoop', 'Gain valuable expertise on investment strategies and multi-asset class trading by working directly with quantitative researchers and portfolio mangers', 'Extremely competitive employee benefits program, 401K, and compensation package', 'Define the future of high-performance trading systems:\xa0', 'Senior Data Engineer | AWS, Equities, Fixed Income | Elite Hedge Fund in Boston', 'Required Qualifications:\xa0', 'BS or equivalent degree', 'In this role, you will design and build cloud-native data pipelines, lakes, and warehouses to massively increase the scale of data that the quantitative research and trading teams are able to leverage. This team has already identified streaming, serverless, and AWS technologies to build initial POCs, but you will have an opportunity to shape the roadmap for additional cutting-edge solutions. This team will support a multi-asset class strategy with a particular focus on fixed income and equities.', 'One of the best-rated work cultures and work/life balances in the business', 'Exposure to a major AWS offering (Kinesis, Lambda, EMR, Glue, DynamoDB, Elasticsearch Service, Redshift, Athena, QuickSight, etc.)', 'Preferred Qualifications:', 'Extremely competitive employee benefits program, 401K, and compensation packageOne of the best-rated work cultures and work/life balances in the businessCasual dress, collaborative teams, and work from home flexibility', 'Help lead a massive data migration to AWS', "One of the world's most prestigious Hedge Funds is a small, reclusive firm that has been quietly generating more revenue per head than almost any other firm in the industry. They have a rare opportunity for a strong Senior Data Engineer to join the firm, as they begin building out a new cloud team to redefine the scope and performance of their data processing systems. This team will work in a greenfield environment, designing brand new cloud native solutions and migrating data to AWS.", '4+ years of hands-on software development or data engineering experience', 'Expertise with Python,\xa0SQL/NoSQL and Spark or Hadoop', 'Exposure to a major AWS offering (Kinesis, Lambda, EMR, Glue, DynamoDB, Elasticsearch Service, Redshift, Athena, QuickSight, etc.)Experience working in Financial Services, ideally supporting performance sensitive fixed income or equities trading', 'Capitalize on:', 'Experience working in Financial Services, ideally supporting performance sensitive fixed income or equities trading', 'Casual dress, collaborative teams, and work from home flexibility']

Prior experience with Microarray or Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) is a plus  Proven experience in leading projects, teams, and initiatives, delegation of activities and resolving issues as an escalation point  Team player with strong interpersonal skills and the ability to build effective working relationships inside and outside their functional areas  Experience assessing, tracking and fulfilling research customer needs on an operational level in an efficient and timely way with a high degree of customer orientation and ability to communicate with stakeholders on multiple levels. ', ' Team player with strong interpersonal skills and the ability to build effective working relationships inside and outside their functional areas ', ' Additional focus areas of this role might be: ', ' Demonstrated experience in utilizing a variety of analytical platforms and instrumentation (such as liquid handling and automation, automated nucleic acid purification solutions, microarray scanner). Prior experience with Microarray or Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) is a plus ', ' Experience assessing, tracking and fulfilling research customer needs on an operational level in an efficient and timely way with a high degree of customer orientation and ability to communicate with stakeholders on multiple levels. ', ' Computational and analytics ', ' Scientific expertise combined with computational skills in relation to research ', 'Who are we looking for?', ' Proven experience in leading projects, teams, and initiatives, delegation of activities and resolving issues as an escalation point ', 'The Position:', ' Processing and lab techniques ', ' Ability to independently design, execute and analyze complex sets of experiments or procedures and to recommend solutions when facing challenges ', ' Roche is an equal opportunity employer. ']

job_title: Market Researcher Manager / Survey Research Professional
job_text: ['', 'EXPERIENCED MARKET RESEARCH MANAGER', 'Are you interested in marketing and brand strategy? Do you enjoy following new or shifting trends? Would you like to work with some of the biggest brands in the world? If yes, then Wakefield Research is the place for you!', 'You will be part of a dynamic team of analysts and consultants who guide companies and help them grow or overcome market challenges.', 'Strategic thinker and creative problem solverSuperior analytical capabilities; detailed-oriented and comfortable working with numbersInterest in translating numbers into actionable recommendationsEager to learn and enjoy working in a results and client-oriented environmentStrong Microsoft PowerPoint, Word, and Excel experience', 'Is This Job for Me? ', 'Strategic thinker and creative problem solver', 'Manage multiple projects under tight deadlines', 'Direct quantitative research and analysis', 'What Would I Do at Wakefield?', 'Please submit two items in your application: A cover letter and a resume to hiringmanager@wakefieldresearch.com and reference “MARKET RESEARCH MANAGER” in the subject line of your email.', 'The New York Times', 'Qualifications', 'What Is Wakefield Research?', 'Wakefield is a full-service market research firm that specializes in teaching brands how to solve problems and how to grow their business. Wakefield Research is a partner to the world’s leading consumer and B2B brands, including 50 of the Fortune 100. We conduct research in over 90 countries. Our surveys appear daily in top-tier media, such as The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, USA TODAY, NPR and NBC’s “TODAY Show.”', 'Leverage statistical analysis techniques', 'Eager to learn and enjoy working in a results and client-oriented environment', 'Direct quantitative research and analysisDesign, implement, and analyze custom market research studiesCollect and analyze data using basic research techniquesLeverage statistical analysis techniquesManage multiple projects under tight deadlinesWork as part of a diverse team and interact effectively with all levels of management', 'Our ideal candidate has a Bachelor’s degree and 3+ years’ professional experience in market research (preferably supply-side) or a related field.\xa0Other attributes of the successful candidate include:', 'Collect and analyze data using basic research techniques', 'Superior analytical capabilities; detailed-oriented and comfortable working with numbers', 'The Wall Street Journal', 'Strong Microsoft PowerPoint, Word, and Excel experience', 'Design, implement, and analyze custom market research studies', 'We’re seeking a senior-level market research / survey research professionals to support the work of our Insights and Communications divisions and do the following:', 'Candidates will be contacted directly by Wakefield.\xa0Please do not call or e-mail the firm to verify receipt of your materials. A writing test will be administered to candidates selected for in-person interviews. No recruiters please.', 'USA TODAY, NPR', 'For more information about Wakefield Research, visit www.wakefieldresearch.com.', 'Work as part of a diverse team and interact effectively with all levels of management', 'Interest in translating numbers into actionable recommendations']

Partner with stakeholders and BI Analysts to define and build a centralized data repository purpose-built for reporting.  Create and maintain a single source of truth data dictionary. Support and train team members on data architecture and similar concepts. ', 'Bachelor’s degree in engineering, mathematics, computer science, or equivalent data engineering work experience, preferred', 'Streamline ETL’s into coherent views to support effective and consistent reporting to the business.', 'Purpose', 'Reliability', 'The Predictive Index is a place where people with diverse backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives collaborate on amazing, important work. We encourage people from underrepresented backgrounds to apply.', "The Predictive Index participates in E-Verify. ['', 'Collaborate with other researchers, designers, product managers, data scientists, marketing and operations managers, and engineers to ensure research you deliver is coordinated into every aspect of the product and provides a holistic view of our users', 'Experience with mixed-methods research: qualitative and quantitative data collection, analysis and synthesis.', 'Design and conduct quantitative studies, such as structuring and analyzing surveys to evaluate the impact of product changes and capture insights at scale', 'Partner closely with teams to help build a repository of reference knowledge for Zumper.', 'Build insight across the organization to improve the products we build for our renters, landlords, multifamily building, and employees, always a champion for our users', 'Life at Zumper', 'What you will do:', 'Identify and explore new opportunities through creative research methods and co-design sessions to help define product roadmaps, vision, and strategy', 'Zumper HQ is located in the heart of downtown San Francisco, next door to the iconic Transamerica Building. We have offices in Chicago, New York, Providence, and Scottsdale and are lucky to have 200+ team mates across the US.', "Design is a vital organization at Zumper. By radically improving the end-to-end experience for renters, property owners and multifamily buildings, we are creating a simpler way to find your next home. This requires us to think big and to discover and explore uncharted territory. That's why we're focused on building a diverse, and resilient design organization, full of talented people who are gritty, value feedback and love cross-functional collaboration. We're hiring the best Designers & Researchers from around the world, wherever they are.", 'Zumper does not accept unsolicited resumes from staffing vendors, recruitment agencies and/or search firms. Please do not forward resumes to our jobs alias, employees, or any other company location. Any submittals without a prior signed agreement will become property of Zumper.', 'Evangelize and teach research methods to the company, from design and product to sales and success. Convey insights to the Leadership team.', 'Design and conduct qualitative studies, including field observations and interviews, remote and in-person usability studies for existing and future productsDesign and conduct quantitative studies, such as structuring and analyzing surveys to evaluate the impact of product changes and capture insights at scaleIdentify and explore new opportunities through creative research methods and co-design sessions to help define product roadmaps, vision, and strategyCollaborate with other researchers, designers, product managers, data scientists, marketing and operations managers, and engineers to ensure research you deliver is coordinated into every aspect of the product and provides a holistic view of our usersSynthesize and communicate research findings to advise business decisions through rich storytelling via presentations, reports, workshops and any other novel, creative approaches that you inventAdapt and innovate research methods to meet product needs by delivering high-quality insights in a fast-paced work environment, and by contextualizing for specific use cases across products.Build insight across the organization to improve the products we build for our renters, landlords, multifamily building, and employees, always a champion for our usersBe a key voice that represents the people who use Zumper, their needs and desires in design and product conversationsPartner closely with teams to help build a repository of reference knowledge for Zumper.Evangelize and teach research methods to the company, from design and product to sales and success. Convey insights to the Leadership team.', 'We are proud to have won awards from Inc. Magazine (2019 Best Places to Work) and SF Business Times (2020 Best Places to Work and 2019 Bay Area Workplace Wellness Award).\xa0', 'Please note', 'Be a key voice that represents the people who use Zumper, their needs and desires in design and product conversations', 'Excellent narrative-building skills, and the ability to synthesize insights into actionable recommendations', 'Who you are:', 'A desire to do hands-on research on an early-stage team, from planning and execution to Research Coordination', 'We care deeply about diversity. We are fostering an environment that celebrates authenticity and enables you to be your best self. As an equal opportunity employer, we welcome all applicants regardless of gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, religion, marital status, veteran status, age, disability, or race. We are committed to ensuring that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the application or interview process, to perform crucial job functions, and to receive other employee benefits (Please contact us to request accommodations.)', 'Adapt and innovate research methods to meet product needs by delivering high-quality insights in a fast-paced work environment, and by contextualizing for specific use cases across products.', 'Design and conduct qualitative studies, including field observations and interviews, remote and in-person usability studies for existing and future products', 'Experience working with cross-functional teams in a product development environment', 'Masters or PhD in Human-Computer Interaction, Sociology, Psychology, Information Science, Computer Science (or similar), or equivalent experience.', 'Zumper is on a mission to make renting an apartment as easy as booking a hotel. With 80 million annual users across two brands (Zumper and PadMapper), we’ve generated support from top-tier investors and recently raised $60m in Series D funding (of $140m total). We’re searching for passionate, hardworking people to build extraordinary products and redefine the rental industry. Jump aboard our rocket ship!', 'Synthesize and communicate research findings to advise business decisions through rich storytelling via presentations, reports, workshops and any other novel, creative approaches that you invent', 'Experience with mixed-methods research: qualitative and quantitative data collection, analysis and synthesis.Experience working with cross-functional teams in a product development environmentExcellent narrative-building skills, and the ability to synthesize insights into actionable recommendationsA desire to do hands-on research on an early-stage team, from planning and execution to Research CoordinationMasters or PhD in Human-Computer Interaction, Sociology, Psychology, Information Science, Computer Science (or similar), or equivalent experience.']

['', 'The company is offering a competitive salary, plus 401k, health plans, and 75% off meal kits.', 'Please apply if you have 3-5 years of data engineering experience. You should have strong object orientated Python and SQL coding skills plus experience in Spark and AWS. Bonus points if you work with consumer/ marketing data.\xa0', 'Check out\xa0www.bigcloud.io/jobs\xa0to see what else we’re recruiting for.', "I'm hiring for a world-leading meal kit provider that has offices all over the world and delivers meals to millions of people. This is an opportunity to join the company as a senior data engineer in the Boulder Colorado office.\xa0", "Would you like to work for one of the world's fastest-growing food tech brands?\xa0", 'You will be responsible for data modeling, data infrastructure (ETLs on Airflow and DataBricks), data cleaning, data transformation, and building data products to automate the marketing automation flow.\xa0\xa0', 'You will be joining the marketing data insights team. This team builds and maintains best in class automated data platforms to improve user experience and marketing initiatives.', '\xa0\xa0', 'Big Cloud is a machine learning recruiting firm. We’re lucky enough to recruit the best candidates in the most exciting companies all over the world. We try to reply to all applications, but we’re only human, for now! So, you may only hear from us if you are successful.', 'Are you interested in marketing and customer data?\xa0', '\xa0', 'Do you want to work with some of the best datasets in the world?\xa0']

Will present proposals to optimize formula and product flow.\xa0', 'Location: Wilson, NC 27893', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Responsible for identifying potential product/process improvements of existing commercial dosage forms. Will present proposals to optimize formula and product flow.\xa0Will implement changes after management approval.', 'Ø\xa0Equipment malfunction/breakage', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Has a functional understanding of the operation of production equipment involved in the manufacturing process (such as high shear granulators, fluid bed processors, solution prep systems, weighing systems, milling systems, blending systems, tablet compression machines/encapsulators, etc.) following all applicable SOP’s, safety standards and procedures', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0In-depth knowledge of process development techniques, formulation, cGMP regulations, FDA and DEA regulations, and recent trends in validation concepts.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A thorough knowledge of Pharmaceutical unit operations is required, primarily as it relates to solid dosage forms. Scientist is capable of competent scientific judgments.\xa0Decisions must be made by this individual without delay during development, DOE, and batch manufacture.\xa0This may require some innovation on very short notice.\xa0“Thinking on your feet” is often required.', "·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Education Level: Master's Degree", '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Will provide technical assistance to alternate departments, as needed, to solve problems as they occur with the product.\xa0This responsibility includes both troubleshooting of active products on the shop floor and potential rework procedures for failed batches.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Additional responsibilities include troubleshooting and reformulation of problem products, product lifecycle development, product portfolio enhancement, and providing technical expertise and support to Production Investigations.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0The individual must have a functional, working knowledge of pharmaceutical manufacturing equipment, and be able to supervise batch manufacture and instruct production operators.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Primary responsibility is to coordinate the development, clinical, manufacturing, product transfer, and scale-up batches of new products and processes at the Client site in Wilson, NC as well as at third-party partner sites.\xa0This includes such tasks as batch record preparation, protocol generation, scheduling, raw material acquisition, and travel for on-site supervision of batch manufacture.', 'Ø\xa0Process control system disruptions', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Coordinate the execution of validation studies with Production Scheduling.\xa0This may also include review and execution of protocols developed by other individuals.', 'Duration: Direct Full Time Placement', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0The development of protocols requires an understanding of the formula/process/system to be studied.\xa0An approach must then be chosen which will demonstrate that the product performs in a consistent and acceptable manner.\xa0This involves original thinking and independent research, as well as the ability to effectively interact with other departments and utilize available resources.\xa0Effective time management is also essential.', 'Ø\xa0If the Scientist experiences a production problem, they are expected to troubleshoot and call on additional resources (experienced operator, process engineers, maintenance, and quality specialist) as needed to resolve issues.\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0The Pharmaceutical Technology Scientist is primarily responsible for new product development, clinical activities, Scale-up / manufacturing development, product transfer, optimization, and validation of new products/ processes into operations.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Responsible for new equipment evaluation.\xa0Additionally, will interface with engineering and equipment manufacturer to ensure proper installation and operation of the new equipment.\xa0Will be responsible for coordination of all activities to transfer new equipment to production, including training as required of both supervisors and operators.', 'Job Title: Pharmaceutical Technology Scientist - Full Time ', 'Ø\xa0Equipment changes/modifications', 'Job Summary', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0The major objective is to assure successful new products to production and proper training of production personnel in any new product, process and/or equipment.\xa0Key objectives include clinical / manufacturing support, transfer of new products to the North Carolina as well as our external third-party partner sites and alternative API qualification. ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Prepare reports, including data analysis, conclusions and recommendations.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Original solutions will be required to optimize formulas/processes.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Coordinate, develop and prepare protocols for process / product development, validation studies, including cleaning and equipment validation.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Periodically, the Scientist may encounter unexpected production problems as well as process deviations during the execution of studies. Examples of problems typically experienced are: ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Responsible for evaluating and qualifying sources of raw materials.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Responsible for new product evaluation.\xa0Additionally, will interface with clinical, regulatory, R&D, operations and quality to ensure proper development of new products.\xa0Will be responsible for coordination of all activities within pilot plant /operations and laboratory areas.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Responsible for compliance with Controlled Substance documentation and accountability procedures while maintaining high alert to diversion and theft possibilities.']

job_title: Senior Data Engineer - Pipeline & Tools R&D
job_text: ['', 'Experience with Java or Scala programming languages.', 'Assist in the development of deployment automation and operational support strategies.', 'Experience working in a Linux environment.', 'Experience with Python and shell scripting.', '5+ years of experience with the Hadoop ecosystem (Map Reduce, Spark, Spark-Streaming, Oozie, Impala, etc.) and big data ecosystems (Kafka, Cassandra, etc.).', 'Implement and support big data tools and frameworks such as HDFS, Hive, and Impala.', 'Deliver near-real time and non-near-real-time data and applications to a team of analysts and data scientists who create insights and analytics applications for our stakeholders.', 'Knowledge of the video game industry.', 'Experience in Lambda architecture.', 'A passion for technology.', 'Set the standards for warehouse and schema design in massively parallel processing engines such as Hadoop and Snowflake while collaborating with analysts and data scientist in the creation of efficient data models.', 'Experience with CI/CD.', ' The Rockstar Analytics team provide insights and actionable results to a wide variety of stakeholders across the organization in support of their decision making. We work together with several departments to design and implement streamed and batched data pipelines. We collaborate as a global team to develop cutting-edge data pipelines serving data products, data models, reports, analyses, and machine learning applications. ', 'Implement and support streaming technologies such as Kafka and Spark-Streaming.', 'Responsibilities', 'Experience with Artifact Repositories.', ' Experience with event processing frameworks. Experience in Lambda architecture. Experience with Java or Scala programming languages. Experience with CI/CD. Familiar with Restful APIs. Experience with Artifact Repositories. Knowledge of the video game industry. ', 'Skills', 'Qualifications', 'Experience working with Real-Time, Near-Real-Time streaming pipelines.', 'Maintain and extend our CI/CD processes and documentation.', 'Assist in the development of a big data platform in Hadoop using pipeline technologies such as Spark, Oozie, and more to support a variety of requirements and applications.', 'The Rockstar Analytics team provide insights and actionable results to a wide variety of stakeholders across the organization in support of their decision making.', 'Familiar with Restful APIs.', ' Deep understanding of advanced data warehousing concepts and track record of applying these concepts on the job. Ability to manage numerous requests concurrently and strategically, prioritizing when necessary. Good communication skills. Dynamic team player. A passion for technology. ', 'Expert in at least one SQL language such as T-SQL or PL/SQL.', 'PLUSES', ' Implement and support big data tools and frameworks such as HDFS, Hive, and Impala. Implement and support streaming technologies such as Kafka and Spark-Streaming. Deliver near-real time and non-near-real-time data and applications to a team of analysts and data scientists who create insights and analytics applications for our stakeholders. Assist in the development of deployment automation and operational support strategies. Assist in the development of a big data platform in Hadoop using pipeline technologies such as Spark, Oozie, and more to support a variety of requirements and applications. Set the standards for warehouse and schema design in massively parallel processing engines such as Hadoop and Snowflake while collaborating with analysts and data scientist in the creation of efficient data models. Maintain and extend our CI/CD processes and documentation. ', 'We collaborate as a global team to develop cutting-edge data pipelines serving data products, data models, reports, analyses, and machine learning applications.', 'How To Apply', 'What We Do', 'Good communication skills.', 'Ability to manage numerous requests concurrently and strategically, prioritizing when necessary.', 'We work together with several departments to design and implement streamed and batched data pipelines.', ' 5+ years of work experience with ETL, data modeling, and business intelligence big data architectures. 5+ years of experience with the Hadoop ecosystem (Map Reduce, Spark, Spark-Streaming, Oozie, Impala, etc.) and big data ecosystems (Kafka, Cassandra, etc.). Expert in at least one SQL language such as T-SQL or PL/SQL. Experience developing and managing data warehouses on a terabyte or petabyte scale. Strong experience in massively parallel processing & columnar databases. Experience working with Real-Time, Near-Real-Time streaming pipelines. Experience with Python and shell scripting. Experience working in a Linux environment. ', 'Experience developing and managing data warehouses on a terabyte or petabyte scale.', 'Dynamic team player.', '5+ years of work experience with ETL, data modeling, and business intelligence big data architectures.', 'Experience with event processing frameworks.', 'Deep understanding of advanced data warehousing concepts and track record of applying these concepts on the job.', 'Strong experience in massively parallel processing & columnar databases.']

Focus areas span all of HBO Max, but for kids! This includes but is not limited to: A kids personalized experience, kids’ profiles and aging-up, content discovery and search, player experience, and the parent experience.', 'Plan and conduct all research including, project scoping, scheduling, budgeting, staffing, recruiting, legal logistics, technical logistics, study moderation, data analysis, reporting, and team communication.', 'HBO Max is the future of entertainment and storytelling.', 'Lead team innovation sprints and incorporate user centered design activities throughout the product design process.', 'The Lead is a member of the UX Research team and collaborates with peers to inform overall research priorities, establish best practices, develop operational processes, provide coaching managing and training to team members.', 'Conduct feature prioritization and benchmarking studies to identify user needs and evaluate success of HBO Max.', 'Experience Managing Junior, Mid, and/or Senior-Level UX Researchers', 'Depending on the scope and complexity of research, you may plan and execute studies as a sole researcher, or you may lead and manage a small team to perform the work.', 'Project scoping, budgeting, scheduling and resource management of multiple simultaneous user research efforts.', "Help grow the UXR team's expertise, explore new ways to discover user insights, acquire new tools and resources for the lab, and help teams understand and apply best practices.", 'Vet, hire, and manage outside vendors as needed to support the work.', 'Experience testing TV consoles and remotes, gaming consoles and remotes, phone, tablet, desktop, and voice.', 'Expert in study session moderation/facilitation for in-depth-interviews, cognitive walkthroughs, usability studies, and contextual inquiry.', 'The Job', 'Strong client-management skills; ability to adapt to a variety of individual styles and approaches in order to deliver the appropriate insights and support each requires', 'Collaborate with designers, project managers, and engineers to identify research roadmap activities to support product feature releases and future concepts for exploration.', 'Experience working on interdisciplinary product development teams with large stakeholder groups', 'Plan and conduct research within an Agile framework including, project scoping, scheduling, budgeting, staffing, recruiting, legal logistics, technical logistics, study moderation, data analysis, reporting, and team communication. Depending on the scope and complexity of research, you may plan and execute studies as a sole researcher, or you may lead and manage a small team to perform the work.', 'Graduate degree in Engineering Human Factors, Human-Computer Interaction, Psychology, Computer Science, Cognitive Science, or a closely related field.', 'Expert in experimental design for Qualitative Research, User-Centered Design Methodology, data analysis, and reporting and communicating results.', 'Create and manage a research program for Kids & Family and bring a user-centered design approach to the strategy and design for the best in class kid-first explore and play experience.', 'Experience as a Lead or Senior UX Researcher, with 5+ years working in UX Research', 'UX Research is an essential part of the HBO Max product design process ensuring the viewer experience is as rewarding and user-friendly as it is entertaining.', 'The Essentials', 'WarnerMedia’s new streaming entertainment offering, HBO Max is the culmination of some of the most innovative new technology and greatest creative talent in the industry. Anchored by the entire HBO service, arguably the greatest brand in television, HBO Max also features fan favorites from the WarnerMedia library including Warner Bros., New Line, DC, CNN, TNT, TBS, truTV, Turner Classic Movies, Cartoon Network, Adult Swim, Crunchyroll, Rooster Teeth, Looney Tunes, and more. HBO Max will also be home to key third-party library acquisitions, such as Friends, South Park and Doctor Who, and more than 50 exclusive Originals in its first year, from the likes of groundbreaking creative talent such as J.J. Abrams, Ridley Scott, Jordan Peele, Steven Soderbergh, Michael Mann, Mindy Kaling, Reese Witherspoon, Anna Kendrick, Greg Berlanti, Melissa McCarthy, Robert Zemeckis, Ellen DeGeneres, and other visionaries. HBO Max launches in May 2020.', 'Strong command of a broad set of Qualitative and Quantitative User Research Methods with the ability to discern and recommend the right method(s) for a project.']
