['', 'Creative\xa0', 'intuitive listener', 'Sense of Urgency', 'Who we are', 'What you’ll get', 'The Mission\xa0', 'We are honest brokers in helping to connect people with rightful assets, with long-forgotten relatives and, most importantly, with well-deserved peace of mind.', 'Like an unsolved mystery, the people at ARB enjoy searching the past to solve the mysteries of the present. With a best-in-class research team - employing proprietary data gathering techniques and technologies - ARB has a unique capacity for success. Hard work and passion moves us forward but we derive our greatest satisfaction from that moment in a client engagement when it becomes certain we’ve accomplished what we set out to do.', 'Investigative by Nature- asks a cascading set of questions to research a case. Can speak, write and get to the point when dealing with lots of data and information, can present and persuade people on the phone.', 'Organized\xa0', 'Tenacious', 'Besides an open vacation policy, excellent health and dental insurance, wellness days, 401(k) and a competitive salary - You will get an opportunity to work with a team of dedicated professionals - researchers, attorneys and support staff in a team office environment who strives to provide consistent, accurate information connecting heirs to their rightful inheritances.', 'Friendly and Persuasive', 'American Research Bureau (ARB), a Utah-based company has built a durable heritage of connecting heirs with their rightful inheritances for more than 80 years.', 'Responsibilities', 'Our mission is to employ time-tested genealogical research and investigative methods to connect heirs to their rightful inheritances and, in some cases, re-establish long-forgotten family relationships.', 'Creative\xa0– a quick thinker who is able to solve complex cases with ingenuity and speed.Friendly and Persuasive\xa0– a natural conversationalist who rapidly builds relationships of trust, is an\xa0intuitive listener\xa0and is able to influence potential clients on the telephoneTenacious\xa0– plows through barriers and navigates roadblocks as they research time-sensitive cases.Detail-oriented\xa0- can make good judgments and quick decisions based on data and regularly works on projects/cases of moderate complexity.Sense of Urgency\xa0– understands the time-sensitive nature of ARB’s business and is motivated to complete tasks quickly with a high degree of quality. Effectively balances short-term tasks with long-term goals.Organized\xa0- builds high-quality plans and develops helpful documentation for all cases. With the help of others, stays on top of complex laws, regulations or situations related to a case.', 'Qualifications', 'It is on a foundation of best-in-class research capability, and a commitment to honesty, transparency, and professionalism, that we continually provide top-tier service for clients worldwide.', 'Detail-oriented\xa0- can make good judgments and quick decisions based on data and regularly works on projects/cases of moderate complexity.', 'With minimal supervision, the\xa0Researcher will work with the research director as a member of the research team in assessing cases that present a financial opportunity for ARB. This job will be\xa0focused on conducting internal research and then\xa0calling and connecting with potential heirs to cultivate relationships into clients for ARB.\xa0Strong ability to multi-task,\xa0prioritize and develop a trusting rapport with people over the phone. The successful candidate will be\xa0assertive and enjoys being on the phone with people without the high\xa0pressure of unreasonable sales quotas.\xa0The work involves continuous new and moderately complex cases each day and much of the work will include the following:', 'Creative\xa0– a quick thinker who is able to solve complex cases with ingenuity and speed.', 'Tenacious\xa0– plows through barriers and navigates roadblocks as they research time-sensitive cases.', 'Why we are different', "Our client is on a mission to employ time-tested genealogical research and investigative methods to connect people to their rightful inheritances and, in some cases, re-establish long-forgotten family relationships. The client's work is built on a foundation of best-in-class research capability, and a commitment to honesty, transparency, and professionalism, that continually provide top-tier service for clients worldwide.", 'Organized\xa0- builds high-quality plans and develops helpful documentation for all cases. With the help of others, stays on top of complex laws, regulations or situations related to a case.', 'Friendly and Persuasive\xa0– a natural conversationalist who rapidly builds relationships of trust, is an\xa0intuitive listener\xa0and is able to influence potential clients on the telephone', 'Detail-oriented\xa0', 'Researcher', "Bachelor's degree or equivalent in years of experience with a strong preference for research and evaluation, or a related field.Investigative by Nature- asks a cascading set of questions to research a case. Can speak, write and get to the point when dealing with lots of data and information, can present and persuade people on the phone.", "Bachelor's degree or equivalent in years of experience with a strong preference for research and evaluation, or a related field.", 'Sense of Urgency\xa0– understands the time-sensitive nature of ARB’s business and is motivated to complete tasks quickly with a high degree of quality. Effectively balances short-term tasks with long-term goals.']

skills, customer service and interpersonal skills.\xa0Strong ability to work independently and manage one’s time.\xa0Experience with data and utilizing numbers to define and support hypotheses\xa0Experience with storytelling to get traction with various audience', 'Duration – 12 Months Contract\xa0', 'Design & conduct research across key AR/VR experiential factors such as input & feedback, privacy & security, efficiency, error rate agency, cognitive load, usability, etc.\xa0', 'Experience with AR/VR technologies and user studies\xa0', 'Adapt existing tools, or create a new tool that fits with the specific research context (e.g. create a survey) and validate it.', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'In the formative phase, the UX researcher will work closely with a multidisciplinary team, to turn insights from empirical data into the actionable and measurable improvements in the interactive experience. \xa0', 'Strong ability to work independently and manage one’s time.\xa0', 'Strong candidates will demonstrate a rigorous, mixed-methods approach to understand user needs and usability issues. \xa0In the formative phase, the UX researcher will work closely with a multidisciplinary team, to turn insights from empirical data into the actionable and measurable improvements in the interactive experience. \xa0During the summative evaluations, the UX researcher will rigorously design and conduct user studies that measure the experiential outcomes with a well-chosen method that fits with the research question. \xa0The UX researcher will need to design and conduct the study according to different phases of development and the research questions asked at that phase. \xa0In addition, the UX researcher may need to adapt existing research tools or create new research tools, such as surveys, that are tailored for a specific research context, and validate the tool in the context.', 'Skills:\xa0', 'Preferred Qualifications\xa0']

['Bioinformatics mining and phylogenetic analyses of metagenomics, genomics, transcriptomics, and/or proteomics data for novel enzymesConducting molecular cloning, protein expression, and purificationCulturing and screening fungal and bacterial isolates for PFAS degradation activitiesDocumentation and presentation of research progress in the forms of reports, publications, and oral presentationsPeriodic travel to scientific reviews and conferences', 'UES, Inc. has an opportunity available for a Biological Research Scientist with experience in bioinformatics and biochemistry to join our team supporting the Air Force Research Laboratory near Dayton, OH. This candidate will have the opportunity to work on novel microbial degradation of perfluoroalkyl (PFAS) compounds using functional genomics. The successful candidate will use bioinformatics approaches to identify biological PFAS degradation pathways and enzymes to aid in the generation of testable hypotheses for wet-lab experiments. This role requires effective teamwork and communication of results with colleagues from diverse backgrounds. Primary functions for this role will include:', 'Ph.D. (or M.Sc. with 5+ years of relevant experience) in Biology, Bioinformatics, Biochemistry, or Microbial GenomicsFluent in Python and/or R and proficient in using the command line in Unix environmentsDeep understanding of multi-sequence alignments, phylogenetic analyses, and comparative genomics methodsDemonstrated understanding of relevant public protein databases (PDB, Uniprot, JGI IMG/M)Experience in statistical methods to solving biological problemsExcellent organizational skillsThis position is working within a government facility and requires U.S. citizenship', 'UES, Inc. is committed to hiring and retaining a diverse workforce. We are proud to be an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer, making decisions without regard to race, color, religion, creed, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, national origin, age, veteran status, disability, or any other protected class. U.S. Citizenship is required for most positions.', '\xa0', 'Bioinformatics mining and phylogenetic analyses of metagenomics, genomics, transcriptomics, and/or proteomics data for novel enzymes', 'This position is working within a government facility and requires U.S. citizenship', 'Fluent in Python and/or R and proficient in using the command line in Unix environments', 'Ph.D. (or M.Sc. with 5+ years of relevant experience) in Biology, Bioinformatics, Biochemistry, or Microbial Genomics', 'Culturing and screening fungal and bacterial isolates for PFAS degradation activities', 'Demonstrated understanding of relevant public protein databases (PDB, Uniprot, JGI IMG/M)', 'Requirements:', 'Additional Information', 'Experience in statistical methods to solving biological problems', 'Deep understanding of multi-sequence alignments, phylogenetic analyses, and comparative genomics methods', 'Periodic travel to scientific reviews and conferences', 'UES, Inc. is an innovative science and technology company providing customers with superior research and development expertise since its inception in 1973. Our long-term success is a direct result of a strong commitment to the success of our employees. We look forward to reviewing your application.', 'Conducting molecular cloning, protein expression, and purification', 'Documentation and presentation of research progress in the forms of reports, publications, and oral presentations', 'Excellent organizational skills']

job_text: ['', 'Completely define, own, and maintain business-critical data pipelines.', 'Very strong in Java, Scala or Python', 'Have a strong background in distributed data processing, software engineering design, and data modeling concepts Very strong in Java, Scala or PythonExperience with Spark and distributed computingExperience building out and maintaining star and snowflake schemas for critical dataTakes pride in the hygiene and quality of your code, tables, and pipelinesSimplifies and automates solutionsHave a track record of owning and building resilient ETLsA great communicator - both written and verbalA team player who selflessly helps othersLove freedom and hate being micromanaged. Given context, you thrive finding creative and efficient solutions towards a common goalConnect with our unique culture', 'Power some of the most important and insightful dashboards and insights for our finances', 'Takes pride in the hygiene and quality of your code, tables, and pipelines', 'A team player who selflessly helps others', 'Have a track record of owning and building resilient ETLs', 'What Describes You', 'Have a strong background in distributed data processing, software engineering design, and data modeling concepts ', 'Design dimensional tables to enable analyst and drive critical business decisions in an efficient and scalable manner', 'Experience building out and maintaining star and snowflake schemas for critical data', 'Connect with our unique culture', 'Simplifies and automates solutions', 'In This Role You’ll', 'A great communicator - both written and verbal', 'Completely define, own, and maintain business-critical data pipelines.Work closely with engineers, analysts, and business partners to deeply understand the data, what it means in our context, and how to elegantly model it appropriatelyPower some of the most important and insightful dashboards and insights for our financesLearn the ins-and-outs of our business and how Netflix manages moneyUnderstand and explain how data ties together and relates to the rest of our ecosystemDesign dimensional tables to enable analyst and drive critical business decisions in an efficient and scalable manner', 'Experience with Spark and distributed computing', 'Understand and explain how data ties together and relates to the rest of our ecosystem', 'Work closely with engineers, analysts, and business partners to deeply understand the data, what it means in our context, and how to elegantly model it appropriately', 'Learn the ins-and-outs of our business and how Netflix manages money', 'Love freedom and hate being micromanaged. ['', 'Knowledge, Experience And Skills', 'Degree in Pharmaceutical Sciences, Chemical/Biochemical Engineering, Biochemistry or a related scientific discipline and relevant industry experience that demonstrates expertise in formulation process development as well as sustained excellence in performance and accomplishments that align to company goals.', 'Experience in variety of biochemical (e.g., chromatography, capillary electrophoresis) and/or biophysical techniques (e.g., DLS, FTIR, CD, AUC, fluorescence spectroscopy etc.) is strongly preferred.', '0-3 years’ industry experience with PhD in a related scientific discipline OR extensive industry experience and a M.S. or B.S degree in related scientific discipline.Degree in Pharmaceutical Sciences, Chemical/Biochemical Engineering, Biochemistry or a related scientific discipline and relevant industry experience that demonstrates expertise in formulation process development as well as sustained excellence in performance and accomplishments that align to company goals.Excellent communication skills (both verbal and technical) and interpersonal skills are required.Demonstrates technical proficiency, scientific creativity, collaboration with others and independent thought in suggesting experimental design and research strategy.', 'Job Description', 'For Current Gilead Employees And Contractors', 'The candidate should have the ability to proactively identify issues, make key insights to data, and work independently to develop solutions in a collaborative multidisciplinary environment.', '0-3 years’ industry experience with PhD in a related scientific discipline OR extensive industry experience and a M.S. or B.S degree in related scientific discipline.', 'Mentors junior scientists, manage multiple projects and ensure project deliverables are met within timelines', 'Experience with a range of biologics modalities and delivery methods. Modalities could include antibodies, fusion proteins, bi-specifics, vaccines, antibody-drug conjugates, etc. In addition, the candidate is expected to design and execute experiments evaluating IV infusion delivery methods using bags/bottles and syringe pumps, as well as evaluate subcutaneous injection delivery methods.', 'For Jobs In The United States', 'Demonstrates technical proficiency, scientific creativity, collaboration with others and independent thought in suggesting experimental design and research strategy.', 'A strong understanding of formulation and drug product process development for early and late stage biologics. Expected to design and execute studies supporting formulation development, scale-down/-up experiments to define drug product process parameters, and to author protocols, summary reports, as well as sections of regulatory submissions.', 'Candidates should be self-motivated, organized, and enjoy scientific investigation and thinking, as well as be familiar with the relevant technical literature.', 'Excellent communication skills (both verbal and technical) and interpersonal skills are required.', 'Essential Duties and Job Functions: ', 'Experience in lyophilized drug product formulation development, process development, and related laboratory techniques, such as freeze‑drying microscopy, Karl-Fisher moisture analysis, and differential scanning calorimetry, is also preferred.', 'A strong understanding of formulation and drug product process development for early and late stage biologics. Expected to design and execute studies supporting formulation development, scale-down/-up experiments to define drug product process parameters, and to author protocols, summary reports, as well as sections of regulatory submissions.Experience with a range of biologics modalities and delivery methods. Modalities could include antibodies, fusion proteins, bi-specifics, vaccines, antibody-drug conjugates, etc. In addition, the candidate is expected to design and execute experiments evaluating IV infusion delivery methods using bags/bottles and syringe pumps, as well as evaluate subcutaneous injection delivery methods.Experience in variety of biochemical (e.g., chromatography, capillary electrophoresis) and/or biophysical techniques (e.g., DLS, FTIR, CD, AUC, fluorescence spectroscopy etc.) is strongly preferred.Experience in lyophilized drug product formulation development, process development, and related laboratory techniques, such as freeze‑drying microscopy, Karl-Fisher moisture analysis, and differential scanning calorimetry, is also preferred.Leads drug product technology transfers from process development to clinical and commercial manufacturing sites, serves on-site as a site technical representative for process scale‑up studies and technical support during GMP operations. Authors tech transfer documentation defining the process and parameters, as well as reviews master batch records for accuracy.Has knowledge pertaining to global cGMP regulatory and guidance documents from the FDA, EMEA, ICH, US/EU Pharmacopeias, etc., related to drug product development, analysis, and manufacturing.Be an effective communicator of ideas, project goals and results to cross‑functional teams in both written and presentation format. The candidate should have the ability to proactively identify issues, make key insights to data, and work independently to develop solutions in a collaborative multidisciplinary environment.Mentors junior scientists, manage multiple projects and ensure project deliverables are met within timelinesCandidates should be self-motivated, organized, and enjoy scientific investigation and thinking, as well as be familiar with the relevant technical literature.', 'Leads drug product technology transfers from process development to clinical and commercial manufacturing sites, serves on-site as a site technical representative for process scale‑up studies and technical support during GMP operations. Authors tech transfer documentation defining the process and parameters, as well as reviews master batch records for accuracy.', 'Has knowledge pertaining to global cGMP regulatory and guidance documents from the FDA, EMEA, ICH, US/EU Pharmacopeias, etc., related to drug product development, analysis, and manufacturing.', 'Be an effective communicator of ideas, project goals and results to cross‑functional teams in both written and presentation format. ']

In their role, they drive change and innovation from a technical perspective and advocate new technologies within formal and informal networks.', '3+ Years Business and technology process analysis\xa0\xa0', 'Directs the process for and execution for effective assembly of data warehouse and business intelligence requirements.\xa0', 'Prepares and documents standard operating procedures and protocols as well as required system documentation', 'Our direct client has a contract need for a Data Warehouse Architect.  ', '5+ Years of demonstrated success in Information Technology, with at least 5+ Years Data Warehouse Architecture and Design Experience, and', 'Leads in the analysis of requirements and the development of system designs daily', '3+ Years application development in a Microsoft environment', 'Designs applications to execute with high level of operational efficiencyProvides cross-functional support for performance issues and application errors working in a DevOps environment.Prepares and documents standard operating procedures and protocols as well as required system documentationSupports operational excellence goals through strong operations knowledgeResolves escalated support topics as part of tier-3 DevOps role to ensure the highest availability of critical applications • Plans and execute upgrades of existing applications, tools, and features', 'Drives collaborative design discussions to conceptualize architectural solution and alternatives. Seeks input to ensure the overall solution is integrated and optimized across the database, ETL and BI technology stack.\xa0', 'Evaluates products, vendors, and service providers to ensure best-of-breed technology solutions', 'Key accountabilities of the function', 'Education', 'Advises project managers, disciplinary managers, and product owners on technical solutions and business processes daily', 'Work experience, Leadership experience', 'Strong understanding of data warehousing architectural approaches', 'Collaborates with IT colleagues and the Business in the architecture, design and implementation of necessary analytical technical solutions regularly', 'Creates project/technical collateral for internal business partners and external service providers daily', 'Negotiates with business and IT product team members to ensure requirements are fully explored and documented daily']

job_text: ['', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Working with and evaluating existing data-centric applications and tools', 'Position will be remote with occasional travel post-COVID', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong analytical skills', '\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Cloud experience is desired - AWS preferred', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Mentoring more junior developers to allow them to grow their data career', 'Responsibilities:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Building tools and APIs to enhance Data Lake security with an eye to continuing our policy of keeping personal data completely secure using the most up-to-date guidelines', 'Are you a Data Engineering enthusiast with a wide variety of experience across the data lifecycle and with multiple technology stacks? Do you love to organize data and figure out all of the ways it can be used? Do you enjoy mentoring junior and future engineers? We are\xa0looking for an innovative Senior Data Engineer to help us build the future. If you want to put your skills to use to help find and create future developers, come talk to us! You will be working with a variety of technologies and helping to design and build applications and tools with a data and analytics-driven focus.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0At least 3 years experience with Python', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Automating data pipelines and ensuring that a robust CI/CD process is in place', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Working on Agile application teams to build high quality and modular back-end data structures\xa0', 'Qualifications:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Collaborating with our Data Science team on data and metrics', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Exposure to data security regulation and enforcement - GDPR, HIPAA, etc', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Working with stakeholders to help ensure that business needs are met', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0At least 5 years working in a Data Developer, Engineer or Architect role with a broad focus on data movement, querying (SQL), analytics, storage and processing', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A “can do” attitude and a passion for innovation', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Building and maintaining a dashboard solution and dashboards to enable self-serve business analysis', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Curiosity about data and the ideal way to structure it to extract meaning from it', 'Sr. Data Engineer ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience building pipelines in a modular, scalable way', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Building data ingestion pipelines to ensure timely and quality data into our Data Lake', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent skills in both RDBMS (SQL Server, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL technologies']

['', 'Position Title:\xa0\xa0 Systems Analyst IV - Data Engineering\xa0 ', '     The Data Science Systems Analyst plays a critical role in the industrialization  of data science initiatives across the organization. Engages with Data Science  teams through the entire lifecycle of all the projects within Business  Intelligence & Analytics department from data modeling, to data engineering,  and finally data consumptionPrinciple Duties and Responsibilities     • Works with data scientist to design, develop, test, and implement algorithms  using the Data & Analytics Platform.• Solves moderate to complex product  errors, as well as designs and resolves product problems, following up in a  timely manner with all appropriate customers and IT personnel.• Develop data  engineering processes in azure using components like Azure Data Factory, Azure  Data Lake analytics, HDInsights, DataBricks etc.• Assists in assessing  alternative software solutions for workability and technical feasibility.•  Relates information from various sources to draw logical conclusions.•  Assists in identifying the impact of proposed development/enhancements  projects.• Knowledge of data science tools and platforms (preferably  Microsoft Azure) • Knowledge of statistical and predictive modeling concepts  and disciplines including machine learning algorithms• Knowledge of  industry-leading practices• Ability to propose analytic strategies and  solutions as a business need• Analyzing source system data and data flows,  working with structured and unstructured data• Manipulating high-volume,  high-dimensionality data from varying sources to highlight patterns, anomalies,  relationships and trends• Must possess the ability to effectively  communicate using strong verbal, written and listening skills• Must be able  to adapt quickly to change without being afraid to take on new responsibilities  in a fast-paced team environment while being proactive and action-oriented •  Ability to come up with creative technical ways to resolve application and  system issues• Understanding agile development methodologies or concepts;  experience with is a plus• Excellent diagnostic, debugging, and  troubleshooting skills• Working knowledge of any of the following languages:  Python, Java, R, SQL, HQL, Gremlin, Cypher• Delivers SDLC Deliverables as  defined.• Contributes to Business Case Development through information  gathering and analysis.    Basic Requirements:     • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Business  Administration, or other related field. • Minimum of 5 years IT experience  encompassing the following:\xa0 o Working experience with SDLC and deliverables  associated with each phase.\xa0 o Experience in ML algorithms and Advanced SQL  techniques\xa0 o Experience engineering data pipelines using latest technologies  and techniques\xa0 o Experience in Data Visualization Best Practices\xa0 o  Experience working with industry-leading tools and technologies \xa0 o Experience  in Azure Cloud technologies\xa0 o Experience in Big Data / Hadoop Skills and Abilities:     • Intellectual curiosity and great data intuition• The basics: Statistical  Analysis, Data Mining and Processing, Programming, Machine Learning, Linear  Algebra and Calculus, Data Visualization, Data Wrangling, Software  Engineering• Adept at working with unstructured data• Outstanding  Written and Verbal Communication communications skills; able to articulate  complex technical topics for non-technical audiences.• Ability to analyze  complex situations and develop creative solutions.• Ability to multi-task  and self-direct.Strong Organization Skills:• Ability to interact  with non IT associates and management on projects.• Ability to plan and  organize work to meet pre-established deadlines. • Ability to work with  their peers, associates and all levels of management.• Ability to explain  technical concepts in a non-technical fashion.• Strong problem-solving and  critical thinking skills; strong deductive and inductive  reasoning.Strong Analytical Aptitude:• Ability to work with and  influence peers and senior management.• Ability to work in a fast-paced and  deadline-oriented environment.• Self-motivated with critical attention to  detail, deadlines and reporting.Preferred Qualification:• Experience  in a retail environment a plus.', 'Position Summary:', ' Systems Analyst IV - Data Engineering\xa0', 'Principle Duties and Responsibilities', 'Skills and Abilities:', 'Preferred Qualification:', 'Strong Analytical Aptitude:', ' ', 'Systems Analyst IV - Data Engineering\xa0', 'Position Summary:\xa0\xa0 ', 'Strong Organization Skills:', 'Basic Requirements:']

', 'Design fit-for-purpose oral and injectable formulations to enable exploratory and enabling animal studies. ['', '\xa0', "Coda reimagines documents, spreadsheets, and how “applications” are developed. While documents and spreadsheets have remained relatively unchanged for the last 40 years, their paradigms still dominate how businesses and people operate. We're taking a fresh approach at what these fundamental surfaces are ー empowering anyone to start with something as simple as a document that can easily evolve into a powerful, connected application. We’ve seen customers make docs to plan product launches, manage marketing campaigns, coordinate country-wide remote education opportunities, and to run their business full stack (to name a few).", 'Aware of how brand assets and creative efforts are perceived, and hold your customer-facing work to a high standard of quality. You can design and create professional-looking communications independently', 'Work with product teams to craft and launch experiences to onboard and activate users to new product features', "Experienced across all aspects of the customer journey - retention, engagement, conversion, and everything in between. You're interested & invested in how customers move through and experience a product - and how you can help get them thereAnalytically-driven and rooted in high Emotional Intelligence. Experienced with SQL - you don’t need to be a Data Scientist, but you need to be self-sufficient. You're obsessed with A/B testing, iteration, and finding insight, and love scaling your findings to adjacent areasAware of how brand assets and creative efforts are perceived, and hold your customer-facing work to a high standard of quality. You can design and create professional-looking communications independentlyEager to roll up your sleeves with a fast-growing startup and can plan ahead to let your efforts scale down the line. Experienced with the latest marketing and engagement tools and excited about the opportunity to add new ones to our tech stackProven collaborator with strong ability to communicate and drive process with a wide range of stakeholders", 'Responsibilities:', 'Eager to roll up your sleeves with a fast-growing startup and can plan ahead to let your efforts scale down the line. Experienced with the latest marketing and engagement tools and excited about the opportunity to add new ones to our tech stack', 'Proven collaborator with strong ability to communicate and drive process with a wide range of stakeholders', "Coda\xa0is a rapidly growing startup building a platform that enables people to build docs as powerful as an app. We're backed by some of the Valley's leading venture capitalists, and have assembled a world-class team across offices in San Francisco, Mountain View, and Seattle.\xa0Here's\xa0a quick overview of what we do.", "Experienced across all aspects of the customer journey - retention, engagement, conversion, and everything in between. You're interested & invested in how customers move through and experience a product - and how you can help get them there", 'Explore, test, validate, and refine potential new engagement and growth channels', 'Coda is looking for our first lifecycle marketer to oversee our user journey and develop the programs for how we guide users through our product. The ideal candidate will use a combination of data, testing, and a high degree of customer empathy to drive activation, engagement, conversion, and expansion. Since Coda is used across a diverse set of customers and use cases with many potential points to drive engagement, this is a unique role for an analytically-inclined customer marketer to be both creative and drive measurable results.', 'Requirements:', 'As the founding member of Coda’s Lifecycle Marketing team, your fingerprints will be all over the process, culture, and company we build in the years to come.', 'Deeply understand, research, and segment our users to deliver customized experiences to the right audience. You’ll understand the data driving our customer actions and A/B test your way to better experiences', 'Maintain a rigorous and organized view of the experiences and communications we are delivering across our key customer segments', 'Drive engagement, retention, conversion, expansion, and resurrection across our customer base by crafting personalized campaigns and in-app experiencesDevelop lifecycle marketing campaigns across email and in-app messaging channels. ['', 'Qualified candidates will be invited to schedule a 30-minute screening call with one of our recruiters', 'Existing Secret, TS preferred clearance', 'We look at Descartes Labs as a work environment where people are included, treat their colleagues with professional regard and respect, and thrive as a result', 'Contribute your own ideas to our machine learning team', 'Top Reasons To Work At Descartes Labs', 'The Company', 'Qualified candidates will be invited to schedule a 30-minute screening call with one of our recruitersDepending on the outcome of the screening call, candidates will be invited to schedule a 30-60 minute interview with our Engineering Hiring ManagerAfter that, candidates will be invited to schedule an additional 30-60 minute technical interview with an additional member of our Engineering teamFinally, candidates are invited to a virtual onsite with ~5 members of the Technical team', 'Our Interview Process', 'You belong here! We strive to be a team with a variety of backgrounds, perspectives and skills. Scientific discovery is in our DNA and the more inclusive we are, the better our work will be; diversity fuels innovation!', 'The Role', 'We’re using the world’s top technology to solve the world’s largest problems with a strong focus on sustainability, environment, and impact science', 'What You Bring', 'Familiarity with cloud systems (AWS/Google Cloud) and cloud infrastructure is a plus', 'Diverse problems require a diverse group of individuals and mindsets which is why we strive to build an inclusive culture and community. choice of medical plan; dental, life, and disability insurance; a 401K plan; paid holidays and flexible paid time off', 'Experience with high performance or large scale computing infrastructure', 'Descartes Labs is a software and analytics company that enables organizations to understand their relationship with the physical world and use actionable insights to create positive change. We provide a unified modeling platform for spatial, market, sensor, and customer data that generates scientifically validated analytics at a global scale. Headquartered in Santa Fe, New Mexico, Descartes Labs has offices across the United States serving customers globally. We are seeking a talented cleared Geospatial Data Engineer to join our\xa0growing government team!', 'Strong familiarity with Linux systems', 'We need a cleared geospatial data engineer with strong experience building processing pipelines and familiarity with earth observation data. This role will help us build our cloud based supercomputer that currently ingests 10 Terabytes of near real-time geospatial data per day within the requirements of our Federal partners. Our microservices-based platform is developed from the ground up cloud-native, and we see a peak load of nearly billion API calls a day. We aim to supercharge machine learning scientists to ask geospatial and temporal questions not previously possible to understand the changing physical world better.', 'Undergraduate degree in a relevant technical areaStrong familiarity with Linux systemsReal-world software experience in Python is required; experience in other languages is also valuableProficiency with git and modern distributed version control system practices is requiredCode examples (preferably on github / bitbucket / etc) are requiredFamiliarity with cloud systems (AWS/Google Cloud) and cloud infrastructure is a plusExperience with high performance or large scale computing infrastructureExperience with geospatial, planetary, or astronomical datasets is valuableExisting Secret, TS preferred clearance', 'Descartes Labs offers a generous compensation package including a competitive salary; choice of medical plan; dental, life, and disability insurance; a 401K plan; paid holidays and flexible paid time off', 'Finally, candidates are invited to a virtual onsite with ~5 members of the Technical team']

['', '3+ years of work experience.', 'Building fast, reliable, scalable data pipelines that process over billions of historical data points collected from tens of thousands of retail stores across the US which power our machine learning models.', 'Maintaining, augmenting, and helping architect our data platform and data warehouses to ensure that our data and ML teams can efficiently process and access the data they need.', 'What skills and experience do you need?', 'Building fast, reliable, scalable data pipelines that process over billions of historical data points collected from tens of thousands of retail stores across the US which power our machine learning models.Integrating, analyzing, finding issues with, and solving shortcomings in the critical lifeblood of our system–the data our customers send us–that powers every aspect of our system.Maintaining, augmenting, and helping architect our data platform and data warehouses to ensure that our data and ML teams can efficiently process and access the data they need.Collaborating with an interdisciplinary team of experts in machine learning, data scientists, design, software engineering, and business process optimization', 'We encourage all highly-qualified candidates to apply, even if they do not fulfill all the listed criteria.', 'Collaborating with an interdisciplinary team of experts in machine learning, data scientists, design, software engineering, and business process optimization', 'Strong programming and problem-solving skills.', 'Expert-level knowledge of using SQL and data warehouses, data lakes, or databases.', 'Experience with Apache Spark or other Big Data frameworks; working with cloud infrastructure; data visualization tools; and applied statistics is a big plus.', 'Bachelors or Masters in Computer Science or equivalent.3+ years of work experience.Strong programming and problem-solving skills.Expert-level knowledge of using SQL and data warehouses, data lakes, or databases.Experience with Apache Spark or other Big Data frameworks; working with cloud infrastructure; data visualization tools; and applied statistics is a big plus.', 'Bachelors or Masters in Computer Science or equivalent.', 'What You Will Do', 'About Afresh', 'Integrating, analyzing, finding issues with, and solving shortcomings in the critical lifeblood of our system–the data our customers send us–that powers every aspect of our system.']

['', 'A career with MilliporeSigma is an ongoing journey of discovery: our 56,000 people are shaping how the world lives, works and plays through next generation advancements in healthcare, life science and performance materials. For more than 350 years and across the world we have passionately pursued our curiosity to find novel and vibrant ways of enhancing the lives of others. MilliporeSigma is a business of Merck KGaA, Darmstadt, Germany.', 'In this role you will often collaborate with other Data Engineers, SWE’s/SRE’s, Data Analysts/Scientists/Owners, Business Owners, and other internal and external stakeholders.\xa0Knowledge of other open source tools like Apache products Beam/Kafka/SOLR and/or additional languages like go or java is a plus. Knowledge of security standards OAuth 2.0, JWT tokens, TLS/mTLS, encryption, hashing, etc. is a plus.', 'Demonstrated ability to design and build services with complex functionality.', 'The Company is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer. No employee or applicant for employment will be discriminated against on the basis of race, color, religion, age, sex, sexual orientation, national origin, ancestry, disability, military or veteran status, genetic information, gender identity, transgender status, marital status, or any other classification protected by applicable federal, state, or local law. This policy of Equal Employment Opportunity applies to all policies and programs relating to recruitment and hiring, promotion, compensation, benefits, discipline, termination, and all other terms and conditions of employment. Any applicant or employee who believes they have been discriminated against by the Company or anyone acting on behalf of the Company must report any concerns to their Human Resources Business Partner, Legal, or Compliance immediately. The Company will not retaliate against any individual because they made a good faith report of discrimination.', 'You will utilize Big Data management and analytic debugging skills which are a plus for data quality assurance for our customers and the B2B team. Furthermore, in this position you will interact with our customers and help drive and develop new API’s for data delivery for our customers. Knowledge of SQL, Python, and API’s (REST, gRPC, JSON, SOAP) is required. Knowledge in data management, serialization, system architecture, SWE/SRE, and familiarity in working with cloud platforms like GCP and AWS is required.', 'Familiar with Node frameworks such as NestJS, KoaJS, etc.', '\xa0', '2+ years of experience with E-Commerce technology stack – Node, SOLR, Cassandra, API, REST, JSON, SOAP, etc.', 'Curious? Apply and find more information at https://jobs.vibrantm.com', 'Minimum Qualifications:', 'What we offer:\xa0With us, there are always opportunities to break new ground. We empower you to fulfil your ambitions, and our diverse businesses offer various career moves to seek new horizons. We trust you with responsibility early on and support you to draw your own career map that is responsive to your aspirations and priorities in life. Join us and bring your curiosity to life!', 'Team player and self-starter with excellent interpersonal, problem-solving and presentation skills. Ability to collaborate with all levels of staff and create relationships.', '3+ years of experience with SQL or NoSQL databases, such as BigQuery, SQL, Python, Flask, etc.', 'Working knowledge of web protocols RESTful APIs, gRPC, JSON and SOAP.', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Scientific or Informatics field.', 'Experience working in agile methodologies (Git), and scrum teams.', 'Preferred Qualifications:', 'Who You Are', 'Familiar with security standards such as OAuth 2.0, JWT tokens, two-way TLS/mTLS (1.2), encryption algorithms, hashing with SHA-256, etc.', 'Who You Are:', 'Experience building/managing data pipelines/messaging on premise and cloud: SQL, BigQuery, Redshift, Redis, Kafka, Cloud Dataflow, Pub/Sub, etc.', 'Ability to travel up to 20% travel.', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Scientific or Informatics field.3+ years of experience with SQL or NoSQL databases, such as BigQuery, SQL, Python, Flask, etc.2+ years of experience with E-Commerce technology stack – Node, SOLR, Cassandra, API, REST, JSON, SOAP, etc.', 'Ability to understand and parse XML, JSON and data serialization.', 'Working experience with cloud platforms in GCP and AWS and their solution offerings.', 'Your Role:', 'Coding competency in data management in Redis, App Engine, Apache products, etc.', 'As the Hosted Catalog Optimization Data Engineer, you will design, develop, and update data pipelines and data repositories to shape our data delivery for our customers. You will be instrumental to enhancing the reliability, speed, and accuracy of our product data that we deliver to our customers. Additionally, you will interact with a variety of data sources in a service-oriented architecture, ranging from legacy databases, to API endpoints and cloud resources.', 'Experience working in agile methodologies (Git), and scrum teams.Experience building/managing data pipelines/messaging on premise and cloud: SQL, BigQuery, Redshift, Redis, Kafka, Cloud Dataflow, Pub/Sub, etc.Demonstrated ability to design and build services with complex functionality.Ability to understand and parse XML, JSON and data serialization.Working experience with cloud platforms in GCP and AWS and their solution offerings.Coding competency in data management in Redis, App Engine, Apache products, etc.Working knowledge of web protocols RESTful APIs, gRPC, JSON and SOAP.Familiar with security standards such as OAuth 2.0, JWT tokens, two-way TLS/mTLS (1.2), encryption algorithms, hashing with SHA-256, etc.Familiar with Node frameworks such as NestJS, KoaJS, etc.Team player and self-starter with excellent interpersonal, problem-solving and presentation skills. ', 'Lilly Imaging Research and Development/Avid Radiopharmaceuticals provides technical expertise for molecular imaging to Lilly Research Laboratories. ['', 'The Data Engineer (Quality) is responsible for designing, developing, and executing test plans for automated ETL processes. This role will be part of a team adopting and implementing new data technologies and tools like Snowflake, Spark, Hadoop, HDFS, MongoDB and/or others to provide faster, more accurate, and deeper insights into our products and services. As a member of the growing data services and business analytics team, this person will be a key contributor to the successful deployment of strategic future state capabilities critical for our business. As a Data Engineer who is focused on evaluating the quality of the solutions others build, this person is responsible for producing methods of testing the quality of code produced by our Data Engineering staff and adherence to Data Engineering developed standards. This individual will also monitor jobs for performance and error as well as make/suggest changes to address those concerns by working with the members of the Data Engineering team and the Database Administrator. This position will be responsible for designing, documenting, automating, executing, and maintaining test plans and reporting back to the author the results. This individual will implement moderate to complex test scripts to test the functionality.', 'DEPARTMENT:', 'Education:', '-Moderate to advanced working knowledge of Microsoft Transact-SQL (T-SQL) or ANSI SQL and demonstrated ability to create ad-hoc SQL queries to analyze data, create prototypes, etc.', '-Under general guidance from other team members and the Quality Department, design effective and maintainable test scripts that can be automated or run as needed to ensure the solution meets the gathered requirements, as well as, meets reliability, accuracy, and performance standards.', '-Expert knowledge on how to test processes that affect data', 'RESPONSIBILITIES:', '-Analytical', 'POSITION:', 'TRAVEL REQUIREMENTS:\xa0', '-Experience with big data technologies like Snowflake, Spark, Scala, Kafka, Hbase, Hadoop, HDFS, AVRO, MongoDB are also a plus.', 'Experience:', 'FLSA:\xa0Non-Exempt', '-Occasionally take on special projects and additional duties.\xa0', 'ABOUT THE TEAM:', '-Positive and creative attitude', '-Produce and maintain accurate test plans and test system overview documentation.', '-Collaborate with various data providers to evaluate and help resolve data issues.', '-Passionate about data', '-Quality driven', 'TRAVEL REQUIREMENTS:\xa0\xa0N/A', 'EMPLOYMENT STATUS:', 'DIRECT REPORTS:', 'EMPLOYMENT STATUS:\xa0Direct Hire', 'ABOUT THE JOB:', '-Be an active participant in the development process and possess an understanding of the intent of the design and the desired outcomes of the Data Engineering team members.', 'DIRECT REPORTS:\xa0No', '-Minimum 3 years of experience with SQL as a developer or as a member of a quality team required.', '-Committed to personal development and professional growth', '-Design, document, create, test, and report on the quality of the individual modules, jobs, functions, stored procedures, SQL scripts, etc.', '-Familiarity with visual data analysis using tools such as Tableau or other Business Intelligence platforms', 'Knowledge/Skills/Abilities:', 'REPORTING SUPERVISOR:\xa0Solutions Architect, Data Services', '-Strong verbal and written communication skills', 'POSITION:\xa0SQA Data Engineer', '-Detail oriented', '\ufeffPersonal Attributes:', 'The Data Services team mission is to unify data across the enterprise to optimize the business decisions made at the strategic, tactical, and operational levels of the organization. We accomplish this by providing an Enterprise Data Warehouse, reporting platform, and business processes that can provide quality data, in a timely fashion, from any channel of the company and present it in such a manner to maximize the value of that data for both internal and external customers.', 'QUALIFICATIONS:', 'REPORTING SUPERVISOR:\xa0', '-Interact cross-functionally with a wide variety of people and teams. Work closely with development teams outside the Data Engineering group, including, Business Intelligence Developers, Product Development, and Data Scientists, who will use the data being delivered.', '-Minimum 1 year of experience with MS SQL Server, MySQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB preferred.', 'FLSA:', 'DEPARTMENT:\xa0Data Services\xa0', "Education:\xa0Bachelor's degree preferred or equivalent experience\xa0", '-Minimum 1 year of experience with database design and/or development required.', '-Review for existing standards and adjust to new standards as they mature.']

It will be your responsibility to identify and enact the capacity of\xa0data science projects\xa0throughout the company.\xa0\xa0', 'This is an opportunity for\xa0a well-rounded data scientist to\xa0use their knowledge of\xa0Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Machine Learning to get their\xa0hands on some of the toughest\xa0problems in data science. If you are looking for a real challenge to take your skills to the next level and work in one of the most advanced Data Science teams in the industry working on\xa0insurance problem\xa0– this is the role for you.\xa0\xa0', 'You will need to be a proven problem solver, critical thinker, and have an advanced technical background to join this growing, experienced team.\xa0The successful\u202fsenior data scientist\u202fwill likely have the following skills and experience:\xa0', 'Boston, MA\xa0', 'THE BENEFITS', 'THE COMPANY\xa0', 'Senior\xa0Data Scientist\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong deep learning background and familiarity with state-of-the-art NLP techniques (BERT, XLM,\xa0XLNet)\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with libraries and tools like Tensor Flow,\xa0PyTorch, Theano,\xa0Keras, and CUDA\xa0']

job_title: REMOTE Senior Data Engineer – Hadoop, Spark, Big Data
job_text: ['', 'Play a key role in driving the design, implementation, and support of data analysis and modeling environments as a senior member of the analytics team', 'Our client, a multi-billion dollar corporation, has successfully driven business results for its clients through the power of data and critical insights.', 'Take part in testing prototypes and validating test procedures', '100% REMOTE', ' If you work well in a fast-paced environment while managing multiple tasks simultaneously, we want to hear from you! With the perfect blend of industry success and a start-up vibe, this client easily attracts top tech talent in one of the hottest markets in the nation. As an employee, you’ll enjoy a generous compensation package, great work/life balance, a variety of insurance policy packages, a flexible work schedule, and more!', 'Proven understanding of REST APIs, microservices, and web applications', 'Collaborate with a variety of internal project teams to ensure solutions meet all standards and requirements', 'Play a key role in driving the design, implementation, and support of data analysis and modeling environments as a senior member of the analytics teamUtilize business requirements to build data pipelines and analytics application processes using popular big data technologiesTake part in testing prototypes and validating test proceduresCollaborate with a variety of internal project teams to ensure solutions meet all standards and requirementsCarry out root cause analysis for complex issues and work quickly to find viable long-term solutions', 'Please note, this is a\xa0100% REMOTE\xa0job opportunity, so you’ll have the ability to work from home.\xa0Must reside within the United States.', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or related field', 'What’s in it for you:', 'As business continues to thrive, our client is excited to hire an experienced Senior Data Engineer to join the tech team that’s in hyper-growth mode. Don’t miss your chance to take on the exciting challenge of pushing this company’s world-class product to the next level!', 'Apply today to get the ball rolling on your next big career move.', 'Strong communication and collaboration skills as you’ll be interfacing with various teams', 'What you get to do:', 'Hands-on experience with Amazon Web Services (AWS)', 'No sponsorship available. No third-party/C2C candidates.', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or related field5+ years of experience developing data pipelines using popular big data technologies (Hadoop, Spark, Hive, etc.)Hands-on experience with Amazon Web Services (AWS)Proven understanding of REST APIs, microservices, and web applicationsStrong communication and collaboration skills as you’ll be interfacing with various teams', 'What you need to succeed:', '5+ years of experience developing data pipelines using popular big data technologies (Hadoop, Spark, Hive, etc.)', 'Senior Data Engineer', 'Utilize business requirements to build data pipelines and analytics application processes using popular big data technologies', 'Carry out root cause analysis for complex issues and work quickly to find viable long-term solutions']

['', ' Familiarity with UNIX and shared high-performance computing environments is desirable. ', 'Job Facts', ' Strong background in basic molecular biology and/or genomics with extensive industry or academic experience within a focused area of research utilizing advanced sequencing technologies. ', ' Documented scientific accomplishments as evidenced by strong list of publications in reputable journals. ', ' Excellent communication and strong interpersonal skills. ', ' Experience with one or both of the following: long-read sequencing technology (e.g. Oxford Nanopore Technologies/PacBio) and single cell sequencing (e.g. 10x Genomics/Drop-seq/InDrop) is desirable. ', 'As a Strong Candidate, You Will Have', 'The Position', ' MSc with 3-5 years of relevant experience or PhD in the fields of Molecular Biology, Bioengineering or related discipline. Post-doctoral experience is not required, however, valuable. ', ' Ability to manage multiple projects in parallel and work with multidisciplinary teams. ', 'Who We Are', ' MSc with 3-5 years of relevant experience or PhD in the fields of Molecular Biology, Bioengineering or related discipline. Post-doctoral experience is not required, however, valuable.  Strong background in basic molecular biology and/or genomics with extensive industry or academic experience within a focused area of research utilizing advanced sequencing technologies.  Experience with one or both of the following: long-read sequencing technology (e.g. Oxford Nanopore Technologies/PacBio) and single cell sequencing (e.g. 10x Genomics/Drop-seq/InDrop) is desirable.  Familiarity with UNIX and shared high-performance computing environments is desirable.  Experience in the use of a high-level programming language such as R or Python for data analysis and computational biology is desirable.  Documented scientific accomplishments as evidenced by strong list of publications in reputable journals.  Ability to manage multiple projects in parallel and work with multidisciplinary teams.  Excellent communication and strong interpersonal skills.  A superior work ethic combined with a strong motivation to make a substantial contribution to Genentech projects that may change the lives of patients for the better. ['', ' https://www.nature.com/articles/s41586-019-1825-8https://www.nature.com/articles/nbt.4112  https://science.sciencemag.org/content/361/6409/1380  https://www.nature.com/articles/s41467-020-18181-6  https://journals.plos.org/ploscompbiol/article?id=10.1371/journal.pcbi.1008173 ', ' Prepare manuscripts, and present research findings as abstracts or oral presentations (travel may be required)  Attend weekly group meetings and 1:1 meetings to: 1) present data and interpretation of results; 2) troubleshoot research results and 3) suggest next steps  Attend research related meetings including but not limited to Thursday PM SPORE seminars, Cancer Biology meetings, journal clubs  Perform experiments utilizing appropriate lab or computational techniques with proficiency, evaluate results, and determine the next steps to complete project and present data. Think independently and problem solve. Stay on top of the literature and build skills to maximize the projects’ potential.  Duties as assigned ', ' We SUPPORT each other—Respect leads to trust, which leads to excellence ', ' Attend weekly group meetings and 1:1 meetings to: 1) present data and interpretation of results; 2) troubleshoot research results and 3) suggest next steps ', 'Additional Details', ' https://www.nature.com/articles/s41467-020-18181-6 ', ' PhD with a m inimum of 3 years as a graduate student  Specialty: computational biology, statistics, computer science or machine learning  Excellent communication, analytical and organizational skills  Ability to work independently and as part of a team while being collaborative in resolving problems  Passion for science and inquiry  Ability to synthesize one’s own results and others to formulate hypotheses  Energy and drive to coordinate multiple projects simultaneously ', ' Experience in developing computational approaches for modeling genomics data ', ' All are welcome ', 'Multiomics', ' Prepare manuscripts, and present research findings as abstracts or oral presentations (travel may be required) ', ' Duties as assigned ', ' Energy and drive to coordinate multiple projects simultaneously ', 'Machine Learning/Statistics', ' Background in one and more of following topics: mixture models, deep learning, dimensionality reduction ', ' Excellent communication, analytical and organizational skills ', 'Imaging – ', 'Options', ' We act BOLDLY—Breakthroughs require pushing the boundaries of science, exploring new frontiers, and thinking differently ', ' Imaging – Performing analysis of existing genomics data of cancerous cells to aid the design of super high resolution microscopy experiments for imaging the chromatin organization of cancerous cells. The successful candidate will have the opportunity to analyze cutting edge super high resolution microscopy experiments and develop computational methods for joint analysis of genomics and imaging data. ', 'Duties Include', ' We act BOLDLY—Breakthroughs require pushing the boundaries of science, exploring new frontiers, and thinking differently  We SUPPORT each other—Respect leads to trust, which leads to excellence  We work as a CONNECTED team — We must leverage our collective brain power to conquer cancer because no one individual can do it alone ', ' Experience in working with existing software for the analysis of next generation sequencing genomics data such as RNA-seq, ATAC-seq and Hi-C, including their single-cell versions ', ' Machine Learning/Statistics – Developing machine learning methods and/or statistical models to study the organization of the epigenome and three dimensional structure of the genome using cutting edge genomics and super resolution microscopy datasets. Developed algorithms will be used to deeply characterize cell populations and identify features that are indicative of cell state. Techniques such as (but not limited to) dimensionality reduction, clustering, and predictive modeling will be utilized. ', ' Ability to work independently and as part of a team while being collaborative in resolving problems ', ' PhD with a m inimum of 3 years as a graduate student ', 'Required Qualifications', ' Multiomics– Developing computational methods for the analysis of single-cell multiomics technologies that are able to characterize multiple “omes” of a single cell concurrently, such as the epigenome and the transcriptome (see references below). These methods will be utilized for deep characterization of healthy and cancerous cells and investigate the links between the transcriptome, the epigenome and 3D conformation of chromatin. ', ' Specialty: computational biology, statistics, computer science or machine learning ', ' https://science.sciencemag.org/content/361/6409/1380 ', ' We work as a CONNECTED team — We must leverage our collective brain power to conquer cancer because no one individual can do it alone ', ' Programming experience with python/R  Background in one and more of following topics: mixture models, deep learning, dimensionality reduction  Experience in working with existing software for the analysis of next generation sequencing genomics data such as RNA-seq, ATAC-seq and Hi-C, including their single-cell versions  Experience in developing computational approaches for modeling genomics data  Ability to clearly communicate and collaborate with researchers from diverse backgrounds, including wet-lab scientists ', ' Ability to synthesize one’s own results and others to formulate hypotheses ', ' https://www.nature.com/articles/s41586-019-1825-8https://www.nature.com/articles/nbt.4112 ', ' Attend research related meetings including but not limited to Thursday PM SPORE seminars, Cancer Biology meetings, journal clubs ', '1-2', ' Computational Biology ', ' Programming experience with python/R ', ' Ability to clearly communicate and collaborate with researchers from diverse backgrounds, including wet-lab scientists ', ' Genomics/single cell genomics Modeling and analyzing next-generation sequencing datasets that measure the transcriptome and the epigenome, with an emphasis on the single-cell variants, such as single cell RNA-seq and single cell ATAC-seq. The successful candidate will use both existing tools and develop their own computational methods to analyze such datasets for characterization of healthy and cancerous cell populations. ', ' https://journals.plos.org/ploscompbiol/article?id=10.1371/journal.pcbi.1008173 ', ' Function/Duties of Position ', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Department Overview', ' Perform experiments utilizing appropriate lab or computational techniques with proficiency, evaluate results, and determine the next steps to complete project and present data. Think independently and problem solve. Stay on top of the literature and build skills to maximize the projects’ potential. ', 'Genomics/single cell genomics', 'Candidate Would Work With CEDAR And OHSU Scientists Including Gurkan Yardimci, Hisham Mohammed, Andrew Adey And Xiaolin Nan Initially And With Increasing Collaborations Over Time', ' Passion for science and inquiry ', 'Select References']

['', 'You are an adept programmer and can write high-quality code (C++ preferred).', 'Who We Are', 'You will have the flexibility to publish to top-tier conferences and deploy models in our product.', 'About You', 'You will research and develop advanced machine learning algorithms that solve complex problems to dramatically accelerate autonomy deployment.You will have the flexibility to publish to top-tier conferences and deploy models in our product.You will produce robust, well-tested, and scalable C++ software.You will collaborate closely with talented team members across the autonomy org.', 'About the Work', 'You are a quick learner, a hard worker, and a good team player.', 'You will research and develop advanced machine learning algorithms that solve complex problems to dramatically accelerate autonomy deployment.', "Our software team is growing and we are looking for machine learning R&D experts to join us. Machine Learning is an essential cornerstone of the work we do and you'll be making a massive impact. Our founders have dedicated their careers to machine learning and robotics so you would be working alongside them and some of the other brightest minds from academia and industry in this field.", 'You will produce robust, well-tested, and scalable C++ software.', 'You have deep expertise and prior experience in some or many of the following areas: machine learning, deep learning, reinforcement learning, generative modeling, etc.', 'You have critical thinking to tackle challenging research problems, are resilient to failure, and have a passion to deploy the solutions into the product.', 'You have an advanced degree (Ph.D. preferred) in Machine Learning or Computer Science (or other related fields) or have seasoned industry experience in related fields.', 'Nuro is a robotics start-up whose mission is to accelerate the benefits of robotics for everyday life. We have an elite team of entrepreneurs and engineers, designers, and scientists. We believe AI and robotics are at the cusp of transforming daily life and we are dedicated to building meaningful products with this technology. Join us and play a critical role in our mission.', 'You will collaborate closely with talented team members across the autonomy org.', 'About the Role', 'You have deep expertise and prior experience in some or many of the following areas: machine learning, deep learning, reinforcement learning, generative modeling, etc.You have critical thinking to tackle challenging research problems, are resilient to failure, and have a passion to deploy the solutions into the product.You are a quick learner, a hard worker, and a good team player.You are an adept programmer and can write high-quality code (C++ preferred).You have an advanced degree (Ph.D. preferred) in Machine Learning or Computer Science (or other related fields) or have seasoned industry experience in related fields.']

job_title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer, Homefeed Ranking
job_text: ['', " Apply the latest advances in deep learning and machine learning to personalize Pinterest user's Homefeeds Develop new features to improve our user and pin understanding in our models Impact 400M+ monthly active users by developing the next generation of discovery technologies Work in a high-impact environment with quick experimentation and product launches ", 'About Pinterest', 'Work in a high-impact environment with quick experimentation and product launches', "Apply the latest advances in deep learning and machine learning to personalize Pinterest user's Homefeeds", 'Develop new features to improve our user and pin understanding in our models', ' Passionate about recommendation systems and deep learning 5+ years experience applying machine learning methods in settings like recommender systems, search, user modeling, image recognition, graph representation learning, natural language processing Experience building pipelines for large scale data processing', 'Impact 400M+ monthly active users by developing the next generation of discovery technologies', 'Passionate about recommendation systems and deep learning', 'What We’re Looking For', '5+ years experience applying machine learning methods in settings like recommender systems, search, user modeling, image recognition, graph representation learning, natural language processing', 'What You’ll Do', 'Experience building pipelines for large scale data processing']

['', 'Strong communication and collaboration skills', 'Summary', 'Proven track-record of high quality software development (e.g. on GitHub)', '\xa0', 'About the position\xa0As a Sr ML Engineer you will become a core member of the company and execute on ambitious milestones, taking ownership of your own projects. You will work closely with the leadership team within a highly collaborative company culture. You will own the design and implementation of infrastructure for reliable and highly performant deep learning and analytics pipelines with the main focus on the detection and classification of dental conditions from x-ray images. You will further play a critical role in defining and executing processes for managing large amounts of data, defining data sampling approaches and performance evaluations. ', 'You will be able to contribute and grow your technical skills by building end to end highly impactful software medical devices that will ultimately impact the lives of millions of people. Your contributions will play a key role in building a great company from an early stage. We provide a competitive compensation package.', 'Summary\xa0Join VideaHealth as key member of our Artificial Intelligence team to develop complex ML systems that eventually improve dental health of millions of people.', 'Experience with at least one deep learning framework (e.g. PyTorch, TF, Keras)', 'In your role as ML Engineer you will become part of exciting collaborations with researchers, physicians, and regulatory bodies. You will collaborate with company advisors from MIT and Harvard whose expertise span machine learning, medical imaging, and getting products successfully through FDA. We are looking for an individual with a strong Machine Learning background who is not shy to take proactive responsibilities. ', 'Strong software development skills including testing (Python)', 'Experience in Data Analysis (e.g. statistics, performance metrics)', 'M.S. or PhD in Computer Science or related field.Minimum of 3 years of hands-on development building deep learning and/or data pipelinesExperience with at least one deep learning framework (e.g. PyTorch, TF, Keras)Strong software development skills including testing (Python)Experience in reading & implementing technical research papersStrong communication and collaboration skillsProactive, ambitious, and fast learner\xa0', 'Requirements', 'Proven track-record of high quality software development (e.g. on GitHub)Experience in working with medical images or related Computer Vision problemsExperience in Data Analysis (e.g. statistics, performance metrics)Experience working with cloud based platforms / providers (e.g. AWS)Leadership/Mentorship experience', 'M.S. or PhD in Computer Science or related field.', 'Preferred', 'Experience working with cloud based platforms / providers (e.g. AWS)', 'Leadership/Mentorship experience', 'Proactive, ambitious, and fast learner\xa0', 'Experience in reading & implementing technical research papers', 'Experience in working with medical images or related Computer Vision problems', 'About the position', 'Minimum of 3 years of hands-on development building deep learning and/or data pipelines']

['', 'Must have expertise with Python/R and SQL', 'Data Engineer at Hearts & Science', 'Experience with ETL packages such as SSIS, StreamSets, or related', 'Knowledge of Business Intelligence Tools, Enterprise Reporting, Report Development, data modeling, data warehouse architecture, data warehousing concepts.', '1-2 years of experience as a Database Engineer focused on SQL (preference for PostgreSQL)SQL experience is a must (being able to write and program)Comfortable with AWS cloud (S3, EC2, EMR, Redshift, Lambda, etc.)Must have expertise with Python/R and SQLExperience with ETL packages such as SSIS, StreamSets, or relatedExperience with git version control preferably GitLab.', 'We are for smart engineers who want to work in media. Using data and analytics you will help H&S deliver exceptional marketing for our clients. Monitor the laboratory to ensure compliance with all applicable regulations, guidelines, and/or SOPs. Manages internal inventory database of pre-characterized finished goods. Plans and completes distribution and shipping activities. Diligently tracks movement, usage, and shipping of finished goods. Performs cycle counts and audit trail investigations.', 'Bachelor of Art’s or Bachelor of Science Degree; Master’s Degree preferred5 years related work experience in Biology, Chemistry, Biotechnology, Tissue Banking, Manufacturing Laboratory, and/or Research Laboratory; 7 years directly related work experience in Biology, Chemistry, Biotechnology, Tissue Banking, Manufacturing Laboratory, and/or Research Laboratory preferred']

job_title: Post Doctorate Materials Scientist or Chemist
job_text: ['', 'Ability to interact with a diverse group of associates including scientists, engineers, and technicians.', 'Responsibilities Of The Post-Doc Scientist', 'Responsible for new material / technology development in support of technology programs to improve tire performance, manufacturing, and cost according to business defined goals and long-term strategy.', 'Ph.D. in Materials Science or Chemistry (or expect the degree within 3 months)Must have in-depth theoretical knowledge and practical experience with analytical techniques used in material science.Strong background in material science or synthetic chemistry and/or polymers, polymer composites.Experience in understanding structure/property relationships in materials is preferred.Have knowledge of tire-related raw materials (polymers / filler / chemicals / fabrics / steel) and their characterization techniques.Understanding & interpretation of rubber composite design/testing is preferred.Previous work experience in tire compound or steel / fabric reinforced composites or related field is preferred.Ability to interact with a diverse group of associates including scientists, engineers, and technicians.Strong interpersonal and presentation skills required.Works well in team environment.Must be self-starting and self-motivated.', 'Ph.D. in Materials Science or Chemistry (or expect the degree within 3 months)', 'Completes assignments in a timely manner under the supervision of a senior scientist.', 'Responsible for new material / technology development in support of technology programs to improve tire performance, manufacturing, and cost according to business defined goals and long-term strategy.Translation of tire product performance requirements, such as: rolling resistance, handling, durability, ride comfort & acoustics, into specific material characteristics.Responsible for material selection, design of new lab composite test(s) & the development of the understanding of thermal/mechanical composite behavior for the purpose of addressing current & future tire material needs.Responsible for technical approvals of alternate sources for established tire materials utilizing standard processes and tools.Develop & lead external collaborations in support of project objectives where appropriate.Provide support to internal departments including procurement, tire engineering, Quality, and Goodyear Tire plants. Provide on-site assistance during plant trials as required. Technical assessment of suppliers, and tire product line support relative to tire materials may be required.Applies and interprets standard scientific theories, concepts, and techniques.Compiles data for the preparation of reports and presentations.Completes assignments in a timely manner under the supervision of a senior scientist.', 'Translation of tire product performance requirements, such as: rolling resistance, handling, durability, ride comfort & acoustics, into specific material characteristics.', 'Responsible for material selection, design of new lab composite test(s) & the development of the understanding of thermal/mechanical composite behavior for the purpose of addressing current & future tire material needs.', 'Job Qualifications', 'Understanding & interpretation of rubber composite design/testing is preferred.', 'Previous work experience in tire compound or steel / fabric reinforced composites or related field is preferred.', 'Have knowledge of tire-related raw materials (polymers / filler / chemicals / fabrics / steel) and their characterization techniques.', 'Must be self-starting and self-motivated.', 'Additional Information', ' This position is not permanent. It is for a fixed duration of two years with the possibility for you to apply for a full-time position after your fellowship is complete, subject to your performance and business need.', 'Responsible for technical approvals of alternate sources for established tire materials utilizing standard processes and tools.', 'Compiles data for the preparation of reports and presentations.', 'Provide support to internal departments including procurement, tire engineering, Quality, and Goodyear Tire plants. Provide on-site assistance during plant trials as required. Technical assessment of suppliers, and tire product line support relative to tire materials may be required.', 'Must have in-depth theoretical knowledge and practical experience with analytical techniques used in material science.', 'Applies and interprets standard scientific theories, concepts, and techniques.', 'Works well in team environment.', 'Strong interpersonal and presentation skills required.', 'Strong background in material science or synthetic chemistry and/or polymers, polymer composites.', 'Develop & lead external collaborations in support of project objectives where appropriate.', 'Experience in understanding structure/property relationships in materials is preferred.']
