['', 'Responsibilities/Job Duties', 'Summary', 'Specialized Experience. Specialized experience is experience that equipped the applicant with the particular knowledge, skills, and abilities to perform successfully the duties of the position, and that is typically in or related to the work of the position to be filled.', 'Designs and implements scientific surveys/studies and analyzes and interprets study data and results.Develops new concepts, methods, and strategies for obtaining and using data for the evaluation of tobacco and/or other regulated products regulations.Develops research projects to fill gaps in knowledge related to regulatory decisions.Provides scientific support in developing and/or updating guidance and policy.Reviews, evaluates, and compiles data to prepare briefings, presentations, and technical or scientific reports to support agency recommendations on scientific issues pertaining to the evaluation of tobacco product regulation.', 'Provides scientific support in developing and/or updating guidance and policy.', 'GS', 'GS-13: Have one (1) year of specialized experience equivalent to the GS-12 grade level in the Federal service that includes experience: preparing and presenting briefings on scientific data related to regulated product, designing, developing, and implementing public health protocols or conducting scientific surveys/studies or projects regarding tobacco and/or other products, designed to improve public health.', 'Designs and implements scientific surveys/studies and analyzes and interprets study data and results.', " Bachelor's or graduate/higher level degree: major study in an academic field related to the medical field, health sciences, or allied sciences appropriate to the work of the position. This degree must be from an educational program from an accrediting body recognized by the U.S. Department of Education at the time the degree was obtained.", "The Center for Tobacco Products (CTP) of the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) is responsible for implementing the Family Smoking Prevention and Tobacco Control Act. This law gives FDA authority over tobacco products by adding a new chapter to the Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act. The Tobacco Control Act gives FDA the authority to regulate tobacco products and manufacturers based on the best available science and CTP is responsible for both assessing and fostering that science-base. CTP's actions have significant public health and consumer protection impact, and are among the most important issues faced by the Agency in its long and distinguished history.", 'Specialized Experience', 'Health Scientist GS-0601-13', ' Specialized experience is experience that equipped the applicant with the particular knowledge, skills, and abilities to perform successfully the duties of the position, and that is typically in or related to the work of the position to be filled.', 'Basic Requirement', '0601-13', 'Minimum Qualifications', 'The position of Health Scientist falls under the 0601 occupational series. To qualify for this position at grade GS-13, you must meet the following:', 'Reviews, evaluates, and compiles data to prepare briefings, presentations, and technical or scientific reports to support agency recommendations on scientific issues pertaining to the evaluation of tobacco product regulation.', 'Only applications submitted via USAJOBS at the link below along with appropriate supporting documentation, including transcripts, will be considered:', 'NOTE: Applicants must submit all relevant transcripts that demonstrate you possess the required education to meet the Basic Qualifications.', 'Develops new concepts, methods, and strategies for obtaining and using data for the evaluation of tobacco and/or other regulated products regulations.', 'Develops research projects to fill gaps in knowledge related to regulatory decisions.', 'For further consideration for the Health Scientist, ', 'The position of Health Scientist falls under the 0601 occupational series. To qualify for this position at grade GS', '*Open/Close Date:12/22/2020—12/28/2020', '13, you must meet the following:', 'For further consideration for the Health Scientist, GS-0601-13, in addition to the basic education requirement listed above, you must meet the following requirement(s):', 'This Direct-Hire position is in the Food and Drug Administration and is located in the Center for Tobacco Products (CTP), Office of the Science (OS), Division of Individual Health Science (DIHS), located in Beltsville, Maryland.', 'Job Vacancy link: https://www.usajobs.gov/GetJob/ViewDetails/587600200']

['', 'Stay current and benchmark industry trends, theories, methods and processes ', 'Educate and evangelize user research to business partners and senior leaders ', 'RESPONSIBILITIES:', 'Plan, conduct, analyze and report research as needed ', 'Deliver strategic recommendations and findings with confidence ', 'Master’s degree in Psychology, Human-Computer Interaction, Human Factors, or another related social science or research disciplinePhD in Psychology, Sociology, UX, Human-Computer Interaction, Human Factors, or related research field (preferred) Experience using remote usability platforms such as UserZoom, UserTesting.com or others 4+ years’ experience in applied product/design research with a proven record of delivering compelling and well-designed studies that have produced actionable insights Experience in financial services, healthcare, transportation, hospitality or an industry with a high degree of systemic complexity (preferred) Excellent communication, presentation and collaboration skills Expertise in a wide variety of qualitative and quantitative methods and study design principles Cognitive psychology background, particularly in behavioral economics (preferred) ', 'PhD in Psychology, Sociology, UX, Human-Computer Interaction, Human Factors, or related research field (preferred) ', 'REQUIREMENTS:', 'Expertise in a wide variety of qualitative and quantitative methods and study design principles ', 'Determine proper research methodology for each study ', 'Lead and facilitate user research and usability testing sessions ', '3Ci is recruiting a Senior User Experience Researcher for our rapidly growing client in Atlanta, GA. As the Senior User Experience Researcher, you be responsible for efforts that have high visibility, complexity, or sensitivity for the bank. You will serve as the subject matter expert for designing, coordinating, and executing a program of research in a complex, multifaceted domain. ', 'Excellent communication, presentation and collaboration skills ', 'Plan, conduct, analyze and report research as needed Generate insights that influence product strategy and prioritization Determine proper research methodology for each study Deliver strategic recommendations and findings with confidence Develop and maintain strong internal partnerships with stakeholders and business partners and work with them, fellow researchers, cross-functional teams and partners to devise sound research strategies, timelines and goals Identify, recruit and schedule appropriate participants for research studies Conduct stakeholder interviews, competitive analysis, and review existing research and insights to assist with defining user requirements Lead and facilitate user research and usability testing sessions Educate and evangelize user research to business partners and senior leaders Stay current and benchmark industry trends, theories, methods and processes ', '4+ years’ experience in applied product/design research with a proven record of delivering compelling and well-designed studies that have produced actionable insights ', '3Ci, an MAU company ', 'Experience in financial services, healthcare, transportation, hospitality or an industry with a high degree of systemic complexity (preferred) ', 'Senior User Experience Researcher ', ' ', 'Senior User Experience Researcher', 'Generate insights that influence product strategy and prioritization ', 'REQUIREMENTS: \xa0 ', 'Cognitive psychology background, particularly in behavioral economics (preferred) ', '3Ci is recruiting a Senior User Experience Researcher for our rapidly growing client in Atlanta, GA', 'EOE: Minorities / Females / Protected Veterans / Individuals with Disabilities are encouraged to apply', '3Ci, an MAU company', 'Since day one, 3Ci has believed in placing the value of people and relationships above all else. By building the business one relationship at a time and putting people first, 3Ci has led a movement: to put people first, to be partners not vendors, and prioritize our client’s success as our own. ', 'Develop and maintain strong internal partnerships with stakeholders and business partners and work with them, fellow researchers, cross-functional teams and partners to devise sound research strategies, timelines and goals ', 'Conduct stakeholder interviews, competitive analysis, and review existing research and insights to assist with defining user requirements ', 'Master’s degree in Psychology, Human-Computer Interaction, Human Factors, or another related social science or research disciplinePhD in Psychology, Sociology, UX, Human-Computer Interaction, Human Factors, or related research field (preferred) ', 'RESPONSIBILITIES: ', 'Experience using remote usability platforms such as UserZoom, UserTesting.com or others ', 'Identify, recruit and schedule appropriate participants for research studies ']

testing protocols (remote and in-person), card sorting, tree testing, user surveys, user interviews, field research, persona development, journey mapping, and competitive heuristic analysis.Experience research applications for usability testing, card sorting, tree testing, online surveys, such as Usertesting.com, Helio, Optimal Workshop, or similar online tools.UX related applications such as Axure, Sketch, Adobe CS are preferred.', 'Technical Skills', 'Experience in presenting UX research findings to stakeholders.', 'Advocate and execute UX research protocol by applying best practices, while ensuring objectives and expectations are met at various stages of the design and development lifecycles.', 'Plan and conduct usability studies to identify user behaviors and provide recommendations based on defensible findings.', 'Experience in partnering with UX practitioners to develop and design concept prototypes for different types of usability studies.', 'Remote research applications for usability testing, card sorting, tree testing, online surveys, such as Usertesting.com, Helio, Optimal Workshop, or similar online tools.', 'Educate our cross-functional team members on UX research practice, as well as the value of empathy and user-centered design in meeting business objectives.', 'Lead all UX Research efforts across our portfolios within the organization.', '\xa0Since our founding in 1931, DeVry University has focused on delivering a different kind of education – one based on experiential learning with real-world applications. When you join our team, you’re choosing an institution that serves students who are different, too: a diverse group of go-getters from all walks of life.', 'Experience in facilitating UX research-related discussion.', 'Experience in planning and conducting user interviews and recruiting participants.\xa0', 'Collaborate with cross-functional team members and stakeholders to identify UX research opportunities that inform and improve strategy for the organization.', '5+ years of hands-on UX research experience.', 'Proficiency in creating user journey maps and user personas based on primary or secondary data sources.', 'Demonstration of strong verbal and written communication skills to evaluate, aggregate, and deliver cohesive UX research findings.', 'To be part of our well-integrated Digital Strategy & Experience team, this individual will demonstrate the ability to partner with Marketing, Analytics, Product Management and Technology team members. Strong communication is essential to addressing research-based rationales with our agency partners on day-to-day inquiries.', 'Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.', 'Essential Duties and Responsibilities:', 'Experience in conducting usability tests for both moderated and unmoderated settings.', 'Maintain an effective dialog with external and internal partners during our design and development cycles.', 'Manage, estimate, conduct, moderate and analyze any UX specific research activities by using both qualitative and quantitative research methods.', 'Qualifications:', 'Proficient in a variety of UX research methods and tools, including usability testing protocols (remote and in-person), card sorting, tree testing, user surveys, user interviews, field research, persona development, journey mapping, and competitive heuristic analysis.', 'Please include your research portfolio as part of your application.', 'UX related applications such as Axure, Sketch, Adobe CS are preferred.', 'We are looking for engaged, caring colleagues to join our organization in serving our students. We take extra pride in our dedicated support teams, as well as our outstanding faculty members who have often worked for years in the fields that they teach. We believe all our colleagues deserve opportunities to reach their goals. Whether it’s career advancement, maintaining a healthy lifestyle or saving for retirement, our comprehensive benefits and professional development offerings can help you meet your goals.', 'Lead all UX Research efforts across our portfolios within the organization.Manage, estimate, conduct, moderate and analyze any UX specific research activities by using both qualitative and quantitative research methods.Collaborate with cross-functional team members and stakeholders to identify UX research opportunities that inform and improve strategy for the organization.Advocate and execute UX research protocol by applying best practices, while ensuring objectives and expectations are met at various stages of the design and development lifecycles.Plan and conduct usability studies to identify user behaviors and provide recommendations based on defensible findings.Evaluate, synthesize, and present all research findings with actionable recommendations.Educate our cross-functional team members on UX research practice, as well as the value of empathy and user-centered design in meeting business objectives.Partner with UX, Marketing, Analytics, Technology, and Product Management teams, and provide appropriate support during our Product Discovery Stage.Maintain an effective dialog with external and internal partners during our design and development cycles.Embrace the ever-changing market and technology and apply them to design recommendations with the latest trends and needs of our users in mind.', 'DeVry is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity employer. We believe diversity is essential to our educational mission and to the success of our community. We are committed to fostering a working environment where differences are respected, valued and embraced.', 'Embrace the ever-changing market and technology and apply them to design recommendations with the latest trends and needs of our users in mind.', 'Experience designing research studies that inform the development and design of journey mapping, user experience models, and user personas.', 'Partner with UX, Marketing, Analytics, Technology, and Product Management teams, and provide appropriate support during our Product Discovery Stage.', 'Experience in developing test plans, test scripts for both moderated and unmoderated usability testing.', 'Opportunity:', 'Must possess the traits of being a self-starter, who can work independently, a team player, who can advocate and appreciate the beauty of collaboration.', 'BS or MS degree or equivalent experience relevant to functional area.\xa0', 'If you want to be a part of an organization focused on providing high-quality education, care and attention, we invite you to apply for a position today.', 'Evaluate, synthesize, and present all research findings with actionable recommendations.', 'The Senior User Experience Researcher requires a pragmatic, and investigative mindset when it comes to identifying user behaviors and motivations. This individual should possess a strong knowledge of various research methods including; observation-based research, task analysis, and other feedback-collecting methodologies. The output will serve as justifiable context and insight into the process of defining holistic experience and design strategies for our organization. This individual will act as one of our authorities inspiring change and enforcing data-driven design. This role reports directly to our Director of Digital Strategy & Experience.', 'We know our colleagues are integral to the success of the institution. At DeVry, we’re guided by our culture of care, and we embrace values that teach us to care for students, self and colleagues. It’s one way we position our colleagues for success.']

['• Solid background in Database administration and design, along with Data Modeling with star schema, slowing changing dimensions, and/or data capture.', '• Strong understanding of network configuration, devices, protocols, speeds and optimizations', '• Experience building data pipelines.', '• Experience installing and administering multi-node Hadoop clusters', '• Strong understanding of the Java development, debugging & profiling', '• Significant previous work writing to network-based APIs, preferably REST/JSON or XML/SOAP', '• Experience designing and deploying production streaming solutions using tools such as Apache Storm, Flink, etc.', '• Excellent verbal and written communications', '• Strong understanding with various enterprise security solutions such as LDAP and/or Kerberos', '• Demonstrated experience implementing big data use-cases, understanding of standard design patterns commonly used in Hadoop-based deployments.', '• More than 5 years of experience architecting large scale storage, data center and /or globally distributed solutions', '• Ability to understand and translate customer requirements into technical requirements', '• Experience designing and deploying production large-scale Hadoop solutions', '• Experience designing data queries against data in a Hadoop environment using tools such as Apache Hive, Apache Druid, Apache Phoenix or others.', '• Strong experience implementing software and/or solutions in the enterprise Linux or Unix environment']

['', 'Translate uFMEA, risk/hazard analysis, and/or IFU into an appropriate usability testing protocol. ', 'You like to explore new territories and learn from others. You can successfully lead clients through problem definition and the innovation process during workshop sessions. You have a deep understanding of user research methodologies, concepting processes, approaches, and tools, and take the initiative to improve them. You’re also comfortable with global travel (role may include up to 30% travel), either on your own or as part of a team and feel confident leading research teams wherever you’re operating. ', 'Design, execute, and report on usability (human factors) research at various stages of product development, from early prototypes to validation testing required by FDA. ', 'Work with the Human Factors and Usability Manager and Director of User Research on improving departmental processes around human factors and usability research. ', '\xa0', 'Moderate usability research sessions with confidence and poise to gather key insights on potential use events that occur. ', 'Please send your resume and portfolio to career@bresslergroup.com!', 'You have an advanced degree in human factors engineering, engineering psychology, or another research-heavy discipline. You have at least 7 years of hands-on, professional applied human factors research experience. You have a track record of delivering regulatory compliant validation research and providing guidance leading to the successful launch of physical products. Ideally, you have worked in a consulting environment for at least one year and are familiar with how they operate. ', 'Write and execute generative and evaluative research protocols, analyze research insights and data, and write test reports. ', 'You are curious. ', 'Build human factors and usability research proposals and budgets. ', 'Provide input on FDA and Global usability regulatory standards (IEC 62366-1:2015, ANSI/AAMI HE75, EU MDR) ', 'At Bresslergroup, we are a motivated lot of thinkers, makers, and problem solvers. We challenge and inspire each other every day. BGers are curious, clever, and confident, and we look for candidates who are all those things and more. Our firm is technically grounded, so we can take any idea — no matter how complex — and make it a reality, while simultaneously keeping our design simple and clean. With six disciplines under one roof, we work in multidisciplinary teams whose combined research, creative, and technical expertise add value throughout a collaborative product development process. This is how we remain reliably innovative.  The research team at Bresslergroup works to provide insights to our design and engineering teams, as well as directly to our clients, to ensure that all research, design, and development efforts remain firmly grounded in user needs. ', 'You have established yourself in thought-leadership within the research industry. You are comfortable with ambiguity and complexity, because sometimes that leads to the most unique, unexpected design solutions. You possess a strong work ethic and are willing to “do what it takes” to get the job done. ', 'Your Purpose ', 'You have excellent writing, presentation, and interpersonal skills – all needed for research, facilitation, interviews, and client presentations. Your writing is concise, grammatically correct, and has the appropriate tone. You are an effective listener and contributor at client meetings and have demonstrated your ability to document pertinent information/action items/opportunities, as well as provide a written summary post-meeting. You possess strong empathy and exceptional verbal communication skills that allow you to communicate with anyone, and unlock what users are thinking and feeling about a product. ', 'Your Team ', 'You are confident. ', 'You have a true passion for evaluative product research and human-centered product design, as evidenced by your education and career choices. You have a deep familiarity with all forms of evaluative product research and can confidently guide a client in defining the user groups, intended uses, and use environments of the product. You can write effective proposals, plans, technical reports, and publications, and use them to improve the effectiveness, safety, and usability of consumer products and medical devices. You have extensive experience conducting formative testing and validation studies. You demonstrate high standards of workmanship and attention to detail and can help improve departmental processes and best practices. You can develop, support, and defend design recommendations based on your experience with design research, ergonomics, and human factors principles. ', 'As a Senior Human Factors and Usability Researcher, you’ll work on-site in our Center City Philadelphia office and in collaboration with our interaction designers, industrial designers, and engineering team to ensure that products are safe and easy to use by the end-user. You will guide your colleagues and our clients to be compliant with usability regulatory standards and guidance across the globe. You will be challenged to lead every phase of human factors research for products, both medical and consumer in nature, from planning to data collection to reporting. ', 'More About You', 'Your Purpose', ' ', "Do you have experience doing hands-on usability research? We're looking for someone who is passionate about improving the safety, usability, and efficacy for our clients' products!", "Do you have experience doing hands-on usability research? We're looking for someone who is passionate about improving the safety, usability, and efficacy for our clients' products! ", 'You are clever. ', 'Assist in defining user needs, translation of needs into measurable specifications, and the heuristic review of device-user interfaces. ', 'More About You ', 'You can work on-site in our Philadelphia office. In addition to your research skills, you may have experience in graphic design, photo, video, and/or audio recording/editing. ', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Your Team', '\xa0 ', 'Key Responsibilities ']

job_title: Head, Program Management - Drug Discovery & Development
job_text: ['', 'Must be able to support multiple project teams simultaneously and have the agility to work in a fast-paced environment', 'Manages both project team and R&D meetings and is responsible for scheduling meetings, preparing agendas and coordinating pre-read materials with input from team members, facilitating meetings that focus on clear decisions and actions, and writing minutes', 'Monte Rosa Therapeutics rational approach in targeting disease-causing proteins for degradation will deliver pioneering therapies for cancer and other diseases. Delivering this new generation of treatments to the patients requires a conceptual change.\xa0Monte Rosa recognizes this urgent need and is missioned to develop innovative protein degraders as a solution. Combining deep knowledge, insight and leading-edge science, our integrated engine is built for that purpose.', '\xa0', 'Attends functional area-specific meetings to ensure alignment with project teams and R&D leadership', 'Head, Program Management - Drug Discovery', 'MS or PhD in the biological sciencesMinimum 5 years of experience in the pharmaceutical industry as a scientist on a cross-functional teamExperience as a project manager assisting preclinical projects is preferredMust be able to support multiple project teams simultaneously and have the agility to work in a fast-paced environmentMust be well organized and have strong attention to detailMust possess excellent interpersonal, as well as written and verbal communication, skillsRequires previous experience and high proficiency with MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook), as well as familiarity with MS Project, collaboration platforms (e.g. SharePoint), and online conferencing systems (e.g. Webex)', 'Manages project communications tools in order to provide up-to-date project information and documentation to the team, functional area management, and R&D leadership', 'Experience as a project manager assisting preclinical projects is preferred', 'Interested candidates should forward a resume and cover letter to careers-US@monterosatx.com', 'Principal Duties and Responsibilities:', 'MS or PhD in the biological sciences', 'Location: Boston, MA', 'Requires previous experience and high proficiency with MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook), as well as familiarity with MS Project, collaboration platforms (e.g. SharePoint), and online conferencing systems (e.g. Webex)', 'Monte Rosa Therapeutics seeks a highly motivated Program Manager to support the expanding research team in Boston, MA. The Program Manager will work in a project team environment, interfacing internally with multiple functional areas such as cell biology, chemistry, biochemistry/biophysics, proteomics, bioinformatics, and pharmacology. The Project Manager will also interact externally with alliance partners, vendors, and others.', 'Develops and maintains timelines for projects and certain functional areas, ensuring that adequate progress and milestones are met both internally and with external partners and that deviations are communicated', 'Aligns corporate goals with project team goals by informing R&D leadership of critical data, resource requests, and changes in strategy and by informing teams on requests and recommendations from R&D leadership', 'Manages multiple project teams in preclinical and early clinical for projects and certain functional areas, ensuring that adequate progress and milestones are met both internally and with external partners and that deviations are communicatedDevelops and maintains databases and electronic filing systems for project teams to organize documentation as projects advance toward INDManages project communications tools in order to provide up-to-date project job_title: AI Research scientist: up to $350,000 base+equity
job_text: ['', 'Responsibilities', 'Job Description:', 'We are a stealth startup building a cutting-edge cloud AI service. Our founders have a wealth of experience working on various ground-breaking products including self driving cars, AWS AI services, GMail, Google Docs and flash storage systems. We have also previously been founders and early employees at startups. We are backed by Eric Schmidt and Decibel Ventures with Series A funding of $18 million.\xa0', 'Responsibilities:', 'Candidates will need to have a PhD preferably in Artificial Intelligence or Machine Learning. We are looking for people who have done research and/or published papers in one of the following areas: Unsupervised Learning; Generative Modeling; Deep Neural Networks; Deep Reinforcement Learning; Generative Adversarial Networks; Causal Reasoning. Ideal candidates would be able to rapidly build on new ideas with engineers, potentially publish at top conferences, and be able to write code.', 'We are looking for talented research scientists to be part of the founding team. You will help build the product that applies unsupervised learning to model the world and automatically creates and manages production grade AI systems. As an initial member of the founding team, you get to own a significant chunk of the company, shape its culture and work on state-of-the-art science and technology.', 'General Requirements:', 'Coming up with new techniques in unsupervised learning, dataset augmentation, and deep reinforcement learning that can be applied to automating various parts of the AI development workflow.']

We're on a mission to empower every person to own their inner potential, and we're seeking candidates who want to make an impact on our journey.", "Build batch and event-driven data pipelines that empower data scientists' exploratory work as well as the training and deployment of machine learning models.", '20 days of PTO', 'Enjoy recruiting, mentoring, and motivating engineers ', "As an experienced data engineer with Oura, you will lead the architecture of complex technical solutions that allow us to handle sensitive, health-relevant data from the ring, the app, and external research sources in a secure fashion. You'll work closely with our Data Scientists, Engineers, and Dev Ops specialists as a technical leader and resource. You will help investigate new technologies and select the right tool for the job, with an eye toward robust, scalable, and flexible architectures that facilitate teamwork and ensure high quality data. job_title: Senior/Principal Associate Research Scientist, HSC Biology
job_text: ['', 'These eHSCs give rise to generations of new healthy blood cells that are effectively invisible to targeted therapies. Diseased cells displaying the target protein and are then vulnerable to attack. This process potentially broadens the therapeutic window and improves the utility of complementary targeted therapies.', 'Passion:\xa0Enthusiastically driving our science toward innovative medicines', 'MSc with 3+ years of laboratory experience in an academic or industry setting', 'We make healthy cells invisible to targeted therapies', 'Routinely perform culture and genome editing of primary cellsPerform cell biology, molecular biology, and biochemical assays, including flow cytometry activated cell sorting, gene editing, DNA extraction, and PCRProcess of cells and tissues from xeno-transplanted animalsParticipate in the design of experiments, the interpretation of data, and lead troubleshootingParticipate in drafting standard operating procedures, work instructions, test methods, study protocols, and technical reportsCreate presentations and update progress to senior managementMaintain a clear, detailed laboratory notebook to document all experiments and findings', 'At Vor, we engineer hematopoietic stem cells (HSCs) to lack a biologically redundant target protein, then transplant these cells into the patient.', 'Process of cells and tissues from xeno-transplanted animals', 'Create presentations and update progress to senior management', '\xa0', 'Maintain a clear, detailed laboratory notebook to document all experiments and findings', 'Perform cell biology, molecular biology, and biochemical assays, including flow cytometry activated cell sorting, gene editing, DNA extraction, and PCR', 'Routinely perform culture and genome editing of primary cells', 'Fellowship:', 'Experience using molecular biology and gene editing tools such as CRISPR/Cas knowledge a plus', 'Humility:', 'Humility:\xa0Acting selflessly by putting the collective mission first', 'Qualifications', 'Passion:', 'MS or BS in biology or related disciplineBSc with 5+ years of laboratory experience in an academic or industry settingMSc with 3+ years of laboratory experience in an academic or industry settingExperience with primary cell cultureExperience with multicolor flow cytometry and cell sortingExperience using molecular biology and gene editing tools such as CRISPR/Cas knowledge a plusStrong ability to work in a team-oriented settingExcellent communication, organization, and laboratory skills', 'Participate in the design of experiments, the interpretation of data, and lead troubleshooting', 'Vor Biopharma is seeking an Associate Research Scientist, HSC Biology, who will contribute to advancing Vor’s engineered hematopoietic stem cell products. This will involve working within a cross-functional environment to execute experimental plans requiring fundamental genomic engineering and hematopoietic stem cell biology skills.', 'What we value in our fellow Voracians', 'Strong ability to work in a team-oriented setting', 'Experience with multicolor flow cytometry and cell sorting', 'As an equal opportunity employer, we at Vor Biopharma know that diversity inspires innovation, inclusiveness, and creativity. We invite you to come as you are. All applicants will be considered for employment agnostic to race, age, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran, or disability status.', 'MS or BS in biology or related discipline', 'Vor Biopharma is thrilled to have been chosen as the 2019 Xconomy Cell Therapy Platform of the year. We are well-funded by 5AM Ventures and RA Capital, among others. Please visit our website at https://www.vorbiopharma.com/ for more information.', 'Fellowship:\xa0Fostering genuine bonds of collaboration and mentorship', 'Targeted therapies work by attacking cells that express particular proteins on their surface. Unfortunately, both diseased and healthy cells often express the same proteins, resulting in collateral damage to healthy cells.', 'Experience with primary cell culture', 'Excellent communication, organization, and laboratory skills', 'Key areas of responsibility', 'BSc with 5+ years of laboratory experience in an academic or industry setting', 'Who we are looking for', 'Participate in drafting standard operating procedures, work instructions, test methods, study protocols, and technical reports']

['', 'Are you interested in logistics data?\xa0', 'The company is offering a competitive salary, plus 401k, health plans, and 75% off meal kits.', 'Check out\xa0www.bigcloud.io/jobs\xa0to see what else we’re recruiting for.', "Would you like to work for one of the world's fastest-growing food tech brands?\xa0", 'You will be responsible for data modeling, data infrastructure (ETLs on Airflow and DataBricks), data cleaning, data transformation, and building data products to automate the supply chain flow.\xa0\xa0', 'Big Cloud is a machine learning recruiting firm. We’re lucky enough to recruit the best candidates in the most exciting companies all over the world. We try to reply to all applications, but we’re only human, for now! So, you may only hear from us if you are successful.', 'Please apply if you have 3-5 years of data engineering experience. You should have strong Python and SQL scripting skills plus experience in job orchestration tools like Airflow, Luigi, or similar. Bonus points for Spark and Databricks plus you should know your way around cloud systems architecture.\xa0', '\xa0', 'Do you want to work with some of the best datasets in the world?\xa0', "I'm hiring for a world-leading meal kit provider that has offices all over the world and delivers meals to millions of people. This is an opportunity to join the company as a senior data engineer.\xa0", 'You will be joining a supply chain analytics team of 7 people across data science, data engineering, and machine learning. You will be reporting to the associate director and mentoring a more junior data engineer. You will take data modeling and automation in the supply chain to the next level, leveraging the best in big data tools.']

['', 'Experience working with large-scale distributed data systems. ', 'Evaluate performance of machine learning systems and work with data scientists to improve quality. ', 'Move, structure, encode, and condense data from disparate database systems and formats. ', 'Job Description', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills. ', 'Experience performing root cause analysis on data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement. ', 'Skills and Qualifications ', 'Move, structure, encode, and condense data from disparate database systems and formats. Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements such as, automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, and re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability. Create data tools for analytics and data science team members that assist them in building and optimizing solutions to become an innovative industry leader. Evaluate performance of machine learning systems and work with data scientists to improve quality. job_title: Senior Data Science Analyst - Anesthesiology & Perioperative Medicine
job_text: ['', 'Will work with other staff in developing data analysis tools and predictive models, using advanced data analysis techniques and artificial intelligence and machine learning.', 'Participates in discovery processes with stakeholders to identify the business requirements and the expected outcome.', 'Provides advanced data insights for complex business problems that can be approached with analytics techniques to collect, explore, and extract insights from structured and unstructured data.', 'Qualifications', 'Has advanced expertise in the methods used to analyze data and advanced knowledge of data types, topics, and scientific challenges and approaches.', 'Leads the interpretation of data analysis and writing reports.', 'Additional Qualifications', 'Other Responsibilities', 'Provides advanced data insights for complex business problems that can be approached with analytics techniques to collect, explore, and extract insights from structured and unstructured data.Has advanced expertise in the methods used to analyze data and advanced knowledge of data types, topics, and scientific challenges and approaches.Will work with other staff in developing data analysis tools and predictive models, using advanced data analysis techniques and artificial intelligence and machine learning.Participates in discovery processes with stakeholders to identify the business requirements and the expected outcome.Leads the interpretation of data analysis and writing reports.']

job_title: Senior Quant Researcher, Enterprise Product - New York
job_text: ['', 'PhD/MS in science/math/engineering/operations research/quant financeFluency in calculus and stochastic processesAt least 4+ years of financial industry experience, preferably with Bonds, FX or FuturesExperience building advanced statistical methods in a big data environmentNumerical programming experience in PythonA creative mind with attention to details and drive for resultsComfort interacting with other quants, developers and product managers', 'Market microstructure and TCA knowledge', 'Participate in the full life-cycle workflow from hypothesis formulation, research and prototyping through to production release to clients.', 'Numerical programming experience in Python', 'Multi-asset experience', "We're Bloomberg. We sit at the heart of the financial markets, from the largest sell side institutions right through to the two person hedge fund - we're an integral part of the financial markets workflow in every corner of the world. We provide our users with up to the millisecond market moves and analytics as well as connecting them with their counterparts and the wider community of 325,000 Bloomberg Terminal subscribers.", 'Comfort interacting with other quants, developers and product managers', 'At least 4+ years of financial industry experience, preferably with Bonds, FX or Futures', 'Our Trading Automation & Analytics team consists of physicists and mathematicians who built their careers with major asset managers, hedge funds and broker dealers across Equities, Fixed Income and FX trading. We see an opportunity in financial industry to create advanced trading tools and to make the markets more efficient. The innovative decision support tools and state-of-the-art quantitative models we build, help traders, portfolio managers, and CIOs, to make important decisions across the buy-side and sell-side.', "Apply if you think we're a good match and we'll get in touch with you to let you know next steps. In the meantime, check outhttp://www.bloomberg.com/professional.", 'Solid programming experience, preferably with Python', 'Market microstructure and TCA knowledgeMulti-asset experienceKnowledge of Machine Learning AlgorithmsSolid programming experience, preferably with Python', 'Create innovative frameworks and state-of-the-art quantitative models for a variety of our clients and job functions including traders, portfolio managers and CIOs.Participate in the full life-cycle workflow from hypothesis formulation, research and prototyping through to production release to clients.', 'Our Quants are resourceful, adaptable and collaborative. They combine their technical skills and product knowledge to craft unsurpassed solutions for our customers. If you are a creative, open-minded, and results oriented quant – keep reading.', 'We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', 'PhD/MS in science/math/engineering/operations research/quant finance', 'Create innovative frameworks and state-of-the-art quantitative models for a variety of our clients and job functions including traders, portfolio managers and CIOs.', 'A creative mind with attention to details and drive for results', 'As a member of the Trading Research Quant team you will work with various asset classes, contributing to decision making and trading strategies. Trade Cost Analysis (TCA), Broker-Algo selecting tools, crowd-sourcing, alpha and risk modeling, market impact and optimizations are all part of this process.', 'Fluency in calculus and stochastic processes', 'Knowledge of Machine Learning Algorithms', 'Experience building advanced statistical methods in a big data environment']

job_title: Principal Data Engineer | AWS, Streaming | Top 5 Hedge Fund in Boston
job_text: ['', 'Introduce and evaluate cutting edge Big Data, HPC, and Cloud technologies to build critical, highly complex distributed system from scratch', 'Define the future of high-performance trading systems:\xa0\xa0', 'Principal Data Engineer | AWS, Streaming | Top 5 Hedge Fund in Boston', 'In this role, you will architect and implement AWS, Big Data, and streaming solutions to massively increase the scale of data that the quantitative research, analytics, and trading teams are able to leverage. This team has already identified AWS, Big Data, and HPC technologies to build their initial POCs, but you will be asked to introduce new technologies as development progresses.', '\xa0', 'Extremely competitive employee benefits program, 401K, and compensation package', 'Define the future of high-performance trading systems:\xa0', 'Expertise with Python, Spark, and Hadoop', 'Required Qualifications:\xa0', "One of Boston's top Hedge Funds has had an elite track record of success over the past 4.5 years; they have doubled their AUM, and now have $100+ Billion in AUM. They are building out a new cloud team to redefine the scope and performance of their data processing systems and infrastructure. This team will work in a greenfield environment, designing brand new systems from scratch.", 'BS or equivalent degree', 'One of the best-rated work cultures and work/life balances in the business', 'BS or equivalent degree8+ years of hands-on software development or data engineering experienceSignificant expertise with multiple AWS services (Kinesis, Lambda, EMR, Glue, DynamoDB, Elasticsearch Service, Redshift, Athena, QuickSight, etc.)Expertise with Python, Spark, and Hadoop', 'Preferred Qualifications:', 'Required Qualifications:\xa0\xa0', 'Experience working in Financial Services, ideally supporting performance sensitive trading systems', 'Extremely competitive employee benefits program, 401K, and compensation packageOne of the best-rated work cultures and work/life balances in the businessCasual dress, collaborative teams, and work from home flexibility', '8+ years of hands-on software development or data engineering experience', 'Act as a critical thought leader, consulting and mentoring other teams as your new systems transform the way this entire firm leverages data', 'Significant expertise with multiple AWS services (Kinesis, Lambda, EMR, Glue, DynamoDB, Elasticsearch Service, Redshift, Athena, QuickSight, etc.)', 'Introduce and evaluate cutting edge Big Data, HPC, and Cloud technologies to build critical, highly complex distributed system from scratchLead the migration to AWS as a hands-on technical leaderAct as a critical thought leader, consulting and mentoring other teams as your new systems transform the way this entire firm leverages data', 'Lead the migration to AWS as a hands-on technical leader', 'Capitalize on:', 'Casual dress, collaborative teams, and work from home flexibility']

This position is part of an on-site research contract in the Metals Branch of the Materials and Manufacturing Directorate of the Air Force Research Laboratory at Wright Patterson AFB, OH. ['', 'Own the end-to-end product life cycle from customer scenarios, product requirements, priorities, customer reviews, all the way to product/feature evangelism.', 'Work in a cross-functional and collaborative role spanning product, design, development, documentation, QA, marketing, sales, and support as well as our business partners.', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering or similar.", 'Our Ideal Product Manager Will Have', 'As a Product Manager At Snowflake You Will', 'The ability to grasp the breadth of the Snowflake data cloud vision and product and, at the same time, dive down to the detailed level of a specific feature.', 'Proven expertise in understanding the voice of the customer and partnering across engineering, marketing, and sales to deliver compelling products that meet those customers’ needs.', 'Manage a robust customer community for your feature areas.', '15+ years of experience in product management.', 'Collaborate across the Snowflake leadership team as well as the PM and Engineering organizations to help drive buy-in and agreement on the vision and the product.', 'Partner with other Snowflake Product Managers on cross-company initiatives.', 'Lead customer preview programs and engage in frequent conversations with customers to understand their needs, listen to their feedback, and determine the usability of the product which will influence the product roadmap and feature design.', 'Deep understanding in the areas of Data Science, Machine Learning, Big Data and Public Cloud technologies.', 'Ability to thrive in the dynamic environment that comes with being part of a hyper-growth company. That means flexibility and willingness to jump in and do whatever it takes to be successful.', 'Prior experience executing a vision from start to finish in the past, with an ability to take a one-word, or one-sentence, product vision and expound on it to drive a product roadmap.', 'Ability to work with teams in multiple geographies.', 'Define and evolve the vision, roadmap, and definition of success for one or more key areas of the Snowflake product, specifically for the data science and machine learning workloads.', 'Help coordinate project execution across feature teams.', 'Comfortable presenting and working at the CxO level within Snowflake and with Snowflake’s customers and partners.', " The ability to grasp the breadth of the Snowflake data cloud vision and product and, at the same time, dive down to the detailed level of a specific feature. Prior experience executing a vision from start to finish in the past, with an ability to take a one-word, or one-sentence, product vision and expound on it to drive a product roadmap. Proven expertise in understanding the voice of the customer and partnering across engineering, marketing, and sales to deliver compelling products that meet those customers’ needs. Demonstrated track record of shipping successful platform data science offerings in the cloud. Decisive and detailed oriented personality, and ready and willing to stand by their decisions. Ability to thrive in the dynamic environment that comes with being part of a hyper-growth company. That means flexibility and willingness to jump in and do whatever it takes to be successful. Ability to work with teams in multiple geographies. Comfortable presenting and working at the CxO level within Snowflake and with Snowflake’s customers and partners. 15+ years of experience in product management. Deep understanding in the areas of Data Science, Machine Learning, Big Data and Public Cloud technologies. Hands-on experience with data science products such as DataRobot, DataIku, AWS SageMaker, Azure ML, or Google ML and frameworks such as Tensorflow, Keras, PyTorch, XGBoost, or scikit-learn. Experience as a people manager for product managers is a plus. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering or similar. ", 'Experience as a people manager for product managers is a plus.', 'Decisive and detailed oriented personality, and ready and willing to stand by their decisions.', 'Leverage data to help find the best solution to our complex problems.', 'Hands-on experience with data science products such as DataRobot, DataIku, AWS SageMaker, Azure ML, or Google ML and frameworks such as Tensorflow, Keras, PyTorch, XGBoost, or scikit-learn.', ' Define and evolve the vision, roadmap, and definition of success for one or more key areas of the Snowflake product, specifically for the data science and machine learning workloads. Work in a cross-functional and collaborative role spanning product, design, development, documentation, QA, marketing, sales, and support as well as our business partners. Collaborate across the Snowflake leadership team as well as the PM and Engineering organizations to help drive buy-in and agreement on the vision and the product. Manage programs and structured projects related to the design and delivery of engineering efforts.  Partner with other Snowflake Product Managers on cross-company initiatives. Lead customer preview programs and engage in frequent conversations with customers to understand their needs, listen to their feedback, and determine the usability of the product which will influence the product roadmap and feature design. Help coordinate project execution across feature teams. Own the end-to-end product life cycle from customer scenarios, product requirements, priorities, customer reviews, all the way to product/feature evangelism. Manage a robust customer community for your feature areas. Leverage data to help find the best solution to our complex problems. ', 'Demonstrated track record of shipping successful platform data science offerings in the cloud.', 'Manage programs and structured projects related to the design and delivery of engineering efforts. ['Senior Machine Learning Engineer – NLP ExpertNew York City - NY$150,0000 - 180,000 base + Great Benefit Package\xa0This is an opportunity for a well-rounded Data Scientist to cut their teeth in a data-first, fast paced environment where they are designing unique infrastructure to change B2B data. Working with some the leaders in the industry, you will be responsible for putting your Natural Language Processing, Machine Learning models into production. If you are an NLP, Machine Learning expert, this role could be a great fit.THE COMPANYAs a Senior Machine Learning Engineer, with and NLP focus, you’ll find yourself using machine learning techniques in this B2B powerhouse and the power of data to innovate the way we extract information form the internet.THE ROLE\xa0You will be asked to be forward thinking in your approach to applying analytical techniques to advancing the departments capacity. You will work mostly independently and use your strong analytic skills to finish projects.· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Develop different types of machine learning models from NLP to anomaly detection· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Develop production level code in Python and deliver high quality solutions· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Work cross functionally with the data engineering and research analyst teams· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Present your findings to business leaders and stakeholders within the companyYOUR SKILLS AND EXPERIENCEYou will need to be a proven problem solver, critical thinker, and have an advanced technical background to join this growing, yet experienced team. Commercial experience with hands on experience putting Machine Learning projects into production is a must,· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Proven commercial experience with a strong understanding of Deep Learning frameworks· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Prior exposure to putting Machine Learning and Deep Learning models into production· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Prior work presenting key findings to stakeholders· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Previous work in expanding the use of Machine Learning and Deep Learning· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Ph.D. preferred in Computer Science, Linguistics, Engineering, Stats, or a related field· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Technically sound in NLP, TensorFlow, NLTK, ELMo, GloVe, spaCy, WordNetTHE BENEFITSA base salary of $150,000 - $180,000 + amazing benefitsHOW TO APPLYPlease register your interest by sending your résumé to Sam Agre via the Apply link on this page.']

job_title: AI Research scientist: up to $350,000 base+equity
job_text: ['', 'Job Description:', 'We are a stealth startup building a cutting-edge cloud AI service. Our founders have a wealth of experience working on various ground-breaking products including self driving cars, AWS AI services, GMail, Google Docs and flash storage systems. We have also previously been founders and early employees at startups. We are backed by Eric Schmidt and Decibel Ventures with Series A funding of $18 million.\xa0', 'Responsibilities:', 'Candidates will need to have a PhD preferably in Artificial Intelligence or Machine Learning. We are looking for people who have done research and/or published papers in one of the following areas: Unsupervised Learning; Generative Modeling; Deep Neural Networks; Deep Reinforcement Learning; Generative Adversarial Networks; Causal Reasoning. Ideal candidates would be able to rapidly build on new ideas with engineers, potentially publish at top conferences, and be able to write code.', 'We are looking for talented research scientists to be part of the founding team. You will help build the product that applies unsupervised learning to model the world and automatically creates and manages production grade AI systems. As an initial member of the founding team, you get to own a significant chunk of the company, shape its culture and work on state-of-the-art science and technology.', 'General Requirements:', 'Coming up with new techniques in unsupervised learning, dataset augmentation, and deep reinforcement learning that can be applied to automating various parts of the AI development workflow.']

Lead optimization efforts of current processes by conducting experiments to evaluate different growth parameters, medium components and new equipment.   Proposes, evaluates and implements the setting up, operation and validation of new equipment including single-use upstream and downstream equipment and equipment for perfusion mammalian/insect cell and bacterial bioprocesses. Ensures maintenance of equipment and it is kept in operational status. Proficient working with vendors and engineering to secure resources to evaluate instrument or equipment and represent the TechnoShift Team.   Capable of leading team meetings, lead projects team meetings, lead on-job trainings, assist in career development seminars and other assignments as determined by supervisor. Proposes, gains support with Core Team and/or sub Team, and implements the Design, Schedule, Execution and authoring protocols, conduct experiments and generation of reports and treats all data with a high level of integrity and ethics. Utilization of Statistical software is required. ['', 'You have a diverse range of data skills including experimentation, statistics, and machine learning, and have used these skills to inform business decisions.', 'You know that startups are a team sport. You listen to others, speak your mind, and ask the right questions. You are a great collaborator and teacher.', ' Credit Decisions - Core to our business is understanding and building signals from unstructured and structured data to identify good borrowers  Customer Service - Using machine learning, automate customer service interactions and provide context to our customer service team  Fraud Prevention - Identify patterns of fraudulent behavior and build models to detect and prevent these behaviors  Product Growth - Understand user experiences, test ideas, and improve conversion rates through experimentation  Paid Growth / Marketing - Use external and internal data sources to measure and optimize marketing spend ', 'Fraud Prevention - Identify patterns of fraudulent behavior and build models to detect and prevent these behaviors ', "Discretionary trips to our offices around the globe (when it's safe to travel!)", '99% coverage of insurance costs (health, dental, vision)', 'Qualifications', 'Generous child bonding leave policy', 'Credit Decisions - Core to our business is understanding and building signals from unstructured and structured data to identify good borrowers ', 'You have a keen eye for detail and a healthy skepticism for data before relying upon it.', 'Weekly team meals and quarterly team building events (virtual for now!)', 'Customer Service - Using machine learning, automate customer service interactions and provide context to our customer service team ', ' You excel at software engineering and programming in Python and SQL. You have 5+ years of experience working on Machine Learning systems in a production setting. You have a diverse range of data skills including experimentation, statistics, and machine learning, and have used these skills to inform business decisions. You have a keen eye for detail and a healthy skepticism for data before relying upon it. You are highly entrepreneurial. You teach yourself new skills. You take the initiative to solve problems before they arise. You know that startups are a team sport. You listen to others, speak your mind, and ask the right questions. You are a great collaborator and teacher. You are driven by making an impact on customers’ lives. Experience supporting and working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment. Present findings with actionable recommendations to a variety of internal stakeholders including senior management and executives. Oversee all phases of usability test preparation including screening criteria and test script developmentIdentify and implement a variety of methods for getting input and feedback from customers across generative, evaluative & product research phases, including lab usability studies, remote-unmoderated and moderated studies, and others as appropriate. Partner with other internal research functions (e.g. Marketing Research) to identify appropriate mix of research methods to determine future directions for our websites and mobile apps. Partner with UX managers and UX directors on executing research within accelerated project timelines and agile development cycles. Provide usability session moderation training and feedback for UX designers assigned to agile product teams. Collaborate with UX managers and UX directors to ensure alignment across portfolios and define UX strategy. Solicit vendor services and quotes when appropriate and provide internal cost estimates on research requests. Help maintain and grow knowledge repository Translate user research findings into strategic and tactical recommendations Evangelize and educate about user experience research throughout the organization Lead projects, mentor/provide work direction for less experienced staff', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Education', ' Help maintain and grow knowledge repository', 'Position Summary']

job_title: Machine Learning Engineer: up to $250,000 base+equity
job_text: ['', 'Job Description:', 'We are a stealth startup building a cutting edge cloud AI service. Our founders have a wealth of experience working on various ground-breaking products including self driving cars, AWS AI services, GMail, Google Docs and flash storage systems. They have also previously been founders and early employees at startups. We raised $18 million in Series A from Decibel Ventures and Eric Schmidt. We are looking for talented machine learning software engineers, systems software engineers and research scientists to be part of the founding team. You will help build the product that applies unsupervised learning to model the world and automatically creates and manages production grade AI systems. As an initial member of the founding team, you get to own a significant chunk of the company, shape its culture and work on state-of-the-art science and technology.', 'Responsible for implementing various algorithms to do automated feature extraction and dataset augmentation, optimizing runtimes of neural network algorithms and building higher level abstractions for various common AI/ML techniques.', 'General Requirements:', 'Responsibilities:', 'Candidates will need to have a BS or MS from top notch CS programs with industry experience. We are looking for machine learning software engineers who have experience building at least one of the following: ML/AI models which are in production New neural network algorithms based on research papers Low level performance optimization of deep learning systems Machine learning platforms', 'Company Description:']

['', 'You have a diverse range of data skills including experimentation, statistics, and machine learning, and have used these skills to inform business decisions.', 'You know that startups are a team sport. You listen to others, speak your mind, and ask the right questions. You are a great collaborator and teacher.', ' Credit Decisions - Core to our business is understanding and building signals from unstructured and structured data to identify good borrowers  Customer Service - Using machine learning, automate customer service interactions and provide context to our customer service team  Fraud Prevention - Identify patterns of fraudulent behavior and build models to detect and prevent these behaviors  Product Growth - Understand user experiences, test ideas, and improve conversion rates through experimentation  Paid Growth / Marketing - Use external and internal data sources to measure and optimize marketing spend ', 'Fraud Prevention - Identify patterns of fraudulent behavior and build models to detect and prevent these behaviors ', "Discretionary trips to our offices around the globe (when it's safe to travel!)", '99% coverage of insurance costs (health, dental, vision)', 'Qualifications', 'Generous child bonding leave policy', 'Credit Decisions - Core to our business is understanding and building signals from unstructured and structured data to identify good borrowers ', 'You have a keen eye for detail and a healthy skepticism for data before relying upon it.', 'Weekly team meals and quarterly team building events (virtual for now!)', 'Customer Service - Using machine learning, automate customer service interactions and provide context to our customer service team ', ' You excel at software engineering and programming in Python and SQL. You have 5+ years of experience working on Machine Learning systems in a production setting. You have a diverse range of data skills including experimentation, statistics, and machine learning, and have used these skills to inform business decisions. You have a keen eye for detail and a healthy skepticism for data before relying upon it. You are highly entrepreneurial. You teach yourself new skills. You take the initiative to solve problems before they arise. You know that startups are a team sport. You listen to others, speak your mind, and ask the right questions. You are a great collaborator and teacher. You are driven by making an impact on customers’ lives. ', 'You excel at software engineering and programming in Python and SQL.', 'You are driven by making an impact on customers’ lives.', 'Product Growth - Understand user experiences, test ideas, and improve conversion rates through experimentation ', 'Pre-tax commuter and 401(k) programs', 'Mission-driven and fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment ', 'Competitive salary and equity package ', 'Flexible working hours', 'You have 5+ years of experience working on Machine Learning systems in a production setting.', 'Unlimited PTO', " Mission-driven and fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment  Competitive salary and equity package  99% coverage of insurance costs (health, dental, vision) Unlimited PTO Flexible working hours Discretionary trips to our offices around the globe (when it's safe to travel!) Pre-tax commuter and 401(k) programs Weekly team meals and quarterly team building events (virtual for now!) Generous child bonding leave policy ", 'Paid Growth / Marketing - Use external and internal data sources to measure and optimize marketing spend', 'You are highly entrepreneurial. You teach yourself new skills. You take the initiative to solve problems before they arise.']

job_title: Sr. Threat Analyst and Security Researcher
job_text: ['', 'Strong scripting skills in languages such as Ruby, Python, or Perl.', 'Publication of past research and/or speaking engagements.', 'Experience building automated tools to extract malware configuration information.', 'Articulate findings through technical reports, blogs, media interviews and speaking engagements with strong writing/speaking skills and be comfortable presenting findings to both internal and external audiences.', 'Responsibilities', 'Location:', 'Qualifications', 'Leverage Zscaler’s existing data mining tools as well as our cloud based infrastructure to protect our customers.', 'Required 5+ years in static and dynamic analysis malware code reverse engineering.', 'Expert knowledge of debuggers (OllyDbg, WinDbg, or x64dbg) and disassemblers/decompilers (IDA Pro or Ghidra).', 'Experience with threats to mobile devices, vulnerabilities, and binary exploitation.', 'Identify, analyze, and track emerging threats by reverse engineering advanced malware threats and building automated systems to extract threat intelligence for detection and prevention.', 'Familiar with the development of IDS/IPS (e.g., Snort and Suricata) signatures and Yara rules.', ' US Citizenship is required **For over 10 years, Zscaler has been disrupting and transforming the security industry. Our 100% purpose built cloud platform delivers the entire gateway security stack as a service through 150 global data centers to securely connect users to their applications, regardless of device, location, or network in over 185 countries protecting over 4,500 companies and 100 Million threats detected a day.We work in a fast paced, dynamic and make it happen culture. Our people are some of the brightest and passionate in the industry that thrive on being the first to solve problems. We are always looking to hire highly passionate, collaborative and humble people that want to make a difference.ResponsibilitiesIdentify, analyze, and track emerging threats by reverse engineering advanced malware threats and building automated systems to extract threat intelligence for detection and prevention.Articulate findings through technical reports, blogs, media interviews and speaking engagements with strong writing/speaking skills and be comfortable presenting findings to both internal and external audiences.Leverage Zscaler’s existing data mining tools as well as our cloud based infrastructure to protect our customers.Exercise strong technical knowledge of malware-based threats, and live to identify the next attack vector, no matter how deep it’s hidden.QualificationsRequired 5+ years in static and dynamic analysis malware code reverse engineering.Expert knowledge of debuggers (OllyDbg, WinDbg, or x64dbg) and disassemblers/decompilers (IDA Pro or Ghidra).Proficient in unpacking malware, string and code obfuscation, encryption, and compression algorithms.Experience building automated tools to extract malware configuration information.Profound understanding of network protocols and web application security.Familiar with the development of IDS/IPS (e.g., Snort and Suricata) signatures and Yara rules.Strong scripting skills in languages such as Ruby, Python, or Perl.Professional english writing skills and experience in drafting blogs, technical reports, etc.Proven track record of innovative ideas and an ability to implement them.PreferredExperience with threats to mobile devices, vulnerabilities, and binary exploitation.Publication of past research and/or speaking engagements.Data mining experience with large security data sets such as IDS, IPS and firewall logs.EducationBachelor’s or graduate degree from four-year college or university (preferably in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related discipline), or equivalent security industry work experience.Why Zscaler?People who excel at Zscaler are smart, motivated and share our values. Ask yourself: Do you want to team with the best talent in the industry? Do you want to work on disruptive technology? Do you thrive in a fluid work environment? Do you appreciate a company culture that enables individual and group success and celebrates achievement? If you said yes, we’d love to talk to you about joining our award-winning team.Learn more at zscaler.com or follow us on Twitter @zscaler. Additional information about Zscaler (NASDAQ : ZS ) is available at http://www.zscaler.com. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, sex, color, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, or on job_title: Senior Data Scientist – Secret Clearance - Consulting
job_text: ['', 'Understand which of the data-sets available to you will be needed to address clients mission.', 'Understand which of the data-sets available to you will be needed to address clients mission.Responsible for oversight of all machine learning modeling and statistical analysis within team.Mentor and manage junior team members.Interact with senior stakeholders and act as an analytics evangelist.', 'Mentor and manage junior team members.', 'HOW TO APPLY', 'For more information about the role press “apply now”.', 'Commercial experience working with machine learning models (linear regression, XGBoost, random forest etc.) is essential.', 'Responsible for oversight of all machine learning modeling and statistical analysis within team.', 'SENIOR DATA SCIENTIST – ROLE OVERVIEW', '$160,000 - $180,000 + Bonus', '\ufeff', 'SALARY AND BENEFITS', 'YOUR SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE', 'The successful Senior Data Scientist can expect a salary of $160,000 - $180,000 plus a comprehensive bonus and benefits package.', 'Virginia', 'Active secret clearance is essential, with the ability to gain TS/SCI.', 'KEYWORDS', 'Data Science, Data Scientist, Clearance Jobs, Secret Clearance, Federal, Government, Consultancy, Machine Learning, Senior Data Scientist, Lead Data Scientist, Applied Mathematics, Physics, Python.', 'Interact with senior stakeholders and act as an analytics evangelist.', 'PhD level education within a STEM field is desirable.Commercial experience working with machine learning models (linear regression, XGBoost, random forest etc.) is essential.Active secret clearance is essential, with the ability to gain TS/SCI.', 'Senior Data Scientist – Secret Clearance - Consulting', 'PhD level education within a STEM field is desirable.', 'A global consultancy with a federal arm is looking for a Senior Data Scientist to work within their R&D function – a proven leader in the space they are looking to expand the team due to new business wins. This is a great chance to take the step from individual contributor to project leader and deliver key findings to senior stakeholders. Note – you must currently hold an active Secret clearance level or higher. ']

['', 'PhD from a world-leading university in a relevant field (NLP, Machine Learning, Statistics, Computer Science etc);', 'With tens of billions of dollars in assets under management, my client is one of the most successful and influential quantitative finance institutions globally. They boast an elite, collaborative team of Machine Learning and NLP Researchers. Including award winning Scientists and Engineers from FAANG companies and PhDs from UC Berkeley, MIT, CMU, University of Montreal and University of Washington.', 'If this sounds interesting to you, please get in touch and I will be able to disclose more information directly.\xa0\xa0', 'My client is looking for a Lead NLP Researcher (who is a genuine thought leader in the field) to join their team and to lead their NLP research efforts. You will be offered access to unparalleled unstructured datasets and high-impact applied work - where your research and deployed models will present results instantaneously and generate $100s millions. job_title: Machine Learning Engineer: up to $250,000 base+equity
job_text: ['', 'Job Description:', 'We are a stealth startup building a cutting edge cloud AI service. Our founders have a wealth of experience working on various ground-breaking products including self driving cars, AWS AI services, GMail, Google Docs and flash storage systems. They have also previously been founders and early employees at startups. We raised $18 million in Series A from Decibel Ventures and Eric Schmidt. We are looking for talented machine learning software engineers, systems software engineers and research scientists to be part of the founding team. You will help build the product that applies unsupervised learning to model the world and automatically creates and manages production grade AI systems. As an initial member of the founding team, you get to own a significant chunk of the company, shape its culture and work on state-of-the-art science and technology.', 'Responsible for implementing various algorithms to do automated feature extraction and dataset augmentation, optimizing runtimes of neural network algorithms and building higher level abstractions for various common AI/ML techniques.', 'General Requirements:', 'Responsibilities:', 'Candidates will need to have a BS or MS from top notch CS programs with industry experience. We are looking for machine learning software engineers who have experience building at least one of the following: ML/AI models which are in production New neural network algorithms based on research papers Low level performance optimization of deep learning systems Machine learning platforms', 'Company Description:']

Our 100% purpose built cloud platform delivers the entire gateway security stack as a service through 150 global data centers to securely connect users to their applications, regardless of device, location, or network in over 185 countries protecting over 4,500 companies and 100 Million threats detected a day.We work in a fast paced, dynamic and make it happen culture. Do you appreciate a company culture that enables individual and group success and celebrates achievement? If you said yes, we’d love to talk to you about joining our award-winning team.Learn more at zscaler.com or follow us on Twitter @zscaler. Additional information about Zscaler (NASDAQ : ZS ) is available at http://www.zscaler.com. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, sex, color, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, or on the basis of disability.']
